Angel of Serenity.name: Angel of Serenity
Angel of Serenity.text:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.
Angel of Serenity.original_text:
Flying
When Angel of Serenity enters the battlefield, you may exile up to three other target creatures from the battlefield and/or creature cards from graveyards.
When Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: If Angel of Serenity leaves the battlefield before its enters-the-battlefield ability has resolved, its leaves-the-battlefield ability will trigger and do nothing. Then the enters-the-battlefield ability will resolve and exile the targeted creatures and/or creature cards indefinitely.
You choose up to three total targets from among other creatures on the battlefield and creature cards in graveyards. You may choose zero targets.
You choose the targets as part of putting the enters-the-battlefield trigger on the stack. Because that ability includes “you may,” you choose whether to exile the targets when the ability resolves.

If a creature targeted by the enters-the-battlefield ability dies before that ability resolves, it will become an illegal target even though it may be a creature card in a graveyard when the ability resolves. It won’t be exiled.

foreign_names.name: Engel der Reinheit
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Engel der Reinheit ins Spiel kommt, kannst du bis zu drei andere Kreaturen deiner Wahl aus dem Spiel und/oder Kreaturenkarten deiner Wahl aus Friedhöfen ins Exil schicken.
Wenn der Engel der Reinheit das Spiel verlässt, bringe die ins Exil geschickten Karten auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreign_names.name: Ángel de serenidad
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Ángel de serenidad entre al campo de batalla, puedes exiliar hasta tres otras criaturas del campo de batalla y/o cartas de criatura objetivo de cementerios.
Cuando el Ángel de serenidad deje el campo de batalla, regresa las cartas exiliadas a las manos de sus propietarios.

foreign_names.name: Ange de la sérénité
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Quand l'Ange de la sérénité arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez exiler jusqu'à trois autres créatures ciblées du champ de bataille et/ou cartes de créature des cimetières.
Quand l'Ange de la sérénité quitte le champ de bataille, renvoyez les cartes exilées dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

foreign_names.name: Angelo della Serenità
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Quando l'Angelo della Serenità entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi esiliare fino a tre altre creature bersaglio dal campo di battaglia e/o carte creatura dai cimiteri.
Quando l'Angelo della Serenità lascia il campo di battaglia, fai tornare le carte esiliate in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.

foreign_names.name: 静穏の天使
foreign_names.text:
飛行
静穏の天使が戦場に出たとき、あなたは戦場にある他のクリーチャーかいずれかの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード、あるいはその両方から最大３つまでを対象とし、それらを追放してもよい。
静穏の天使が戦場を離れたとき、その追放されたカードをオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 天使

foreign_names.name: 평온의 천사
foreign_names.text:
비행
평온의 천사가 전장에 들어올 때, 전장에 있는 다른 생물과 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 중에서 목표를 최대 세 개까지 정한다. 당신은 그 목표들을 추방할 수 있다.
평온의 천사가 전장을 떠날 때, 추방된 카드들을 각각 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreign_names.name: Anjo da Serenidade
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Quando Anjo da Serenidade entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar até três outras criaturas alvo do campo de batalha e/ou cards de criatura de cemitérios.
Quando Anjo da Serenidade deixar o campo de batalha, devolva os cards exilados para as mãos de seus donos.

foreign_names.name: Ангел Безмятежности
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Когда Ангел Безмятежности выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать до трех других целевых существ с поля битвы и (или) карт существ из кладбищ.
Когда Ангел Безмятежности покидает поле битвы, верните изгнанные карты в руки их владельцев.

foreign_names.name: 清朗天使
foreign_names.text:
飞行
当清朗天使进战场时，你可以从战场放逐其他的目标生物和／或从任意坟墓场放逐生物牌，上述数量至多为三。
当清朗天使离开战场时，将所放逐的牌各移回其拥有者手上。

foreign_names.name: 清朗天使
foreign_names.text:
飛行
當清朗天使進戰場時，你可以從戰場放逐其他的目標生物和／或從任意墳墓場放逐生物牌，上述數量至多為三。
當清朗天使離開戰場時，將所放逐的牌各移回其擁有者手上。

Armory Guard.name: Armory Guard
Armory Guard.text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.
Armory Guard.flavor: The Dimir agents watched from the shadows. "Eight hours, and I've yet to see him blink," Nefara hissed. "I suggest we find another way in."
Armory Guard.original_text: Armory Guard has vigilance as long as you control a Gate.

rulings.text: Vigilance only matters when Armory Guard is being declared as an attacking creature. If Armory Guard is already attacking, losing control of your only Gate won’t cause Armory Guard to become tapped or to leave combat.

foreign_names.name: Wächter des Arsenals
foreign_names.text: Der Wächter des Arsenals hat Wachsamkeit, solange du ein Tor kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: Die Dimir-Agenten sahen aus den Schatten heraus zu. „Acht Stunden, und ich habe ihn noch nicht blinzeln gesehen", zischte Nefara. „Ich schlage vor, wir suchen uns einen anderen Weg hinein."

foreign_names.name: Guardia de la armería
foreign_names.text: El Guardia de la armería tiene la habilidad de vigilancia mientras controles un Portal.
foreign_names.flavor: Los agentes dimir observaban desde las sombras. "En ocho horas no ha parpadeado una sola vez", susurró Nefara. "Sugiero que busquemos otra forma de entrar."

foreign_names.name: Garde de l'armurerie
foreign_names.text: Le Garde de l'armurerie a la vigilance tant que vous contrôlez une porte.
foreign_names.flavor: Les agents dimirs observaient depuis les ombres. « En huit heures, je ne l'ai pas vu broncher une seule fois », siffla Nefara. « Je suggère que nous trouvions un autre moyen d'entrer. »

foreign_names.name: Guardia dell'Armeria
foreign_names.text: La Guardia dell'Armeria ha cautela fintanto che controlli un Cancello.
foreign_names.flavor: Nascosti nelle ombre, gli agenti Dimir osservavano. "Otto ore e non ha mosso una palpebra," sibilò Nefara. "Dovremo trovare un'altra via per entrare."

foreign_names.name: 武器庫の護衛
foreign_names.text: 武器庫の護衛は、あなたが門をコントロールしているかぎり警戒を持つ。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 巨人・兵士
foreign_names.flavor: ディミーアの工作員は物陰から様子を窺っていた。「８時間も経つのに、まばたきすらしない」とネファーラが囁いた。「別の入り口を探したほうがよさそうね。」

foreign_names.name: 무기고 경비
foreign_names.text: 당신이 관문을 조종하는 한, 무기고 경비는 경계 능력을 가진다.
foreign_names.flavor: 디미르 길드의 하수인들이 그림자 속에서 상황을 지켜봤다. 네파라가 "여덟 시간 동안 녀석은 눈도 한 번 깜빡하지 않았다. 다른 방법을 찾아봐야겠어."라고 내뱉었다.

foreign_names.name: Guarda do Arsenal
foreign_names.text: Guarda do Arsenal terá vigilância enquanto você controlar um terreno do tipo Portão.
foreign_names.flavor: Os agentes Dimir observavam das sombras. "Oito horas e eu ainda não o vi piscar", sussurrou Nefara. Sugiro encontrarmos outra forma de entrar."

foreign_names.name: Страж Оружейного Склада
foreign_names.text: Страж Оружейного Склада имеет Бдительность, пока вы контролируете Врата.
foreign_names.flavor: Агенты Димиров следят из темноты. «За восемь часов я ни разу не видела, чтобы он моргнул», — прошипела Нефара. «Я предлагаю искать другой вход».

foreign_names.name: 军械库守卫
foreign_names.text: 只要你操控门，军械库守卫便具有警戒异能。
foreign_names.flavor: 底密尔密探在阴影中监视着。「八小时了，我还没看到他眨眼。」涅法拉低声咒骂。「我们还是另寻入口吧。」

foreign_names.name: 軍械庫守衛
foreign_names.text: 只要你操控門，軍械庫守衛便具有警戒異能。
foreign_names.flavor: 底密爾密探在陰影中監視著。「八小時了，我還沒看到他眨眼。」涅法拉低聲咒罵。「我們還是另尋入口吧。」

Arrest.name: Arrest
Arrest.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
Arrest.flavor:
"We will prove your guilt. We don't arrest the innocent, you know."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct
Arrest.original_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text.

foreign_names.name: Festnahme
foreign_names.text:
Kreaturenverzauberung
Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.
foreign_names.flavor: „Wir werden deine Schuld beweisen. Wir verhaften nämlich keine Unschuldigen." —Eintreiberin Lavinia, Zehntes Revier

foreign_names.name: Arresto
foreign_names.text:
Encantar criatura.
La criatura encantada no puede atacar ni bloquear y no pueden activarse sus habilidades activadas.
foreign_names.flavor: "Demostraremos tu culpabilidad. Nunca arrestamos a inocentes." —Encarceladora Lavinia, distrito décimo

foreign_names.name: Arrestation
foreign_names.text:
Enchanter : créature
La créature enchantée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.
foreign_names.flavor: « Nous prouverons votre culpabilité. Nous n'arrêtons pas les innocents, vous savez. » —Courtière Lavinia, Dixième circonscription

foreign_names.name: Arrestare
foreign_names.text:
Incanta creatura
La creatura incantata non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.
foreign_names.flavor: "Noi non arrestiamo gli innocenti. Per questo dimostreremo la tua colpevolezza." —Lavinia, polizia del Decimo Distretto

foreign_names.name: 拘引
foreign_names.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
エンチャントされているクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。
foreign_names.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreign_names.flavor: 「あんたの罪なら立証してやるわ。うちらが無実の者を拘引するわけないでしょ。」 ――第10管区の拘引者、ラヴィニア

foreign_names.name: 체포
foreign_names.text:
생물에게 부여
부여된 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.
foreign_names.flavor: "우리가 네 죄를 증명할 것이다. 우린 무고한 자는 체포하지 않는다고." —10번 관할지역 체포원 라비니아

foreign_names.name: Prender
foreign_names.text:
Encantar criatura
A criatura encantada não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.
foreign_names.flavor: "Provaremos a sua culpa. Não prendemos inocentes, você sabe." — Encarceradora Lavinia, Décima Jurisdição

foreign_names.name: Арест
foreign_names.text:
Зачаровать существо
Зачарованное существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности нельзя активировать.
foreign_names.flavor: «Мы докажем вашу вину. Вы же знаете, что мы не арестовываем невиновных». — Задержатель Лавиния, Десятый Округ

foreign_names.name: 逮捕
foreign_names.text:
结附于生物
所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我们将证明你有罪。你要知道，我们不逮捕无罪的人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉温妮

foreign_names.name: 逮捕
foreign_names.text:
結附於生物
所結附的生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我們將證明你有罪。你要知道，我們不逮捕無罪的人。」 ～第十城郊逮捕人拉溫妮

Avenging Arrow.name: Avenging Arrow
Avenging Arrow.text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.
Avenging Arrow.flavor:
"Forgive the theft. Punish the deception."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer
Avenging Arrow.original_text: Destroy target creature that dealt damage this turn.

rulings.text: It doesn’t matter what the creature dealt damage to. If the creature dealt damage to another creature or a planeswalker, it doesn’t matter whether that creature or planeswalker is still on the battlefield.
Avenging Arrow doesn’t affect the damage the creature dealt. It isn’t retroactively prevented.

foreign_names.name: Rächender Pfeil
foreign_names.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die in diesem Zug Schaden zugefügt hat.
foreign_names.flavor: „Der Diebstahl sei vergeben. Der Betrug wird bestraft." —Alcarus, Selesnija-Bogenschütze

foreign_names.name: Flecha vengadora
foreign_names.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo que haya hecho daño este turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Perdona el robo. Castiga el engaño." —Alcarus, arquero selesnya

foreign_names.name: Flèche vengeresse
foreign_names.text: Détruisez la créature ciblée qui a infligé des blessures ce tour-ci.
foreign_names.flavor: « Pardonner le larcin. Punir la tromperie. » —Alcarus, archer de Selesnya

foreign_names.name: Freccia Vendicatrice
foreign_names.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio che ha inflitto danno in questo turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Perdona il furto. Punisci l'inganno." —Alcarus, arciere di Selesnya

foreign_names.name: 報復の矢
foreign_names.text: このターンにダメージを与えたクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreign_names.flavor: 「盗みは許せ。騙しは罰せ。」 ――セレズニアの射手、アルカウス

foreign_names.name: 복수의 화살
foreign_names.text: 이번 턴에 피해를 입힌 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreign_names.flavor: "절도는 용서하되, 속임수는 징벌하라." —셀레스냐 궁수 알카루스

foreign_names.name: Flecha da Vingança
foreign_names.text: Destrua a criatura alvo que tenha causado dano neste turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Perdoe o roubo. Puna o logro." — Alcarus, arqueiro Selesnya

foreign_names.name: Карающая Стрела
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо, которое нанесло повреждения в этом ходу.
foreign_names.flavor: «Прости за кражу. Накажи за обман». — Алкарус, селезнийский лучник

foreign_names.name: 复仇箭
foreign_names.text: 消灭目标于本回合造成过伤害的生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 「偷窃可以原谅。欺瞒绝不宽恕。」 ～瑟雷尼亚弓箭手艾凯勒

foreign_names.name: 復仇箭
foreign_names.text: 消滅目標於本回合造成過傷害的生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 「偷竊可以原諒。欺瞞絕不寬恕。」 ～瑟雷尼亞弓箭手艾凱勒

Azorius Arrester.name: Azorius Arrester
Azorius Arrester.text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Azorius Arrester.flavor: "You have the right to remain silent. Mostly because I tire of your excuses."
Azorius Arrester.original_text: When Azorius Arrester enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreign_names.name: Azorius-Eintreiberin
foreign_names.text: Wenn die Azorius-Eintreiberin ins Spiel kommt, inhaftiere eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann diese Kreatur nicht angreifen oder blocken und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Du hast das Recht zu schweigen. Vor allem, weil ich deiner Ausflüchte müde werde."

foreign_names.name: Encarceladora azoria
foreign_names.text: Cuando la Encarceladora azoria entre al campo de batalla, detén la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esa criatura no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Tienes derecho a guardar silencio. Más que nada porque me cansan tus excusas."

foreign_names.name: Courtière d'Azorius
foreign_names.text: Quand la Courtière d'Azorius arrive sur le champ de bataille, détenez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, cette créature ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)
foreign_names.flavor: « Vous avez le droit de garder le silence. Essentiellement parce que je suis lasse d'entendre vos excuses. »

foreign_names.name: Polizia Azorius
foreign_names.text: Quando la Polizia Azorius entra nel campo di battaglia, trattieni una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quella creatura non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Hai il diritto di rimanere in silenzio. Principalmente perché le chiacchiere mi annoiano."

foreign_names.name: アゾリウスの拘引者
foreign_names.text: アゾリウスの拘引者が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士
foreign_names.flavor: 「あなたには黙秘権があります。言い訳をうだうだ聞かされたくないので。」

foreign_names.name: 아조리우스 체포원
foreign_names.text: 아조리우스 체포원이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "당신은 묵비권을 행사할 수 있으며, 행사하는 걸 권장한다. 변명을 듣는 것도 지겨우니까."

foreign_names.name: Encarceradora Azorius
foreign_names.text: Quando Encarceradora Azorius entrar no campo de batalha, detenha a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. (Até o seu próximo turno, aquela criatura não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Você tem o direito de permanecer em silêncio. Principalmente porque cansei de suas desculpas."

foreign_names.name: Задержатель Азориусов
foreign_names.text: Когда Задержатель Азориусов выходит на поле битвы, задержите целевое существо под контролем оппонента. (До вашего следующего хода то существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)
foreign_names.flavor: «У вас есть право хранить молчание. В основном потому, что я устала слушать оправдания».

foreign_names.name: 俄佐立逮捕人
foreign_names.text: 当俄佐立逮捕人进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「你有权保持缄默。主要是因为我懒得听你找藉口。」

foreign_names.name: 俄佐立逮捕人
foreign_names.text: 當俄佐立逮捕人進戰場時，拘留目標由對手操控的生物。（直到你的下個回合，該生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「你有權保持緘默。主要是因為我懶得聽你找藉口。」

Azorius Justiciar.name: Azorius Justiciar
Azorius Justiciar.text: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
Azorius Justiciar.flavor: "Your potential to commit a crime warrants further investigation."
Azorius Justiciar.original_text: When Azorius Justiciar enters the battlefield, detain up to two target creatures your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: The two creatures can be controlled by the same opponent or by different opponents.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.

foreign_names.flavor: „Dein Potential zum Begehen einer Straftat bedarf weiterer Nachforschungen."

Eyes in the Skies.name: Eyes in the Skies
Eyes in the Skies.text: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Eyes in the Skies.flavor:
"What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."

Eyes in the Skies.original_text: Put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

Knightly Valor.original_text:
Enchant creature

rulings.text: You need a creature for Knightly Valor to target as you cast it. There’s no way to have it enter the battlefield attached to the Knight token it’ll create.
If the creature this Aura would enchant is an illegal target by the time Knightly Valor tries to resolve, the Aura spell doesn’t resolve. It won’t enter the battlefield, so its ability won’t trigger.

Martial Law.name: Martial Law
Martial Law.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Martial Law.flavor:
"The good of society matters much more than the inconvenience of a few."
—Agmand Sarv, Azorius hussar
Martial Law.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

Palisade Giant.name: Palisade Giant
Palisade Giant.text: All damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control is dealt to Palisade Giant instead.
Palisade Giant.flavor: Refusing guild allegiances, she fights for those who can't protect themselves.
Palisade Giant.original_text: All damage that would be dealt to you or another permanent you control is dealt to Palisade Giant instead.

rulings.text: Applying this redirection effect doesn’t change whether the damage is combat damage.

If you control more than one Palisade Giant, you choose which redirection effect to apply. You can’t divide damage dealt by one source. For example, if an attacking creature would deal 8 damage to you and you control two Palisade Giants, you may have that damage dealt to either of the Palisade Giants. You can’t have 4 damage dealt to each Giant or choose to have the 8 damage dealt to you.

Rest in Peace.name: Rest in Peace
Rest in Peace.text:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
Rest in Peace.flavor: Some corpses the Golgari cannot claim. Some souls the Orzhov cannot shackle.
Rest in Peace.original_text:
When Rest in Peace enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards.
If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

rulings.text: While Rest in Peace is on the battlefield, abilities that trigger whenever a creature dies won’t trigger because cards and tokens are never put into a player’s graveyard.
If Rest in Peace is destroyed by a spell, Rest in Peace will be exiled and then the spell will be put into its owner’s graveyard.

If a card is discarded while Rest in Peace is on the battlefield, abilities that function when a card is discarded (such as madness) still work, even though that card never reaches a graveyard. In addition, spells or abilities that check the characteristics of a discarded card (such as Chandra Ablaze’s first ability) can find that card in exile.

foreign_names.name: In Frieden ruhen
foreign_names.text:

foreign_names.flavor: Es gibt Leichen, auf die die Golgari keinen Anspruch erheben können. Es gibt Seelen, die die Orzhov nicht in Ketten legen können.

Rootborn Defenses.name: Rootborn Defenses
Rootborn Defenses.text: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Rootborn Defenses.original_text: Populate. Creatures you control are indestructible this turn. (To populate, put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy indestructible creatures.)

rulings.text: If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.

Rootborn Defenses affects only creatures you control after populating at the time it resolves. The creature token you create will gain indestructible, but creatures you begin to control later in the turn will not.
