foreign_names.flavor: 拉尼卡子民到現在依然傳頌著索馬拉之役的壯烈事蹟，那時四名瑟雷尼亞哨兵擋住了一整族的古魯戰士。

Seller of Songbirds.name: Seller of Songbirds
Seller of Songbirds.text: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying.
Seller of Songbirds.flavor:
"Lady Wren is the one merchant in Keyhole Downs who isn't running a scam."
—Mirela, Azorius hussar
Seller of Songbirds.original_text: When Seller of Songbirds enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Singvogelhändlerin
foreign_names.text: Wenn die Singvogelhändlerin ins Spiel kommt, bringe einen 1/1 weißen Vogel-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.
foreign_names.flavor: „Die Zaunkönigin ist die einzige Händlerin in der Schlüssellochtiefe, die niemanden betrügt." —Mirela, Azorius-Husarin

foreign_names.name: Vendedora de aves cantoras
foreign_names.text: Cuando la Vendedora de aves cantoras entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Ave blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de volar.
foreign_names.flavor: "La dama Wren es la única comerciante de Bajos de Cerradura que no tima a sus clientes." —Mirela, húsar azoria

foreign_names.name: Marchande de passereaux
foreign_names.text: Quand la Marchande de passereaux arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Oiseau avec le vol.
foreign_names.flavor: « Dame Roitelet est la seule marchande des Collines de la Serrure qui n'arnaque pas trop son monde. » —Mirela, hussarde d'Azorius

foreign_names.name: Venditrice di Uccellini Canori
foreign_names.text: Quando la Venditrice di Uccellini Canori entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Uccello 1/1 bianca con volare.
foreign_names.flavor: "Lady Scricciolo è l'unico mercante onesto delle Serrature Sotterranee." —Mirela, ussara Azorius

foreign_names.name: 歌鳥の売り手
foreign_names.text: 歌鳥の売り手が戦場に出たとき、飛行を持つ白の１/１の鳥・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間
foreign_names.flavor: 「鍵穴市場でインチキ商売をしていないのはレディ・レンただ１人よ。」 ――アゾリウスの騎兵、ミレーラ

foreign_names.name: 명금 상인
foreign_names.text: 명금 상인이 전장에 들어올 때, 비행 능력을 가진 1/1 백색 조류 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "키홀 다운스 시장에서 정직한 상인은 굴뚝새 여사뿐이지." —아조리우스 경기병 미렐라

foreign_names.name: Vendedora de Pássaro Canoro
foreign_names.text: Quando Vendedora de Pássaro Canoro entrar no campo de batalha, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Ave com voar.
foreign_names.flavor: "A Senhora Rouxinol é a única comerciante na Baixa do Buraco da Fechadura cujo negócio não é uma fraude." — Mirela, hussarda azorius

foreign_names.name: Торговка Певчими Птицами
foreign_names.text: Когда Торговка Певчими Птицами выходит на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 1/1 белая Птица с Полетом.
foreign_names.flavor: «Леди Рен — единственная торговка Скважинного Спуска, которая не пытается обманывать». — Мирела, гусар Азориусов

foreign_names.name: 鸣鸟商贩
foreign_names.text: 当鸣鸟商贩进战场时，将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 「伦夫人是锁眼市集里唯一不使诈的商贩。」 ～俄佐立轻骑兵米瑞拉

foreign_names.name: 鳴鳥商販
foreign_names.text: 當鳴鳥商販進戰場時，將一個1/1白色，具飛行異能的鳥衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 「倫夫人是鎖眼市集裡唯一不使詐的商販。」 ～俄佐立輕騎兵米瑞拉

Soul Tithe.name: Soul Tithe
Soul Tithe.text:
Enchant nonland permanent
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player sacrifices it unless they pay {X}, where X is its mana value.
Soul Tithe.original_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted permanent's controller, that player sacrifices it unless he or she pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

rulings.text: The converted mana cost of a creature token is 0, unless that token is a copy of another creature, in which case it copies that creature’s mana cost.
If the permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.

foreign_names.name: Seelenzehnt
foreign_names.text:
Bleibende-Karte-die-kein-Land-ist-Verzauberung
Zu Beginn des Versorgungssegments des Beherrschers der verzauberten bleibenden Karte opfert dieser Spieler sie, falls er nicht {X} bezahlt, wobei X gleich ihren umgewandelten Manakosten ist.

foreign_names.name: Diezmo de almas
foreign_names.text:
Encantar permanente que no sea tierra.
Al comienzo del mantenimiento del controlador del permanente encantado, ese jugador lo sacrifica a menos que pague {X}, donde X es su coste de maná convertido.

foreign_names.name: Dîme d'âme
foreign_names.text:
Enchanter : permanent non-terrain
Au début de l'entretien du contrôleur du permanent enchanté, ce joueur le sacrifie à moins qu'il ne paie {X}, X étant son coût converti de mana.

foreign_names.name: Tassa dell'Anima
foreign_names.text:
Incanta permanente non terra
All'inizio del mantenimento del controllore del permanente incantato, quel giocatore lo sacrifica a meno che lui non paghi {X}, dove X è il suo costo di mana convertito.

foreign_names.name: 魂の税収
foreign_names.text:
エンチャント（土地でないパーマネント）
エンチャントされているパーマネントのコントローラーのアップキープ開始時に、そのプレイヤーが{X}を支払わないかぎり、それを生け贄に捧げる。Ｘはそれの点数で見たマナ・コストに等しい。
foreign_names.type: エンチャント — オーラ

foreign_names.name: 영혼세
foreign_names.text:
대지가 아닌 지속물에 부여
부여된 지속물의 조종자의 유지단 시작에, 그 플레이어는 {X}를 지불하지 않으면 그 지속물을 희생한다. X는 그 지속물의 전환마나비용이다.

foreign_names.name: Dízimo da Alma
foreign_names.text:
Encantar permanente que não seja terreno
No início da manutenção do controlador da permanente encantada, aquele jogador a sacrifica a menos que pague {X}, sendo X igual ao seu custo de mana convertido.

foreign_names.name: Часть Души
foreign_names.text:
Зачаровать не являющийся землей перманент
В начале шага поддержки игрока, контролирующего зачарованный перманент, тот игрок приносит его в жертву, если только не заплатит {X}, где X — его конвертированная мана-стоимость.

foreign_names.name: 灵魂什一税
foreign_names.text:
结附于非地永久物
在所结附的永久物之操控者的维持开始时，除非该牌手支付{X}，否则他牺牲该永久物，X为其总法术力费用。

foreign_names.name: 靈魂什一稅
foreign_names.text:
結附於非地永久物
在所結附的永久物之操控者的維持開始時，除非該玩家支付{X}，否則他犧牲該永久物，X為其總魔法力費用。

Sphere of Safety.name: Sphere of Safety
Sphere of Safety.text: Creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.
Sphere of Safety.flavor: The Rakdos believe that all are eager to join their revels, even when told otherwise.
Sphere of Safety.original_text: Creatures can't attack you or a planeswalker you control unless their controller pays {X} for each of those creatures, where X is the number of enchantments you control.

rulings.text: If you control Sphere of Safety, your opponents can choose not to attack with a creature with an ability that says it attacks if able.

foreign_names.name: Sicherheitssphäre
foreign_names.text: Kreaturen können dich oder einen Planeswalker, den du kontrollierst, nicht angreifen, falls ihr Beherrscher nicht für jede dieser Kreaturen {X} bezahlt, wobei X die Anzahl an Verzauberungen ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: Die Rakdos sind überzeugt, dass alle auf ihre Orgien versessen sind, selbst wenn man das Gegenteil behauptet.

foreign_names.name: Esfera de seguridad
foreign_names.text: Las criaturas no pueden atacarte a ti ni a un planeswalker que controlas a menos que su controlador pague {X} por cada una de esas criaturas, donde X es el número de encantamientos que controlas.
foreign_names.flavor: Los rakdos creen que todos están ansiosos por unirse a sus festejos, incluso cuando alguien lo niega.

foreign_names.name: Sphère de sécurité
foreign_names.text: Les créatures ne peuvent pas vous attaquer ou attaquer un planeswalker que vous contrôlez à moins que leur contrôleur ne paie {X} pour chacune de ces créatures, X étant le nombre d'enchantements que vous contrôlez.
foreign_names.flavor: Les Rakdos sont convaincus que tout le monde rêve de prendre part à leurs festivités, même quand on leur affirme le contraire.

foreign_names.name: Sfera della Sicurezza
foreign_names.text: Le creature non possono attaccare te o un planeswalker che controlli a meno che il loro controllore non paghi {X} per ciascuna di quelle creature, dove X è pari al numero di incantesimi che controlli.
foreign_names.flavor: Anche se rassicurati del contrario, i Rakdos pensano che tutti siano ansiosi di partecipare alle loro gozzoviglie.

foreign_names.name: 安全の領域
foreign_names.text: クリーチャーは、そのコントローラーが攻撃クリーチャーにつき{X}を支払わない限り、あなたやあなたがコントロールするプレインズウォーカーを攻撃できない。Ｘはあなたがコントロールするエンチャントの総数に等しい。
foreign_names.flavor: ラクドス教徒は誰もが彼らの乱痴気騒ぎに参加したがっていると信じている。たとえそうではないと告げられても、である。

foreign_names.name: 안전의 구체
foreign_names.text: 각 생물에 대해 그 생물의 조종자가 {X}를 지불하지 않는 한, 생물들은 당신 또는 당신이 조종하는 플레인즈워커를 공격할 수 없다. X는 당신이 조종하는 부여마법의 수다.
foreign_names.flavor: 락도스 길드원들은 모두가 말로는 싫다고 해도 실은 그들의 광란에 참여하고 싶어 한다고 믿는다.

foreign_names.name: Esfera de Segurança
foreign_names.text: As criaturas não podem atacar você nem um planeswalker que você controle a menos que seu controlador pague {X} para cada uma das criaturas, sendo X igual ao número de encantamentos que você controla.
foreign_names.flavor: Os Rakdos acreditam que todos estão ansiosos para participar de suas celebrações, mesmo quando são informados do contrário.

foreign_names.name: Сфера Безопасности
foreign_names.text: Существа не могут атаковать вас или planeswalker-а под вашим контролем, если только контролирующий их игрок не заплатит {X} за каждое из тех существ, где X — количество чар под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor: Ракдосы верят, что каждый мечтает присоединиться к их пирушкам, даже если им говорят обратное.

foreign_names.name: 安全球罩
foreign_names.text: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{X}，否则它不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客，X为由你操控的结界之数量。
foreign_names.flavor: 拉铎司教派相信所有人都渴望加入其欢宴，就算口头拒绝者也只是言不由衷。

foreign_names.name: 安全球罩
foreign_names.text: 對每個生物而言，除非其操控者為其支付{X}，否則它不能攻擊你或由你操控的鵬洛客，X為由你操控的結界之數量。
foreign_names.flavor: 拉鐸司教派相信所有人都渴望加入其歡宴，就算口頭拒絕者也只是言不由衷。

Sunspire Griffin.name: Sunspire Griffin
Sunspire Griffin.flavor:
"For each griffin wounded by an arrow, there's a corpse with a bow nearby."
—Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

foreign_names.name: Sonnenspitzen-Greif
foreign_names.text: Fliegend
foreign_names.flavor: „Für jeden Greif, der durch einen Pfeil verwundet wird, liegt in der Nähe eine Leiche mit einem Bogen in der Hand." —Pel Javya, Wojek-Ermittler

foreign_names.name: Grifo de Chapitel Solar
foreign_names.text: Vuela.
foreign_names.flavor: "Por cada grifo al que hiere una flecha hay un cadáver con un arco cerca." —Pel-Javya, investigador wojek

foreign_names.name: Griffon de la Tour de Phébus
foreign_names.text: Vol
foreign_names.flavor: « Pour chaque griffon blessé par une flèche, on trouve un cadavre armé d'un arc. » —Pel Javya, enquêteur wojek

foreign_names.name: Grifone di Guglia Solare
foreign_names.text: Volare
foreign_names.flavor: "Per ogni grifone ferito da una freccia, c'è un cadavere con accanto un arco." —Pel Javya, investigatore Wojek

foreign_names.name: 太陽塔のグリフィン
foreign_names.text: 飛行
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — グリフィン
foreign_names.flavor: 「矢傷を受けたグリフィンが１体いれば、その近くには弓を持った死体が１つ転がっている。」 ――ウォジェクの調査官、ペール・ジャヴァ

foreign_names.name: 태양첨탑 그리핀
foreign_names.text: 비행
foreign_names.flavor: "그리핀 한 마리가 화살에 부상당할 때마다 활을 가진 시체 하나가 근처에서 발견된다." —워젝 수사관 펠 자브야

foreign_names.name: Grifo da Espiral Solar
foreign_names.text: Voar
foreign_names.flavor: "Para cada grifo ferido por uma flecha, há um cadáver com um arco por perto." — Pel Javya, investigador Wojek

foreign_names.name: Грифон Солнечных Шпилей
foreign_names.text: Полет
foreign_names.flavor: «Труп лучника гниет рядом с каждым местом, где стрела попала в грифона». — Пел Джавия, дознаватель Войеков

foreign_names.name: 日旋狮鹫
foreign_names.text: 飞行
foreign_names.flavor: 「只要有受到箭伤的狮鹫，附近就会有伴弓的尸骸。」 ～沃耶克调查员佩贾亚

foreign_names.name: 日旋獅鷲
foreign_names.text: 飛行
foreign_names.flavor: 「只要有受到箭傷的獅鷲，附近就會有伴弓的屍骸。」 ～沃耶克偵查員佩賈亞

Swift Justice.name: Swift Justice
Swift Justice.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.
Swift Justice.flavor:
"Having conviction is more important than being righteous."
—Aurelia
Swift Justice.original_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike and lifelink.

foreign_names.name: Schnell geübte Gerechtigkeit
foreign_names.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl +1/+0, Erstschlag und Lebensverknüpfung.
foreign_names.flavor: „Überzeugung zu haben ist wichtiger als rechtschaffen zu sein." —Aurelia

foreign_names.name: Justicia rápida
foreign_names.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo obtiene +1/+0 y gana las habilidades de dañar primero y vínculo vital.
foreign_names.flavor: "Tener convicciones es más importante que ser justo." —Aurelia

foreign_names.name: Justice expéditive
foreign_names.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la créature ciblée gagne +1/+0 et elle acquiert l'initiative et le lien de vie.
foreign_names.flavor: « Avoir de la conviction est plus important qu'être vertueux. » —Aurélia

foreign_names.name: Giustizia Rapida
foreign_names.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio prende +1/+0 e ha attacco improvviso e legame vitale.
foreign_names.flavor: "Avere delle certezze è più importante che essere onesti." —Aurelia

foreign_names.name: 素早い正義
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー1体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは＋１/＋０の修整を受けるとともに先制攻撃と絆魂を持つ。
foreign_names.flavor: 「信念を持つことは高潔であることよりも大切ですわ。」 ――オレリア

foreign_names.name: 신속한 정의
foreign_names.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +1/+0을 받고 선제공격과 생명연결 능력을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "신념을 가지는 것이 정의로운 것보다 중요하다." —아우렐리아

foreign_names.name: Justiça Veloz
foreign_names.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo recebe +1/+0 e ganha iniciativa e vínculo com a vida.
foreign_names.flavor: "Ter convicção é mais importante do que ser correto." — Aurelia

foreign_names.name: Быстрое Правосудие
foreign_names.text: До конца хода целевое существо получает +1/+0, Первый удар и Цепь жизни.
foreign_names.flavor: «Иметь убеждения важнее, чем вести безупречную жизнь». — Аурелия

foreign_names.name: 正义迅彰
foreign_names.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+0且获得先攻与系命异能。
foreign_names.flavor: 「抱持信念比胸怀正气更重要。」 ～奥瑞莉雅

foreign_names.name: 正義迅彰
foreign_names.text: 直到回合結束，目標生物得+1/+0且獲得先攻與繫命異能。
foreign_names.flavor: 「抱持信念比胸懷正氣更重要。」 ～奧瑞莉雅

Trained Caracal.name: Trained Caracal
Trained Caracal.text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Trained Caracal.flavor: Some Ravnicans consider carrying a sword to be beneath them, preferring instead a tooth-and-claw escort.
Trained Caracal.original_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

foreign_names.name: Gezähmtes Caracal
foreign_names.text: Lebensverknüpfung (Schaden, der von dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, lässt dich ebenso viele Lebenspunkte dazuerhalten.)
foreign_names.flavor: Manche Ravnicaner halten es für unter ihrer Würde, ein Schwert zu tragen, und ziehen stattdessen eine mit Zähnen und Klauen bewaffnete Eskorte vor.

foreign_names.name: Lince adiestrado
foreign_names.text: Vínculo vital. (El daño hecho por esta criatura también hace que ganes esa misma cantidad de vidas.)
foreign_names.flavor: Algunos habitantes de Rávnica se consideran demasiado dignos para llevar una espada, por lo que en su lugar prefieren una escolta con colmillos y dientes.

foreign_names.name: Caracal dressé
foreign_names.text: Lien de vie (Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)
foreign_names.flavor: Certains Ravnicans considèrent comme infamant de porter l'épée et lui préfèrent une escorte griffue.

foreign_names.name: Lince Addestrata
foreign_names.text: Legame vitale (Il danno inflitto da questa creatura ti fa anche guadagnare altrettanti punti vita.)
foreign_names.flavor: Certi abitanti di Ravnica considerano umiliante portare la spada e preferiscono una scorta fornita di denti e artigli.

foreign_names.name: 訓練されたカラカル
foreign_names.text: 絆魂（このクリーチャーがダメージを与える場合、さらにあなたはその点数分のライフを得る。）
foreign_names.flavor: 一部のラヴニカ人は、剣を佩くのは品位に欠けると考えており、牙と爪をもった従者のほうを好んでいる。

foreign_names.name: 훈련된 카라칼
foreign_names.text: 생명연결 (이 생물이 피해를 입히면, 당신은 그 피해만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.)
foreign_names.flavor: 일부 라브니카 시민들은 검을 지니고 다니는 것을 수치스럽게 여기며, 대신에 이빨과 발톱으로 호위받는 것을 선호한다.

foreign_names.name: Caracal Treinado
foreign_names.text: Vínculo com a vida (O dano causado por esta criatura faz com que você ganhe uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.)
foreign_names.flavor: Para alguns ravnicanos, carregar uma espada é um insulto, eles preferem uma escolta com presas e garras.

foreign_names.name: Дрессированный Каракал
foreign_names.text: Цепь жизни (Повреждения, наносимые этим существом, также заставляют вас получить такое же количество жизней.)
foreign_names.flavor: Некоторые обитатели Равники считают неподобающим ходить с мечом, предпочитая вместо него клыки и зубы.

foreign_names.name: 驯良狞猫
foreign_names.text: 系命（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）
foreign_names.flavor: 有些拉尼卡的子民认为配剑有失身份，宁愿带着獠牙利爪的护卫。

foreign_names.name: 馴良獰貓
foreign_names.text: 繫命（此生物所造成的傷害會讓你獲得等量的生命。）
foreign_names.flavor: 有些拉尼卡的子民認為配劍有失身份，寧願帶著獠牙利爪的護衛。

Trostani's Judgment.name: Trostani's Judgment
Trostani's Judgment.text: Exile target creature, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Trostani's Judgment.flavor:
"Some cannot be saved as they are, but all can serve the Worldsoul."
—Trostani
Trostani's Judgment.original_text: Exile target creature, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: If you choose a creature token you control as the target, it will be exiled before you populate and you won’t be able to choose that creature to copy.

You must target a creature to cast Trostani’s Judgment. If that creature is an illegal target when Trostani’s Judgment tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t populate.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.

You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Trostanis Abrechnung
foreign_names.text: Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ins Exil und führe dann Bevölkern durch. (Bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Kreaturenspielsteins ist, den du kontrollierst.)
foreign_names.flavor: „Nicht alle können in ihrer derzeitigen Gestalt gerettet werden, aber alle können der Weltenseele dienen." —Trostani

foreign_names.name: Juicio de Trostani
foreign_names.text: Exilia a la criatura objetivo, luego repuebla. (Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de una ficha de criatura que controlas.)
foreign_names.flavor: "A algunos ya no se les puede salvar, pero todos pueden servir al Alma del mundo." —Trostani

foreign_names.name: Jugement selon Trostani
foreign_names.text: Exilez la créature ciblée, puis peuplez. (Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un jeton de créature que vous contrôlez.)
foreign_names.flavor: « À défaut d'être sauvés tels qu'ils sont, certains peuvent servir l'Âme du monde. » —Trostani

foreign_names.name: Sentenza di Trostani
foreign_names.text: Esilia una creatura bersaglio, poi popola. (Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di una pedina creatura che controlli.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Alcuni non possono essere salvati nello stato in cui si trovano, ma tutti possono servire l'Anima del Mondo." —Trostani

foreign_names.name: トロスターニの裁き
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを追放する。その後居住を行う。（あなたがコントロールするクリーチャー・トークン１体のコピーであるトークンを１体戦場に出す。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「そのままでは救いを与えられない者もいます。しかし世界魂には誰しもが奉仕できるのです。」 ――トロスターニ

foreign_names.name: 트로스타니의 심판
foreign_names.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 추방한 후, 소집한다. (당신이 조종하는 어느 생물 토큰의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.)
foreign_names.flavor: "현재 상태로는 구원을 받을 수 없는 자도 세계의 영혼을 섬길 수 있다." —트로스타니

foreign_names.name: Julgamento de Trostani
foreign_names.text: Exile a criatura alvo e depois povoe. (Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia de uma ficha de criatura que você controla.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Alguns não podem ser salvos em seu estado atual, mas todos podem servir à Grande Anima." — Trostani

foreign_names.name: Суд Тростани
foreign_names.text: Изгоните целевое существо, затем используйте Заселение. (Положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией фишки существа под вашим контролем.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Не все останутся собой, но все смогут послужить Всесознанию». — Тростани

foreign_names.name: 卓塔妮的判决
foreign_names.text: 放逐目标生物，然后殖民。（将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「有些人已无可救药，但人人都能服侍世界之魂。」 ～卓塔妮

foreign_names.name: 卓塔妮的判決
foreign_names.text: 放逐目標生物，然後殖民。（將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為由你操控的某衍生生物之複製品。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「有些人已無可救藥，但人人都能服侍世界之魂。」 ～卓塔妮

Aquus Steed.name: Aquus Steed
Aquus Steed.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
Aquus Steed.flavor: In water, it's as graceful as a dolphin. On land, it darts and jerks so unpredictably that few can ride it for long.
Aquus Steed.original_text: {2}{U}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

foreign_names.name: Aquagaul
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält -2/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreign_names.flavor: Im Wasser bewegt er sich elegant wie ein Delfin. Doch an Land ist sein Gang so ruckartig und unberechenbar, dass nur wenige Reiter sich lange auf ihm halten können.

foreign_names.name: Corcel aquus
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}: La criatura objetivo obtiene -2/-0 hasta el final del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: En el agua, es tan grácil como un delfín. En tierra, da unos tirones y sacudidas tan impredecibles que pocos pueden montarlo durante mucho tiempo.

foreign_names.name: Destrier aquus
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T} : La créature ciblée gagne -2/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreign_names.flavor: Dans l'eau, il a la grâce d'un dauphin. Sur la terre ferme, il piaffe et bondit de façon si imprévisible que peu tiennent longtemps en selle.

foreign_names.name: Destriero Aquino
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}: Una creatura bersaglio prende -2/-0 fino alla fine del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Nell'acqua ha la grazia di un delfino. Sulla terra scatta e sobbalza in modo così imprevedibile che pochi riescono a cavalcarlo a lungo.

foreign_names.name: 水馬
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－２/－０の修整を受ける。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreign_names.flavor: 水中にあってはイルカのごとく優雅である。しかし地上ではまったく予測不可能な方向へ飛び跳ねるため、長時間乗っていられる者は少ない。

foreign_names.name: 아쿠스 준마
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -2/-0을 받는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 물속에서는 돌고래만큼 우아하지만, 육지에서는 제멋대로 날뛰어서 오래 탈 수 있는 자가 거의 없다.

foreign_names.name: Corcel Aquus
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}: A criatura alvo recebe -2/-0 até o final do turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Na água, ele é gracioso como um golfinho. Na terra, ele dispara e se sacode de forma tão imprevisível que poucos conseguem montá-lo por muito tempo.

foreign_names.name: Жеребец Аквус
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}, {T}: целевое существо получает -2/-0 до конца хода.
foreign_names.flavor: В воде он проворен как дельфин. На суше его движения настолько быстры и непредсказуемы, что мало кто сможет усидеть на его спине.

foreign_names.name: 水驹
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}，{T}：目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。
foreign_names.flavor: 在水里，他如同海豚一般优雅。在陆地，他的脾性古怪，少有人能驾驭。

foreign_names.name: 水駒
foreign_names.text: {2}{U}，{T}：目標生物得-2/-0直到回合結束。
foreign_names.flavor: 在水裡，牠如同海豚一般優雅。在陸地，牠的脾性古怪，少有人能駕馭。

Blustersquall.name: Blustersquall
Blustersquall.text:
Tap target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Blustersquall.flavor: Weather is more predictable than the Izzet.
Blustersquall.original_text:
Tap target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

foreign_names.name: Brausende Böe
foreign_names.text:
Tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst.
Überlast {3}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauber für seine Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)
foreign_names.flavor: Beim Wetter weiß man eher als bei den Izzet, woran man ist.

foreign_names.name: Bramarráfaga
foreign_names.text:
Gira la criatura objetivo que no controlas.
Sobrecarga {3}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "la criatura objetivo" por "cada criatura".)
foreign_names.flavor: El clima es más predecible que los ízzet.

foreign_names.name: Forte bourrasque
foreign_names.text:
Engagez une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas.
Surcharge {3}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)
foreign_names.flavor: Les intempéries sont plus prévisibles que les Izzet.

foreign_names.name: Turbinante
foreign_names.text:
TAPpa una creatura bersaglio che non controlli.
Sovraccarico {3}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "una creatura bersaglio" con "ogni creatura".)
foreign_names.flavor: È più facile predire il tempo che non gli Izzet.

foreign_names.name: 暴突風
foreign_names.text:
あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。
超過 {3}{U} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない各クリーチャーをそれぞれタップする。）
foreign_names.flavor: イゼットよりは天気の方が読みやすい。

foreign_names.name: 강력돌풍
foreign_names.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다.
과부하 {3}{U} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 각 생물을 탭한다"로 내용이 변한다.)
foreign_names.flavor: 이젯 길드의 행동을 예측하는 건 날씨를 예측하는 것보다도 어렵다.

foreign_names.name: Rajada Tempestuosa
foreign_names.text:
Vire a criatura alvo que você não controla.
Sobrecarga {3}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "a criatura alvo" por "cada criatura".)
foreign_names.flavor: O clima é mais previsível do que os Izzet.

foreign_names.name: Шквальный Удар
foreign_names.text:
Поверните целевое существо не под вашим контролем.
Перегрузка {3}{U} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)
foreign_names.flavor: Проще предсказывать погоду, чем поступки Иззетов.

foreign_names.name: 压制风
foreign_names.text:
横置目标不由你操控的生物。
超载{3}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）
foreign_names.flavor: 预测气候比预测伊捷容易。

foreign_names.name: 壓制風
foreign_names.text:
橫置目標不由你操控的生物。
超載{3}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）
foreign_names.flavor: 預測氣候比預測伊捷容易。

Cancel.name: Cancel
Cancel.flavor:
"It is forbidden. Asking why is irrelevant."
—Sergiu, Opal Lake magistrate

foreign_names.name: Abbrechen
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor: „Es ist verboten. Die Frage nach dem Warum ist irrelevant." —Sergiu, Opalsee-Magistrat

foreign_names.name: Deshacer
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Está prohibido. El por qué es irrelevante." —Sergiu, magistrado del Lago Ópalo

foreign_names.name: Révocation
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé.
foreign_names.flavor: « C'est interdit. Inutile de demander pourquoi. » —Sergiu, magistrat du Lac d'opale

foreign_names.name: Eliminare
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor: "È proibito. Chiedere perché è irrilevante." —Sergiu, magistrato del Lago Opale

foreign_names.name: 取り消し
foreign_names.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreign_names.flavor: 「それは禁止だ。理由を訊いてどうする。」 ――オパール湖の行政官、サージョ

foreign_names.name: 주문 취소
foreign_names.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreign_names.flavor: "금지 사항이다. 이유를 묻는 건 부질없는 짓이다." —오팔 호수의 치안 판사 세르지우

foreign_names.name: Cancelar
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica alvo.
foreign_names.flavor: "É proibido. Perguntar o porquê é irrelevante." — Sergiu, magistrado do Lago de Opala

foreign_names.name: Отмена
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое заклинание.
foreign_names.flavor: «Это запрещено. Нет смысла узнавать причины». — Сержиу, магистрат Опалового озера

foreign_names.name: 取消
foreign_names.text: 反击目标咒语。
foreign_names.flavor: 「这不被允许。不需要问为什么。」 ～清辉湖执政官瑟久

foreign_names.name: 取消
foreign_names.text: 反擊目標咒語。
foreign_names.flavor: 「這不被允許。不需要問為什麼。」 ～清輝湖執政官瑟久

Chronic Flooding.name: Chronic Flooding
Chronic Flooding.text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller mills three cards.
Chronic Flooding.flavor: With the Izzet occupied elsewhere, many of their public works fell into disrepair.
Chronic Flooding.original_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: Chronic Flooding’s ability will trigger whenever the enchanted land becomes tapped for any reason, not just because its controller taps it for mana.
Chronic Flooding becoming attached to a tapped land won’t cause its ability to immediately trigger. That land must go from untapped to tapped.

foreign_names.name: Chronische Überflutung
foreign_names.text:
Landverzauberung
Immer wenn das verzauberte Land getappt wird, legt sein Beherrscher die obersten drei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreign_names.flavor: Während die Izzet anderweitig beschäftigt waren, verfielen viele ihrer öffentlichen Baustellen.

foreign_names.name: Inundación crónica
foreign_names.text:
Encantar tierra.
Siempre que la tierra encantada sea girada, su controlador pone las tres primeras cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreign_names.flavor: Con los ízzet ocupados en otros lugares, muchas de sus obras públicas se deterioraron.

foreign_names.name: Inondations chroniques
foreign_names.text:
Enchanter : terrain
À chaque fois que le terrain enchanté devient engagé, son contrôleur met les trois cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: Les Izzet étant occupés ailleurs, bon nombre de leurs ouvrages publics commençaient à tomber en ruines.

foreign_names.name: Inondazione Cronica
foreign_names.text:
Incanta terra
Ogniqualvolta la terra incantata viene TAPpata, il suo controllore mette le prime tre carte del suo grimorio nel suo cimitero.
foreign_names.flavor: Con gli Izzet occupati altrove, molte delle loro opere pubbliche caddero in rovina.

foreign_names.name: 慢性的な水害
foreign_names.text:
エンチャント（土地）
エンチャントされている土地がタップ状態になるたび、それのコントローラーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreign_names.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreign_names.flavor: イゼット団が別件にかまっている間に、彼らの公共施設の多くが荒廃してしまった。

foreign_names.name: 계속되는 홍수
foreign_names.text:
대지에게 부여
부여된 대지가 탭될 때마다, 그 대지의 조종자는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 이젯 길드가 다른 일에 집중하는 사이, 그들의 공공 사업 중 상당수가 방치되었다.

foreign_names.name: Alagamento Crônico
foreign_names.text:
Encantar terreno
Toda vez que o terreno encantado é virado, seu controlador coloca os três cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: Com os Izzet ocupados em outro lugar, muitas de suas obras públicas ficaram sem manutenção.

foreign_names.name: Длительное Затопление
foreign_names.text:
Зачаровать землю
Каждый раз, когда зачарованная земля становится повернутой, контролирующий ее игрок кладет три верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: Пока Иззеты были заняты другими делами, многие возведенные ими общественные сооружения приходили в упадок.

foreign_names.name: 长期水患
foreign_names.text:
结附于地
每当所结附的地成为横置时，其操控者将其牌库顶的三张牌置入其坟墓场。
foreign_names.flavor: 由于伊捷正忙于其他事务，许多公共建设面临失修。

foreign_names.name: 長期水患
foreign_names.text:
結附於地
每當所結附的地成為橫置時，其操控者將其牌庫頂的三張牌置入其墳墓場。
foreign_names.flavor: 由於伊捷正忙於其他事務，許多公共建設面臨失修。

Conjured Currency.name: Conjured Currency
Conjured Currency.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.
Conjured Currency.flavor: A bargain in Keyhole Downs is always too good to be true.
Conjured Currency.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange control of Conjured Currency and target permanent you neither own nor control.

rulings.text: The only legal target for Conjured Currency’s ability is a permanent both owned and controlled by another player, although it doesn’t have to be the same player. For example, a permanent owned by an opponent but controlled by your teammate (or another opponent) could be chosen as the target.

The exchange occurs only if Conjured Currency and the target permanent are both on the battlefield and controlled by different players when the ability resolves. In addition, the target permanent must be one you neither own nor control. If any of these things aren’t true when the ability tries to resolve, the exchange won’t happen and neither permanent will change controllers.

You don’t necessarily have to control Conjured Currency when its ability resolves in order for the exchange to happen. If another player has gained control of Conjured Currency while the ability is on the stack, and a third player controls the target (and you don’t own it), you may choose to have those two players exchange control of the relevant permanents.

foreign_names.name: Gezaubertes Geld
foreign_names.text: Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du die Kontrolle über das Gezauberte Geld und eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die du weder besitzt noch kontrollierst, tauschen.
foreign_names.flavor: Ein gutes Geschäft in der Schlüssellochtiefe ist immer zu schön, um wahr zu sein.

foreign_names.name: Monedas evocadas
foreign_names.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes intercambiar el control de Monedas evocadas y el permanente objetivo que no controlas y del cual no eres propietario.
foreign_names.flavor: Una ganga en Bajos de Cerradura siempre es demasiado buena para ser cierta.

foreign_names.name: Monnaie conjurée
foreign_names.text: Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez échanger le contrôle de la Monnaie conjurée contre celui d'un permanent ciblé que vous ne possédez pas et ne contrôlez pas.
foreign_names.flavor: Un bon plan aux Collines de la Serrure est invariablement trop beau pour être vrai.

foreign_names.name: Moneta Evocata
foreign_names.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi scambiare il controllo della Moneta Evocata e di un permanente bersaglio di cui non sei né proprietario né controllore.
foreign_names.flavor: Un buon affare nelle Serrature Sotterranee è sempre troppo buono per essere vero.

foreign_names.name: 妖術による金
foreign_names.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたがオーナーでもコントローラーでもないパーマネント１つを対象とする。あなたはそれと妖術による金とのコントロールを交換してもよい。
foreign_names.flavor: 鍵穴市場にあるお買い得品は、「うますぎる話」だと思って間違いない。

foreign_names.name: 마술로 만들어낸 화폐
foreign_names.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신이 소유하지도 조종하지도 않는 지속물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 당신은 그 지속물과 마술로 만들어낸 화폐의 조종권을 교환할 수 있다.
foreign_names.flavor: 키홀 다운스 시장의 가격은 언제나 믿을 수 없을 만큼 싸다.

foreign_names.name: Moeda Conjurada
foreign_names.text: No início de sua manutenção, você pode permutar o controle de Moeda Conjurada pelo da permanente alvo que você não possua nem controle.
foreign_names.flavor: Uma barganha na Baixa do Buraco da Fechadura é sempre boa demais para ser verdade.

foreign_names.name: Волшебные Деньги
foreign_names.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки вы можете поменяться контролем над Волшебными Деньгами и целевым перманентом, владельцем которого вы не являетесь и который не находится под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor: Сделки в Скважинном Спуске слишком удачны, чтобы быть честными.

foreign_names.name: 变出货币
foreign_names.text: 在你的维持开始时，你可以交换变出货币和目标永久物的操控权，且后者须不由你拥有也不由你操控。
foreign_names.flavor: 锁眼市集的折扣通常暗藏玄机。

foreign_names.name: 變出貨幣
foreign_names.text: 在你的維持開始時，你可以交換變出貨幣和目標永久物的操控權，且後者須不由你擁有也不由你操控。
foreign_names.flavor: 鎖眼市集的折扣通常暗藏玄機。

Crosstown Courier.name: Crosstown Courier
Crosstown Courier.text: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player mills that many cards.
Crosstown Courier.flavor: Information travels quickly through Ravnica's network of messengers and thought agents.
Crosstown Courier.original_text: Whenever Crosstown Courier deals combat damage to a player, that player puts that many cards from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

foreign_names.name: Stadtquerender Kurier
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn der Stadtquerende Kurier einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, legt dieser Spieler entsprechend viele Karten oben von seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreign_names.flavor: Neuigkeiten verbreiten sich rasch über Ravnicas Netzwerk von Boten und Gedankenagenten.

foreign_names.name: Mensajero transurbano
foreign_names.text: Siempre que el Mensajero transurbano haga daño de combate a un jugador, ese jugador pone esa misma cantidad de cartas de la parte superior de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreign_names.flavor: La información viaja velozmente a través de la red de mensajeros y agentes del pensamiento de Rávnica.

foreign_names.name: Messager interville
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois que le Messager interville inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, ce joueur met autant de cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: Les informations circulent vite sur Ravnica, grâce à son réseau de messagers et d'agents des pensées.

foreign_names.name: Corriere che Attraversa la Città
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta il Corriere che Attraversa la Città infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, quel giocatore mette nel suo cimitero altrettante carte dalla cima del suo grimorio.
foreign_names.flavor: Le informazioni viaggiano veloci attraverso la rete di messaggeri e agenti mentali di Ravnica.

foreign_names.name: 都市内の急使
foreign_names.text: 都市内の急使がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、そのプレイヤーはその点数に等しい枚数のカードを自分のライブラリーの一番上から自分の墓地に置く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン
foreign_names.flavor: ラヴニカでは各地に散らばる伝令や思想工作員を通じて情報が瞬く間に広まっていく。

foreign_names.name: 도시를 가로지르는 전령
foreign_names.text: 도시를 가로지르는 전령이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위에서 그만큼의 카드를 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 라브니카의 모든 정보는 전령과 생각 요원을 통해 빠르게 전달된다.

foreign_names.name: Mensageiro Transurbano
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que Mensageiro Transurbano causa dano de combate a um jogador, aquele jogador coloca uma quantidade equivalente de cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: A informação viaja rápido pela rede de mensageiros e agentes do pensamento de Ravnica.

foreign_names.name: Городской Посыльный
foreign_names.text: Каждый раз, когда Городской Посыльный наносит боевые повреждения игроку, тот игрок кладет такое же количество карт с верха своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: Информация быстро расходится по Равнике при помощи сети посыльных и телепатов.

foreign_names.name: 跨镇讯使
foreign_names.text: 每当跨镇讯使对一位牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手将其牌库顶等量的牌置入其坟墓场。
foreign_names.flavor: 拜信驿网络以及密探之赐，拉尼卡的消息传送非常迅速。

foreign_names.name: 跨鎮訊使
foreign_names.text: 每當跨鎮訊使對一位玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，該玩家將其牌庫頂等量的牌置入其墳墓場。
foreign_names.flavor: 拜信驛網絡以及密探之賜，拉尼卡的消息傳送非常迅速。

Cyclonic Rift.name: Cyclonic Rift
Cyclonic Rift.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Cyclonic Rift.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
Cyclonic Rift.original_text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

foreign_names.name: Rift des Sturmtiefs
foreign_names.text:
Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die du nicht kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
Überlast {6}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauber für seine Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)
foreign_names.flavor: Die Izzet sind auf unnatürliche Katastrophen spezialisiert.

foreign_names.name: Grieta ciclónica
foreign_names.text:
Regresa el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que no controles a la mano de su propietario.
Sobrecarga {6}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "el permanente objetivo" por "cada permanente".)
foreign_names.flavor: Los ízzet se especializan en desastres no naturales.

foreign_names.name: Faille cyclonique
foreign_names.text:
Renvoyez un permanent non-terrain ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas dans la main de son propriétaire.
Surcharge {6}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)
foreign_names.flavor: Les Izzet sont spécialisés dans les catastrophes artificielles.

foreign_names.name: Squarcio Ciclonico
foreign_names.text:
Fai tornare un permanente non terra bersaglio che non controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
Sovraccarico {6}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "un permanente non terra bersaglio" con "ogni permanente non terra".)
foreign_names.flavor: Gli Izzet sono specializzati in catastrofi innaturali.

foreign_names.name: サイクロンの裂け目
foreign_names.text:
あなたがコントロールしていない土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。
超過 {6}{U} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない土地でない各パーマネントをそれぞれオーナーの手札に戻す。）
foreign_names.flavor: イゼット団は不自然災害を専門としている。

foreign_names.name: 회오리 균열
foreign_names.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 지속물 중 대지가 아닌 지속물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
과부하 {6}{U} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 지속물 중 대지가 아닌 각 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다"로 내용이 변한다.)
foreign_names.flavor: 이젯 길드의 특기는 부자연스러운 재해다.

foreign_names.name: Fenda Ciclônica
foreign_names.text:
Devolva a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno e que você não controle para a mão de seu dono.
Sobrecarga {6}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "a permanente alvo" por "cada permanente".)
foreign_names.flavor: A especialidade dos Izzet são os desastres não naturais.

foreign_names.name: Циклонический Разлом
foreign_names.text:
Верните целевой не являющийся землей перманент, который не находится под вашим контролем, в руку его владельца.
Перегрузка {6}{U}(Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)
foreign_names.flavor: Иззеты являются мастерами неприродных катастроф.

foreign_names.name: 龙卷裂空
foreign_names.text:
将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）
foreign_names.flavor: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

foreign_names.name: 龍卷裂空
foreign_names.text:
將目標不由你操控的非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。
超載{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）
foreign_names.flavor: 伊捷以非天然災害為業。

Dispel.name: Dispel
Dispel.flavor:
"Civilization will subsume us unless we overwhelm it instead."
—Speaker Zegana

foreign_names.name: Bannzauber
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Spontanzauber deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor: „Die Zivilisation wird uns eingliedern, falls wir sie nicht überwältigen." —Sprecherin Zegana

foreign_names.name: Esfumar
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo instantáneo objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor: "La civilización nos subsumirá a menos que nosotros la aplastemos primero." —Portavoz Zegana

foreign_names.name: Dispersement
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort d'éphémère ciblé.
foreign_names.flavor: « Si nous ne la submergeons pas les premiers, la civilisation nous absorbera. » —Oratrice Zegana

foreign_names.name: Sfatare
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia istantaneo bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor: "La civiltà ci ingloberà a meno che non siamo noi a sopraffarla." —Oratrice Zegana

foreign_names.name: 払拭
foreign_names.text: インスタント呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreign_names.flavor: 「もし我々が文明を圧倒しなければ、文明が我々を取り込んでしまうだろう。」 ――話し手ゼガーナ

foreign_names.name: 주문해제
foreign_names.text: 순간마법 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreign_names.flavor: "우리가 문명을 압도해버리지 않으면 문명이 우리를 집어삼킬 것이오." —연설자 제가나

foreign_names.name: Delir
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica instantânea alvo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Se não oprimirmos a civilização, ela irá nos assimilar." — Oradora Zegana

foreign_names.name: Рассеять
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое мгновенное заклинание.
foreign_names.flavor: «Цивилизация подчинит нас, если мы первыми не сокрушим ее». — спикер Зегана

foreign_names.name: 云散
foreign_names.text: 反击目标瞬间咒语。
foreign_names.flavor: 「如果我们不征服文明，必将被它纳入。」 ～演说家洁加娜

foreign_names.name: 雲散
foreign_names.text: 反擊目標瞬間咒語。
foreign_names.flavor: 「如果我們不征服文明，必將被它納入。」 ～演說家潔加娜

Doorkeeper.name: Doorkeeper
Doorkeeper.text:
Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
Doorkeeper.flavor: One piercing stare usually convinces thieves to go elsewhere.
Doorkeeper.original_text:
Defender
{2}{U}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.

rulings.text: The number of creatures with defender you control is counted when the ability resolves.

foreign_names.name: Türwächter
foreign_names.text:
Verteidiger
{2}{U}, {T}: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl legt die obersten X Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof, wobei X gleich der Anzahl der Kreaturen mit Verteidiger ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: Meist reicht ein scharfer Blick, um Diebe davon zu überzeugen, sich ein anderes Opfer zu suchen.

foreign_names.name: Portero
foreign_names.text:
Defensor.
{2}{U}, {T}: El jugador objetivo pone las primeras X cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio, donde X es el número de criaturas con la habilidad de defensor que controlas.
foreign_names.flavor: Una mirada penetrante suele bastar para convencer a los ladrones de que se vayan a otro sitio.

foreign_names.name: Portier
foreign_names.text:
Défenseur
{2}{U}, {T} : Le joueur ciblé met les X cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière, X étant le nombre de créatures avec le défenseur que vous contrôlez.
foreign_names.flavor: Un regard transperçant suffit généralement à convaincre les voleurs d'aller voir ailleurs.

foreign_names.name: Guardaporte
foreign_names.text:
Difensore
{2}{U}, {T}: Un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime X carte del suo grimorio, dove X è il numero di creature con difensore che controlli.
foreign_names.flavor: Un'occhiata penetrante di solito basta per convincere i ladri ad andarsene altrove.

foreign_names.name: 門衛
foreign_names.text:
防衛
{2}{U}, {T}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上からＸ枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする防衛を持つクリーチャーの総数に等しい。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ホムンクルス
foreign_names.flavor: 鋭く一瞥するだけで、盗っ人はたいていよそへ行ってしまう。

foreign_names.name: 문지기
foreign_names.text:
수비태세
{2}{U}, {T}: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 X장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다. X는 당신이 조종하는 생물 중 수비태세 능력을 가진 생물의 수다.
foreign_names.flavor: 문지기의 꿰뚫는 듯한 시선은 대부분의 도둑들로 하여금 발걸음을 돌리게 한다.

foreign_names.name: Porteiro
foreign_names.text:
Defensor
{2}{U}, {T}: O jogador alvo coloca os X cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério, sendo X igual ao número de criaturas com defensor que você controla.
foreign_names.flavor: Um olhar penetrante geralmente convence os ladrões a ir para outro lugar.

foreign_names.name: Дверник
foreign_names.text:
Защитник
{2}{U}, {T}: целевой игрок кладет X верхних карт своей библиотеки на свое кладбище, где X — количество существ со способностью Защитника под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor: Один пронзительный взгляд обычно убеждает грабителей поискать добычу полегче.

foreign_names.name: 守门妖
foreign_names.text:
守军
{2}{U}，{T}：目标牌手将其牌库顶的X张牌置入其坟墓场，X为由你操控、且具守军异能的生物数量。
foreign_names.flavor: 狠狠一瞪通常就足以让盗贼知难而退。

foreign_names.name: 守門妖
foreign_names.text:
守軍
{2}{U}，{T}：目標玩家將其牌庫頂的X張牌置入其墳墓場，X為由你操控、且具守軍異能的生物數量。
foreign_names.flavor: 狠狠一瞪通常就足以讓盜賊知難而退。

Downsize.name: Downsize
Downsize.text:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Downsize.original_text:
Target creature you don't control gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

foreign_names.name: Zusammenschrumpfen
foreign_names.text:
Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst, erhält -4/-0 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
Überlast {2}{U} (Du kannst diesen Zauber zu seinen Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)

foreign_names.name: Mermar
foreign_names.text:
La criatura objetivo que no controlas obtiene -4/-0 hasta el final del turno.
Sobrecarga {2}{U}. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo por su coste de sobrecarga. Si lo haces, cambia su texto reemplazando "la criatura objetivo" por "cada criatura".)

foreign_names.name: Rapetissement
foreign_names.text:
Une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas gagne -4/-0 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
Surcharge {2}{U} (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort pour son coût de surcharge. Si vous faites ainsi, modifiez son texte en remplaçant toutes les occurrences de « ciblé(e) » par « chaque ».)

foreign_names.name: Restringere
foreign_names.text:
Una creatura bersaglio che non controlli prende -4/-0 fino alla fine del turno.
Sovraccarico {2}{U} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "una creatura bersaglio" con "ogni creatura".)

foreign_names.name: 圧縮
foreign_names.text:
あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで－４/－０の修整を受ける。
超過 {2}{U} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない各クリーチャーはそれぞれターン終了時まで－４/－０の修整を受ける。）

foreign_names.name: 감축
foreign_names.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-0을 받는다.
과부하 {2}{U} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 각 생물은 턴종료까지 -4/-0을 받는다"로 내용이 변한다.)

foreign_names.name: Diminuição
foreign_names.text:
A criatura alvo que você não controla recebe -4/-0 até o final do turno.
Sobrecarga {2}{U} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "a criatura alvo" por "cada criatura".)

foreign_names.name: Ужимание
foreign_names.text:
Целевое существо не под вашим контролем получает -4/-0 до конца хода.
Перегрузка {2}{U} (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание за его стоимость Перегрузки. Если вы это делаете, измените в его тексте все слова «целевой» на «каждый».)

foreign_names.name: 压缩尺寸
foreign_names.text:
目标不由你操控的生物得-4/-0直到回合结束。
超载{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

foreign_names.name: 壓縮尺寸
foreign_names.text:
目標不由你操控的生物得-4/-0直到回合結束。
超載{2}{U}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）

Faerie Impostor.name: Faerie Impostor
Faerie Impostor.text:
Flying
When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
Faerie Impostor.flavor: Many Tin Street shops display a sign on the door: "No cloaks allowed."
Faerie Impostor.original_text:
Flying
When Faerie Impostor enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Returning another creature you control to its owner’s hand is optional. You may choose to sacrifice Faerie Impostor, even if you could return a creature.

foreign_names.name: Feen-Hochstaplerin
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wenn die Feen-Hochstaplerin ins Spiel kommt, opfere sie, falls du nicht eine andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurückbringst.
foreign_names.flavor: Viele Geschäfte in der Zinnstraße haben ein Schild an der Tür, das besagt: „Kein Zutritt für Kapuzenmantelträger!"

foreign_names.name: Hada impostora
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Hada impostora entre al campo de batalla, sacrifícala a menos que regreses otra criatura que controles a la mano de su propietario.
foreign_names.flavor: Muchas tiendas de la Calle Hojalata muestran un cartel en la puerta: "Prohibidas las capas con capucha".

foreign_names.name: Imposteur faerie
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Quand l'Imposteur faerie arrive sur le champ de bataille, sacrifiez-le à moins de renvoyer une autre créature que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreign_names.flavor: De nombreuses boutiques de la rue d'étain affichent le panneau suivant : « Port du capuchon interdit. »

foreign_names.name: Spiritella Ingannatrice
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Quando la Spiritella Ingannatrice entra nel campo di battaglia, sacrificala a meno che tu non faccia tornare un'altra creatura che controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
foreign_names.flavor: Molti negozi della Via Latta hanno un cartello sulla porta: "Vietato l'ingresso ai mantelli con cappuccio".

foreign_names.name: フェアリーの騙し屋
foreign_names.text:
飛行
フェアリーの騙し屋が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールする他のクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻さないかぎり、これを生け贄に捧げる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — フェアリー・ならず者
foreign_names.flavor: ブリキ通りの店では次の貼り出しがよく見られる――「フード付きのマント着用者は入店禁止。」

foreign_names.name: 흉내꾼 페어리
foreign_names.text:
비행
흉내꾼 페어리가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물 한 개를 소유자의 손으로 되돌리지 않으면 흉내꾼 페어리를 희생한다.
foreign_names.flavor: 깡통 거리의 수많은 상점의 문에는 "모자달린 망토를 입은 자 출입 금지"라는 문구가 걸려 있다.

foreign_names.name: Fada Impostora
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Quando Fada Impostora entrar no campo de batalha, sacrifique-a, a menos que você devolva outra criatura que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreign_names.flavor: Muitas lojas na Rua do Estanho têm um aviso na porta: "Proibido capas com capuz."

foreign_names.name: Фея-Самозванка
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Когда Фея-Самозванка выходит на поле битвы, пожертвуйте ее, если только вы не вернете другое существо под вашим контролем в руку его владельца.
foreign_names.flavor: На дверях лавок, расположенных на улице Жестянщиков, обычно висит предупреждение: «Вход в капюшонах запрещен!».

foreign_names.name: 冒名仙灵
foreign_names.text:
飞行
当冒名仙灵进战场时，除非你将由你操控的另一个生物移回其拥有者手上，否则牺牲之。
foreign_names.flavor: 许多锡街上的商店会在门口贴出告示：「不许穿着兜帽斗篷入内。」

foreign_names.name: 冒名仙靈
foreign_names.text:
飛行
當冒名仙靈進戰場時，除非你將由你操控的另一個生物移回其擁有者手上，否則犧牲之。
foreign_names.flavor: 許多錫街上的商店會在門口貼出告示：「不許穿著兜帽斗篷入內。」

Hover Barrier.name: Hover Barrier
Hover Barrier.flavor: As whispers and rumors increased, so did the demand for fail-safe barriers.

foreign_names.name: Schwebebarriere
foreign_names.text: Verteidiger, Fliegend
foreign_names.flavor: Je mehr die Leute flüsterten und munkelten, desto lauter wurden die Rufe nach sicheren Absperrungen.

foreign_names.name: Barrera aérea
foreign_names.text: Defensor, vuela.
foreign_names.flavor: Conforme aumentaban el murmullo y los rumores, lo hizo también la demanda de barreras fiables.

foreign_names.name: Barrière lévitante
foreign_names.text: Défenseur, vol
foreign_names.flavor: La recrudescence de rumeurs s'accompagna d'une demande accrue en barrières inviolables.

foreign_names.name: Barriera Sospesa
foreign_names.text: Difensore, volare
foreign_names.flavor: Le voci si facevano più insistenti e le richieste di barriere a prova di breccia si facevano più frequenti.

foreign_names.name: 浮遊障壁
foreign_names.text: 防衛、飛行
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — イリュージョン・壁
foreign_names.flavor: 耳打ちや噂話が増えるとともに、安全確実な障壁への需要も増えた。

foreign_names.name: 공중에 떠있는 방어막
foreign_names.text: 수비태세, 비행
foreign_names.flavor: 흉흉한 소문이 퍼질수록 안전한 방어막을 찾는 사람의 수도 늘었다.

foreign_names.name: Barreira Flutuante
foreign_names.text: Defensor, voar
foreign_names.flavor: Conforme os rumores e boatos aumentavam, aumentava também a demanda por barreiras infalíveis.

foreign_names.name: Барьер Зависания
foreign_names.text: Защитник, Полет
foreign_names.flavor: Молва и слухи разрастались, поэтому надежный барьер был нужен как никогда.

foreign_names.name: 气旋障壁
foreign_names.text: 守军，飞行
foreign_names.flavor: 随着耳语和传言甚嚣尘上，越来越多人寻求百分百可靠的屏障。

foreign_names.name: 氣旋障壁
foreign_names.text: 守軍，飛行
foreign_names.flavor: 隨著耳語和傳言甚囂塵上，越來越多人尋求百分百可靠的屏障。

Inaction Injunction.name: Inaction Injunction
Inaction Injunction.text:
Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Draw a card.
Inaction Injunction.flavor:
"To prevent action is to prevent transgression."
—Azorius Arrester motto
Inaction Injunction.original_text:
Detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreign_names.name: Untätigkeitsverfügung
foreign_names.text:
Inhaftiere eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann diese Kreatur nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreign_names.flavor: „Handlungen verhindern heißt Übertritte verhindern." —Motto der Azorius-Eintreiber

foreign_names.name: Mandato de inacción
foreign_names.text:
Detén la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esa criatura no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)
Roba una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Impedir la acción es impedir la transgresión." —Lema de los encarceladores azorios

foreign_names.name: Injonction d'inaction
foreign_names.text:
Détenez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, cette créature ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)
Piochez une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: « Empêcher l'action, c'est empêcher la transgression. » —Devise des courtiers d'Azorius

foreign_names.name: Ingiunzione di Cessata Attività
foreign_names.text:
Trattieni una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quella creatura non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)
Pesca una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Prevenire l'azione è prevenire la trasgressione." —Motto della polizia Azorius

foreign_names.name: 謹慎命令
foreign_names.text:
対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
カードを１枚引く。
foreign_names.flavor: 「行動を防げば罪も防げる。」 ――アゾリウスの拘引者のモットー

foreign_names.name: 활동 금지령
foreign_names.text:
상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)
카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "행동을 막는 것은 범죄를 막는 것이다." —아조리우스 체포원의 좌우명

foreign_names.name: Mandado de Inação
foreign_names.text:
Detenha a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. (Até seu próximo turno, aquela criatura não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.)
Compre um card.
foreign_names.flavor: "Prevenir a ação é prevenir a transgressão." — Lema dos Encarceiradores Azorius

foreign_names.name: Приказ о Бездействии
foreign_names.text:
Задержите целевое существо под контролем оппонента. (До вашего следующего хода то существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)
Возьмите карту.
foreign_names.flavor: «Упредишь действие — предотвратишь преступление». — девиз Задержателя Азориусов

foreign_names.name: 强制静息
foreign_names.text:
拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）
抓一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「防止行动就可以防止罪行。」 ～俄佐立逮捕人座右铭

foreign_names.name: 強制靜息
foreign_names.text:
拘留目標由對手操控的生物。（直到你的下一個回合，該生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）
抽一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「防止行動就可以防止罪行。」 ～俄佐立逮捕人座右銘

Inspiration.name: Inspiration
Inspiration.flavor:
"Day 31: I finally succeeded in my time reversal experiment! "Day 30: I might have a problem here."
—Journal of the Prime Izmagnus

foreign_names.name: Inspiration
foreign_names.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht zwei Karten.
foreign_names.flavor: „Tag 31: Endlich ist mir bei meinem Experiment der Zeitumkehr der Durchbruch gelungen!" „Tag 30: Es gibt da möglicherweise ein Problem." —Tagebuch des Höchsten Izmagnus

foreign_names.name: Inspiración
foreign_names.text: El jugador objetivo roba dos cartas.
foreign_names.flavor: "Día 31: ¡Por fin ha resultado mi experimento de inversión del tiempo! "Día 30: Creo que tengo un problema." —Diario del Izmagnus Primo

foreign_names.name: Inspiration
foreign_names.text: Le joueur ciblé pioche deux cartes.
foreign_names.flavor: « 31e jour : J'ai enfin réussi à inverser le cours du temps ! » « 30e jour : J'ai comme qui dirait un problème. » —Journal du Premier Izmagnus

foreign_names.name: Ispirazione
foreign_names.text: Un giocatore bersaglio pesca due carte.
foreign_names.flavor: "Giorno 31: Finalmente il mio esperimento di inversione temporale ha avuto successo!" "Giorno 30: Forse c'è un problema." —Diario dell'Izmagnus Primario

foreign_names.name: 霊感
foreign_names.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを２枚引く。
foreign_names.flavor: 「31日目：ついに時間の逆行実験に成功した！」 「30日目：これはちとマズイかもしれん。」 ――首席イズマグナスの日誌

foreign_names.name: 영감
foreign_names.text: 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "제 31일: 드디어 시간 반전 실험에 성공했다!" "제 30일: 문제가 생긴 것 같다." —이젯 길드 수석마도사의 일지

foreign_names.name: Inspiração
foreign_names.text: O jogador alvo compra dois cards.
foreign_names.flavor: "31º dia: Finalmente tive sucesso em meu experimento de reversão temporal! "30º dia: Acho que tenho um problema..." — Diário do Primeiro-Izmagnus

foreign_names.name: Вдохновение
foreign_names.text: Целевой игрок берет две карты.
foreign_names.flavor: «День 31: я наконец-то преуспел в опытах с поворотом времени вспять! День 30: кажется, у меня возникла проблема». — дневник Главного Измагнуса

foreign_names.name: 突发奇想
foreign_names.text: 目标牌手抓两张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「第31日：我的逆转时间实验终于成功了！ 「第30日：这下麻烦了。」 ～伊捷首法师的日记

foreign_names.name: 突發奇想
foreign_names.text: 目標玩家抽兩張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「第31日：我的逆轉時間實驗終於成功了！ 「第30日：這下麻煩了。」 ～伊捷首法師的日記

foreign_names.text:

foreign_names.text:
Vol

foreign_names.name: Guardia dei Cieli di Isperia
foreign_names.text:
Volare

foreign_names.name: イスペリアの空見張り
foreign_names.text:
飛行
イスペリアの空見張りが戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン・騎士

foreign_names.name: 이스페리아의 창공경비대
foreign_names.text:
비행
이스페리아의 창공경비대가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)

Полет

foreign_names.name: 伊佩利空巡卫
foreign_names.text:
飞行
当伊佩利空巡卫进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

foreign_names.name: 伊佩利空巡衛

飛行

Jace, Architect of Thought.name: Jace, Architect of Thought
Jace, Architect of Thought.text:
[+1]: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
[−2]: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.
[−8]: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.
Jace, Architect of Thought.original_text:
+1: Until your next turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
-2: Reveal the top three cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library in any order.
-8: For each player, search that player's library for a nonland card and exile it, then that player shuffles his or her library. You may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

rulings.text: Jace’s first ability creates a delayed triggered ability that triggers whenever a creature an opponent controls attacks. It doesn’t matter which player or planeswalker that creature is attacking.

You pick one of your opponents when Jace’s second ability resolves. The ability doesn’t target that opponent. All players may see the revealed cards and offer opinions. You (not your opponent) choose which pile is put into your hand and which pile is put on the bottom of your library.
Piles can be empty. If one of the piles is empty, you choose to put all the revealed cards in your hand or on the bottom of your library.
When resolving Jace’s third ability, you search each player’s library (including yours) and exile the nonland cards before casting any of them.

For each library, the search is complete only when you explicitly say it is. For example, you can look through one player’s library, set that library down, look at another player’s library, choose a nonland card in the first library, then choose a nonland card in the second library. Don’t reveal any cards from those libraries to any other player until you exile them.
You cast the cards by putting them on the stack one at a time, choosing modes, targets, and so on. The last card you cast will be the first one to resolve.
When casting a card this way, ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type. Other timing restrictions, such as “Cast [this card] only during combat,” must be followed.
If you can’t cast a card, perhaps because there are no legal targets available, or if you choose not to cast one, it will remain exiled. Jace’s ability won’t allow you to cast it later.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay alternative costs such as overload costs. You can pay additional costs such as kicker costs. If the card has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If a card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as its value.

Mizzium Skin.name: Mizzium Skin
Mizzium Skin.text:
Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Mizzium Skin.original_text:
Target creature you control gets +0/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn.
Overload {1}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

rulings.text: Psychic Spiral won’t be shuffled into your library, and it won’t be counted when determining how many cards the target player puts into their graveyard. It will be put into your graveyard after you follow its instructions.
If you cast Psychic Spiral when there are no cards in your graveyard, you’ll still shuffle your library.
