foreign_names.name: Психическая Спираль
foreign_names.text: Втасуйте все карты из вашего кладбища в вашу библиотеку. Целевой игрок кладет столько же карт с верха своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: Краснослов вынуждает преступников признаться в нарушении законов, о котором они лишь помышляли.

foreign_names.name: 心灵漩涡
foreign_names.text: 将所有在你坟墓场中的牌洗入你的牌库中。目标牌手将其牌库顶等量的牌置入其坟墓场。
foreign_names.flavor: 朗诵人迫使罪犯承认自己只在脑海中违反的法条。

foreign_names.name: 心靈漩渦
foreign_names.text: 將所有在你墳墓場中的牌洗入你的牌庫中。目標玩家將其牌庫頂等量的牌置入其墳墓場。
foreign_names.flavor: 朗誦人迫使罪犯承認自己只在腦海中違反的法條。

Runewing.name: Runewing
Runewing.text:
Flying
When Runewing dies, draw a card.
Runewing.flavor: In the hands of the open-minded, a runewing quill writes wisdom of its own.
Runewing.original_text:
Flying
When Runewing dies, draw a card.

foreign_names.name: Runenflügel
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Runenflügel stirbt, ziehe eine Karte.
foreign_names.flavor: In den Händen von Aufgeschlossenen schreibt eine Runenflügel-Feder ihre eigenen Wahrheiten.

foreign_names.name: Alarruna
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Alarruna muera, roba una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: En las manos de los de mentalidad abierta, una pluma de alarruna escribe su propia sabiduría.

foreign_names.name: Ailerune
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Quand l'Ailerune meurt, piochez une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: Quand on a l'esprit ouvert, la sagesse s'écrit toute seule avec une plume d'ailerune.

foreign_names.name: Alaruna
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Quando l'Alaruna muore, pesca una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: Nelle mani di un individuo dalla mente aperta, una penna di alaruna scrive sempre parole di saggezza.

foreign_names.name: ルーン翼
foreign_names.text:
飛行
ルーン翼が死亡したとき、カードを１枚引く。
foreign_names.flavor: 開かれた心の持ち主がルーン翼の羽根ペンを手に取れば、叡智はおのずと書き記される。

foreign_names.name: 룬날개
foreign_names.text:
비행
룬날개가 죽을 때, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 마음이 열린 자의 손에 쥐어진 룬날개 깃털 펜은 스스로 지혜로운 글을 써내려간다.

foreign_names.name: Asa-rúnica
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Quando Asa-rúnica morrer, compre um card.
foreign_names.flavor: Nas mãos dos que possuem a mente aberta, uma pena de asa-rúnica escreve com sabedoria própria.

foreign_names.name: Рунокрыл
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Когда Рунокрыл умирает, возьмите карту.
foreign_names.flavor: В правильных руках перо рунокрыла начинает записывать мудрости само по себе.

foreign_names.name: 符翼鸟
foreign_names.text:
飞行
当符翼鸟死去时，抓一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 在思想开明的人手中，符翼鸟的羽毛笔可自行书写智慧之言。

foreign_names.name: 符翼鳥
foreign_names.text:
飛行
當符翼鳥死去時，抽一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 在思想開明的人手中，符翼鳥的羽毛筆可自行書寫智慧之言。

Search the City.name: Search the City
Search the City.text:
When Search the City enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library.
Whenever you play a card with the same name as one of the exiled cards, you may put one of those cards with that name into its owner's hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Search the City, sacrifice it. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.
Search the City.original_text:
When Search the City enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library.
Whenever you play a card with the same name as one of the exiled cards, you may put one of those cards with that name into its owner's hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Search the City, sacrifice it. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

rulings.text: To “play a card” is to play that card as a land or cast that card as a spell, whichever is appropriate.
You can put only one card into its owner’s hand for each card you play.
If you don’t sacrifice Search the City, perhaps because it was destroyed in response to its ability triggering, you won’t take an extra turn.

foreign_names.name: Die Stadt durchsuchen
foreign_names.text:
Wenn Die Stadt durchsuchen ins Spiel kommt, schicke die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek ins Exil.
Immer wenn du eine Karte mit dem gleichen Namen wie eine der ins Exil geschickten Karten spielst, kannst du eine der ins Exil geschickten Karten mit diesem Namen auf die Hand ihres Besitzers bringen. Falls dann keine Karten mehr im Exil sind, die mit Die Stadt durchsuchen ins Exil geschickt wurden, opfere sie. Falls du das tust, erhältst du nach diesem Zug einen weiteren Zug.

foreign_names.name: Registrar la ciudad
foreign_names.text:
Cuando Registrar la ciudad entre al campo de batalla, exilia las primeras cinco cartas de tu biblioteca.
Siempre que juegues una carta con el mismo nombre que una de las cartas exiliadas, puedes poner una de esas cartas con ese nombre en la mano de su propietario. Luego, si no hay cartas exiliadas con Registrar la ciudad, sacrifícala. Si lo haces, toma un turno adicional después de éste.

foreign_names.name: Fouille de la cité
foreign_names.text:
Quand la Fouille de la cité arrive sur le champ de bataille, exilez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque.
À chaque fois que vous jouez une carte ayant le même nom que l'une des cartes exilées, vous pouvez mettre une de ces cartes ayant ce nom dans la main de son propriétaire. Puis, s'il n'y a aucune carte exilée par la Fouille de la cité, sacrifiez-la. Si vous faites ainsi, jouez un tour supplémentaire après celui-ci.

foreign_names.name: Perlustrare la Città
foreign_names.text:
Quando Perlustrare la Città entra nel campo di battaglia, esilia le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio.
Ogniqualvolta giochi una carta con lo stesso nome di una delle carte esiliate, puoi aggiungere una di quelle carte con quel nome alla mano del suo proprietario. Poi se non ci sono carte esiliate con Perlustrare la Città, sacrificalo. Se lo fai, gioca un altro turno dopo questo.

foreign_names.name: 市内捜査
foreign_names.text:
市内捜査が戦場に出たとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを追放する。
あなたが、追放したカードと同じ名前のカードを１枚プレイするたび、あなたはこれにより追放されているその名前のカードを１枚オーナーの手札に加えてもよい。その後、市内捜査によって追放されているカードがない場合、これを生け贄に捧げる。そうした場合、このターンの後に追加のターンを得る。

foreign_names.name: 도시 수색
foreign_names.text:
도시 수색이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 추방한다.
당신이 그렇게 추방된 카드 중 하나와 이름이 같은 카드를 플레이할 때마다, 당신은 그 이름을 가진 카드 중 한 장을 소유자의 손에 넣을 수 있다. 그러고 나서 도시 수색이 추방한 카드가 남아 있지 않으면, 도시 수색을 희생한다. 그렇게 한다면, 이번 턴 후에 추가로 턴을 얻는다.

foreign_names.name: Vasculhar a Cidade
foreign_names.text:
Quando Vasculhar a Cidade entrar no campo de batalha, exile os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório.
Toda vez que você joga um card com o mesmo nome de um dos cards exilados, você pode colocar um desses cards com esse nome na mão de seu dono. Depois, se não houver mais cards exilados com Vasculhar a Cidade, sacrifique-o. Se fizer isso, jogue um turno extra após este.

foreign_names.name: Поиски в Городе
foreign_names.text:
Когда Поиски в Городе выходят на поле битвы, изгоните пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки.
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете карту с тем же именем, что у одной из изгнанных карт, вы можете положить одну из тех карт с тем именем в руку ее владельца. Затем, если после этого не осталось карт, изгнанных с помощью Поисков в Городе, пожертвуйте Поиски в Городе. Если вы это делаете, сделайте дополнительный ход вслед за этим.

foreign_names.name: 遍寻全城
foreign_names.text:
当遍寻全城进战场时，放逐你牌库顶的五张牌。
每当你使用一张与以此法放逐的牌同名之牌时，你可以将其中一张具有该名称的牌置入其拥有者手上。然后如果已经没有牌被遍寻全城放逐，则牺牲之。若你如此作，于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

foreign_names.name: 遍尋全城
foreign_names.text:
當遍尋全城進戰場時，放逐你牌庫頂的五張牌。
每當你使用一張與以此法放逐的牌同名之牌時，你可以將其中一張具有該名稱的牌置入其擁有者手上。然後如果已經沒有牌被遍尋全城放逐，則犧牲之。若你如此作，於本回合後進行額外的一個回合。

Skyline Predator.name: Skyline Predator
Skyline Predator.text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Skyline Predator.flavor:
"It will dodge your first arrow and flatten you before there's a second."
—Alcarus, Selesnya archer
Skyline Predator.original_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying

foreign_names.name: Himmelsraubtier
foreign_names.text:
Aufblitzen (Du kannst diesen Zauberspruch zu jedem Zeitpunkt wirken, zu dem du einen Spontanzauber wirken könntest.)
Fliegend
foreign_names.flavor: „Er wird deinem ersten Pfeil ausweichen und dich platt machen, bevor ein zweiter kommt." —Alcarus, Selesnija-Bogenschütze

foreign_names.name: Depredador del horizonte
foreign_names.text:
Destello. (Puedes lanzar este hechizo en cualquier momento en que pudieras lanzar un instantáneo.)
Vuela.
foreign_names.flavor: "Esquivará tu primera flecha y te aplastará antes de que haya una segunda." —Alcarus, arquero selesnya

foreign_names.name: Prédateur des tours
foreign_names.text:
Flash (Vous pouvez lancer ce sort à tout moment où vous pourriez lancer un éphémère.)
Vol
foreign_names.flavor: « Il esquivera ta première flèche et t'aplatira avant ta deuxième. » —Alcarus, archer de Selesnya

foreign_names.name: Predatore dell'Orizzonte
foreign_names.text:
Lampo (Puoi lanciare questa magia in ogni momento in cui potresti lanciare un istantaneo.)
Volare
foreign_names.flavor: "Schiverà la tua prima freccia e ti abbatterà prima ancora che arrivi la seconda." —Alcarus, arciere di Selesnya

foreign_names.name: 摩天楼の捕食者
foreign_names.text:
瞬速（あなたはこの呪文を、あなたがインスタントを唱えられるときならいつでも唱えてよい。）
飛行
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク
foreign_names.flavor: 「あいつは一の矢をかわして、あんたが二の矢を放つ前にあんたを潰すだろうね。」 ――セレズニアの射手、アルカウス

foreign_names.name: 마천루 포식자
foreign_names.text:
섬광 (순간마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기라면 당신은 이 주문을 언제든지 발동할 수 있다.)
비행
foreign_names.flavor: "그것은 첫 번째 화살을 피한 후, 네가 두 번째 화살을 쏘기 전에 널 뭉개버릴 것이다." —셀레스냐 궁수 알카루스

foreign_names.name: Predador do Horizonte
foreign_names.text:
Lampejo (Você poderá conjurar esta mágica a qualquer momento em que puder conjurar uma mágica instantânea.)
Voar
foreign_names.flavor: "Ele vai se esquivar da sua primeira flecha e esmagar você antes que a segunda saia do seu arco." — Alcarus, arqueiro Selesnya

foreign_names.name: Небесный Хищник
foreign_names.text:
Миг (Вы можете разыграть это заклинание при любой возможности разыгрывать мгновенные заклинания.)
Полет
foreign_names.flavor: «Он уклонится от первой стрелы и сомнет вас до того, как вы успеете выпустить вторую». — Алкарус, селезнийский лучник

foreign_names.name: 天际掠夺者
foreign_names.text:
闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。）
飞行
foreign_names.flavor: 「它将闪过你射的第一箭，然后在你射第二箭之前将你压扁。」 ～瑟雷尼亚弓箭手艾凯勒

foreign_names.name: 天際掠奪者
foreign_names.text:
閃現（你可以於你能夠施放瞬間的時機下施放此咒語。）
飛行
foreign_names.flavor: 「牠將閃過你射的第一箭，然後在你射第二箭之前將你壓扁。」 ～瑟雷尼亞弓箭手艾凱勒

Soulsworn Spirit.name: Soulsworn Spirit
Soulsworn Spirit.text:
Soulsworn Spirit can't be blocked.
When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Soulsworn Spirit.original_text:
Soulsworn Spirit is unblockable.
When Soulsworn Spirit enters the battlefield, detain target creature an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.

foreign_names.name: Geist der Seelen
foreign_names.text:
Der Geist der Seelen ist unblockbar.
Wenn der Geist der Seelen ins Spiel kommt, inhaftiere eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug kann diese Kreatur nicht angreifen oder blocken, und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)

foreign_names.name: Espíritu comprometido
foreign_names.text:
El Espíritu comprometido es imbloqueable.
Cuando el Espíritu comprometido entre al campo de batalla, detén la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esa criatura no puede atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)

foreign_names.name: Esprit d'âme assermentée
foreign_names.text:
L'Esprit d'âme assermentée est imblocable.
Quand l'Esprit d'âme assermentée arrive sur le champ de bataille, détenez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, cette créature ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer et ses capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)

foreign_names.name: Spirito Cuorfedele
foreign_names.text:
Lo Spirito Cuorfedele è imbloccabile.
Quando lo Spirito Cuorfedele entra nel campo di battaglia, trattieni una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quella creatura non può attaccare o bloccare e le sue abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)

foreign_names.name: 魂誓いの霊
foreign_names.text:
魂誓いの霊はブロックされない。
魂誓いの霊が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、そのクリーチャーでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それの起動型能力は起動できない。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreign_names.name: 영혼을 선서한 신령
foreign_names.text:
영혼을 선서한 신령은 방어될 수 없다.
영혼을 선서한 신령이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 생물의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)

foreign_names.name: Espírito Alma-jurada
foreign_names.text:
Espírito Alma-jurada não pode ser bloqueado.
Quando Espírito Alma-jurada entrar no campo de batalha, detenha uma criatura alvo que um oponente controla. (Até o seu próximo turno, aquela criatura não pode atacar nem bloquear e as habilidades ativadas dela não podem ser ativadas.)

foreign_names.name: Присягнувший Дух
foreign_names.text:
Присягнувший Дух не может быть заблокирован.
Когда Присягнувший Дух выходит на поле битвы, задержите целевое существо под контролем оппонента. (До вашего следующего хода то существо не может атаковать или блокировать, и его активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)

foreign_names.name: 魂誓精怪
foreign_names.text:
魂誓精怪不能被阻挡。
当魂誓精怪进战场时，拘留目标由对手操控的生物。（直到你的下个回合，该生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

foreign_names.name: 魂誓精靈
foreign_names.text:
魂誓精靈不能被阻擋。
當魂誓精靈進戰場時，拘留目標由對手操控的生物。（直到你的下個回合，該生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）

Sphinx of the Chimes.name: Sphinx of the Chimes
Sphinx of the Chimes.text:
Flying
Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.
Sphinx of the Chimes.flavor: "I've dreamt of the future, Isperia. Danger is on the horizon. You must heed my warning."
Sphinx of the Chimes.original_text:
Flying
Discard two nonland cards with the same name: Draw four cards.

foreign_names.name: Sphinx der Glocken
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wirf zwei Karten mit gleichem Namen ab, die kein Land sind: Ziehe vier Karten.
foreign_names.flavor: „Ich habe von der Zukunft geträumt, Isperia. Am Horizont lauert Gefahr. Du musst dir meine Warnung zu Herzen nehmen."

foreign_names.name: Esfinge de las campanas
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Descartar dos cartas que no sean tierra con el mismo nombre: Roba cuatro cartas.
foreign_names.flavor: "He soñado con el futuro, Isperia. Hay peligro en el horizonte. Debes escuchar mi advertencia."

foreign_names.name: Sphinx des carillons
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Défaussez-vous de deux cartes non-terrain ayant le même nom : Piochez quatre cartes.
foreign_names.flavor: « J'ai rêvé de l'avenir, Isperia. Le danger est à l'horizon. Tu dois écouter ma mise en garde. »

foreign_names.name: Sfinge delle Campane
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Scarta due carte non terra con lo stesso nome: Pesca quattro carte.
foreign_names.flavor: "Ho visto il futuro, Isperia. Il pericolo si staglia all'orizzonte. Ricorda il mio avvertimento."

foreign_names.name: 鐘楽のスフィンクス
foreign_names.text:
飛行
同じ名前を持つ土地でないカードを２枚捨てる：カードを４枚引く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — スフィンクス
foreign_names.flavor: 「イスペリアよ、私は未来を夢見た。危険が迫っている。私の警告を聞くのだ。」

foreign_names.name: 관종의 스핑크스
foreign_names.text:
비행
이름이 같고 대지가 아닌 카드 두 장을 버린다: 카드 네 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "이스페리아, 미래에 대한 꿈을 꿨소. 곧 위험이 닥칠 것이오. 내 경고를 반드시 명심하시오."

foreign_names.name: Esfinge do Carrilhão
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Descarte dois cards com o mesmo nome que não sejam terrenos: Compre quatro cards.
foreign_names.flavor: "Sonhei com o futuro, Isperia. O perigo raia no horizonte. Você precisa dar ouvidos ao meu aviso."

foreign_names.name: Сфинкс Колокольного Звона
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Сбросьте две не являющиеся землями карты с одинаковым именем: возьмите четыре карты.
foreign_names.flavor: «Исперия, я видел будущее. Опасность на горизонте. Услышь мое предупреждение!»

foreign_names.name: 鸣钟史芬斯
foreign_names.text:
飞行
弃两张同名的非地牌：抓四张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「伊佩利，我梦见了未来。危险近在眼前。你务必听从我的警告。」

foreign_names.name: 鳴鐘史芬斯
foreign_names.text:
飛行
棄兩張同名的非地牌：抽四張牌。

rulings.text: You must be able to target a creature to cast Assassin’s Strike.
If the creature is an illegal target when Assassin’s Strike tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. Its controller won’t discard a card.
If Assassin’s Strike resolves but the creature isn’t destroyed (perhaps because it regenerated or has indestructible), its controller will discard a card.

Dead Reveler.name: Dead Reveler
Dead Reveler.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Dead Reveler.flavor: He's the unlife of the party.
Dead Reveler.original_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

rulings.text: Players won’t know which player or planeswalker Desecration Demon will attack, if any, when deciding whether to sacrifice a creature.

Each opponent in turn order may choose to sacrifice a creature, even if an opponent already chose to sacrifice a creature that combat. Desecration Demon will have a maximum of one +1/+1 counter put on it each combat, no matter how many creatures were sacrificed.

Grave Betrayal.name: Grave Betrayal
Grave Betrayal.text: Whenever a creature you don't control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.
Grave Betrayal.original_text: Whenever a creature you don't control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

rulings.text: Grave Betrayal doesn’t overwrite any previous colors or types. Rather, it adds another color and another creature type.
If the creature is normally colorless, it will simply be black. It won’t be both black and colorless.
If a creature you don’t control dies during the end step, that creature won’t return to the battlefield until the beginning of the next end step.

Each creature you don’t control that dies causes a delayed triggered ability to trigger at the beginning of the next end step. If there are multiple such abilities, you can put them on the stack in any order. The creatures will return to the battlefield one at a time as each ability resolves. The last ability you put on the stack will be the first one to resolve.

If the creature card leaves the graveyard before the delayed triggered ability resolves, it won’t return to the battlefield. This is also true if the card leaves the graveyard and returns to the graveyard before that ability resolves.

The phrase “with an additional +1/+1 counter on it” means that the creature enters the battlefield with one more +1/+1 counter than it would normally enter the battlefield with. It doesn’t keep any counters it had on it when it died.

In a multiplayer game, if more than one player controls a Grave Betrayal and a creature controlled by none of those players dies, each Grave Betrayal will create a delayed triggered ability at the beginning of the next end step. The first such ability to resolve will return the creature. Usually, this will be one controlled by the player furthest from the active player in turn order.

Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grim Roustabout.

rulings.text: You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

Launch Party.name: Launch Party
Launch Party.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
Launch Party.flavor: Life's too short to not do the things you love.
Launch Party.original_text:
As an additional cost to cast Launch Party, sacrifice a creature.
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

rulings.text: If you sacrifice an attacking or blocking creature during the declare blockers step, it won’t deal combat damage. If you wait until the combat damage step, but that creature is dealt lethal damage, it’ll be destroyed before you get a chance to sacrifice it.
If the target creature is an illegal target when Launch Party tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No player will lose 2 life.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

Pack Rat.name: Pack Rat
Pack Rat.text:
Pack Rat's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control.
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Create a token that's a copy of Pack Rat.
Pack Rat.original_text:
Pack Rat's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Rats you control.
{2}{B}, Discard a card: Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of Pack Rat.

rulings.text: Pack Rat’s first ability counts any creature you control with the creature type Rat, not just Pack Rats.

The token will copy Pack Rat’s two abilities. Its power and toughness will be equal to the number of Rats you control (not the number of Rats you controlled when the token entered the battlefield). It will also be able to create copies of itself.

The token won’t copy counters on Pack Rat, nor will it copy other effects that have changed Pack Rat’s power, toughness, types, color, or so on. Normally, this means the token will simply be a Pack Rat. But if any copy effects have affected that Pack Rat, they’re taken into account.

If Pack Rat leaves the battlefield before its activated ability resolves, the token will still enter the battlefield as a copy of Pack Rat, using Pack Rat’s copiable values from when it was last on the battlefield.

Shrieking Affliction.name: Shrieking Affliction
Shrieking Affliction.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, they lose 3 life.
Shrieking Affliction.flavor: A gargoyle's voice reaches pitches that will shatter glass and warp bone.
Shrieking Affliction.original_text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, he or she loses 3 life.

rulings.text: Shrieking Affliction’s ability will trigger only if an opponent begins their upkeep with one or fewer cards in hand. The ability will check the number of cards in that player’s hand again when it tries to resolve. If that player has two or more cards in hand at that time, that player won’t lose life.

Slum Reaper.name: Slum Reaper
Slum Reaper.text: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
Slum Reaper.flavor: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.
Slum Reaper.original_text: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

rulings.text: As Slum Reaper’s ability resolves, first the player whose turn it is chooses a creature they control, then each other player in turn order does the same, knowing the choices made before them. Then all the chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.
If any player controls no creatures, that player simply doesn’t sacrifice anything. Each other player still sacrifices a creature.
Slum Reaper may be the creature its controller sacrifices for its own ability.

rulings.text: You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

Dynacharge.name: Dynacharge
Dynacharge.text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Dynacharge.flavor: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.
Dynacharge.original_text:
Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
An overloaded Dynacharge affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures you begin to control later in the turn won’t get +2/+0.

Electrickery.name: Electrickery
Electrickery.text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Electrickery.original_text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

Gore-House Chainwalker.name: Gore-House Chainwalker
Gore-House Chainwalker.text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Gore-House Chainwalker.flavor: If the pig's blood drips on you, you're next on the chain.
Gore-House Chainwalker.original_text: Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

Guild Feud.name: Guild Feud
Guild Feud.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent reveals the top three cards of their library, may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield, then puts the rest into their graveyard. You do the same with the top three cards of your library. If two creatures are put onto the battlefield this way, those creatures fight each other.
Guild Feud.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target opponent reveals the top three cards of his or her library, may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield, then puts the rest into his or her graveyard. You do the same with the top three cards of your library. If two creatures are put onto the battlefield this way, those creatures fight each other.

rulings.text: Guild Feud has one target: the opponent. You’ll see what creature that player puts onto the battlefield before revealing the top three cards of your library and deciding whether to put a creature onto the battlefield yourself.
If no creatures or only one creature is put onto the battlefield this way, no fight happens.
Players can’t cast spells or activate abilities between the creatures being put onto the battlefield and them fighting each other. Notably, you can’t respond with a spell like Giant Growth.
Any abilities that trigger when the two creatures enter the battlefield will be put on the stack after the fight, even if one or both creatures die.

foreign_names.name: Gildenfehde
foreign_names.text: Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments deckt ein Gegner deiner Wahl die obersten drei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf. Er kann eine Kreaturenkarte davon ins Spiel bringen. Dann legt er den Rest dieser Karten auf seinen Friedhof. Du tust das Gleiche mit den obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek. Falls auf diese Weise zwei Kreaturen ins Spiel gebracht werden, kämpfen diese Kreaturen gegeneinander.

foreign_names.name: Disputa entre gremios

Tú haces lo mismo con las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Si dos criaturas son puestas en el campo de batalla de este modo, esas criaturas luchan entre sí.

foreign_names.name: Lutte entre guildes

Vous faites la même chose avec les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Si deux créatures sont mises sur le champ de bataille de cette manière, elles se battent l'une contre l'autre.

foreign_names.name: Faida della Gilda
foreign_names.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, un avversario bersaglio rivela le prime tre carte del suo grimorio. Può mettere sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura scelta tra esse, poi mette le altre nel suo cimitero. Fai lo stesso con le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Se due creature vengono messe sul campo di battaglia in questo modo, lottano l'una con l'altra.

foreign_names.name: ギルドの抗争
foreign_names.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードを公開する。そのプレイヤーはそれらのカードの中からクリーチャー・カードを１枚戦場に出してもよい。その後残りを自分の墓地に置く。あなたもあなたのライブラリーの一番上から３枚のカードについて同様にする。これにより２体のクリーチャーが戦場に出た場合、それらのクリーチャーは互いに格闘を行う。

foreign_names.name: 길드 간의 분쟁
foreign_names.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 상대 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장을 공개하고, 그 중 생물 카드 한 장을 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 그런 다음 나머지 카드는 자신의 무덤에 넣는다. 당신도 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 세 장으로 똑같이 한다. 이런 방법으로 생물 두 개가 전장에 놓이면, 그 생물들은 서로 싸운다.

foreign_names.name: Contenda entre Guildas
foreign_names.text: No início de sua manutenção, o oponente alvo revela os três cards do topo do próprio grimório, pode colocar um card de criatura dentre esses no campo de batalha e, depois, coloca o restante no próprio cemitério. Você faz o mesmo com os três cards do topo do seu grimório. Se duas criaturas forem colocadas no campo de batalha dessa forma, elas lutam uma contra a outra.

foreign_names.name: Вражда Гильдий
foreign_names.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки целевой оппонент показывает три верхние карты своей библиотеки, может положить находящуюся среди них карту существа на поле битвы, затем кладет остальные карты на свое кладбище. Вы делаете то же самое с тремя верхними картами вашей библиотеки. Если таким образом на поле битвы были положены два существа, те существа дерутся друг с другом.

foreign_names.name: 公会世仇
foreign_names.text: 在你的维持开始时，目标对手展示其牌库顶的三张牌，且他可以将其中一张生物牌放进战场，然后将其余的牌置入其坟墓场。你对你牌库顶的三张牌执行同样流程。若有两个生物以此法放进战场，则它们互斗。

Mizzium Mortars.name: Mizzium Mortars
Mizzium Mortars.text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Mizzium Mortars.original_text:
Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

Splatter Thug.name: Splatter Thug
Splatter Thug.text:
First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Splatter Thug.flavor: The mask isn't meant to hide his identity. It's meant to keep the viscera out of his eyes.
Splatter Thug.original_text:
First strike
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)

rulings.text: You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

Street Spasm.name: Street Spasm
Street Spasm.text:
Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control.
Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Street Spasm.original_text:
Street Spasm deals X damage to target creature without flying you don't control.
Overload {X}{X}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

foreign_names.flavor: Nulla poteva fermarlo. Non gli stretti vicoli, né la guarnigione Boros, né tantomeno i quattro piani della cattedrale Orzhov.

foreign_names.name: 長屋壊し
foreign_names.text: 速攻
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreign_names.flavor: 何をもってしてもそれは止められなかった――狭い路地でも、ボロスの駐屯地でも、そして四階建てのオルゾフの大聖堂であっても。

foreign_names.name: 날뛰는 주택가 야수
foreign_names.text: 신속
foreign_names.flavor: 좁은 골목도, 보로스 주둔지도, 심지어 4층짜리 오르조브 대성당조차도 그것을 막을 수는 없었다.

foreign_names.name: Invasor de Habitação
foreign_names.text: Ímpeto
foreign_names.flavor: Nada o deteria. Nem os becos, nem a guarnição Boros, nem, com certeza, a catedral de quatro andares dos Orzhov.

foreign_names.name: Крушитель Жилищ
foreign_names.text: Ускорение
foreign_names.flavor: Ничто не могло его остановить: ни узкие улочки, ни гарнизон Боросов, и уж конечно ни четырехэтажная церковь Орзовов.

foreign_names.name: 居所粉碎兽
foreign_names.text: 敏捷
foreign_names.flavor: 没有东西可以阻止它～不论狭窄的巷弄、波洛斯驻防地，更不用说四层楼高的欧佐夫圣堂。

foreign_names.name: 居所粉碎獸
foreign_names.text: 敏捷
foreign_names.flavor: 沒有東西可以阻止牠～不論狹窄的巷弄、波洛斯駐防地，更不用說四層樓高的歐佐夫聖堂。

Traitorous Instinct.name: Traitorous Instinct
Traitorous Instinct.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.
Traitorous Instinct.flavor: Joining the Worldsoul took years of study and meditation. Severing that connection took the snap of Rakdos's fingers.
Traitorous Instinct.original_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

rulings.text: You may target a creature you already control. You may target a creature that’s already untapped.

foreign_names.name: Verräterischer Instinkt
foreign_names.text: Übernimm bis zum Ende des Zuges die Kontrolle über eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Enttappe diese Kreatur. Bis zum Ende des Zuges erhält sie +2/+0 und hat Eile.
foreign_names.flavor: Sich der Weltenseele anzuschließen erforderte Jahre des Studiums und der Meditation. Ein einziges Fingerschnippen von Rakdos durchtrennte die Verbindung.

foreign_names.name: Instinto traicionero
foreign_names.text: Gana el control de la criatura objetivo hasta el final del turno. Endereza esa criatura. Hasta el final del turno, obtiene +2/+0 y gana la habilidad de prisa.
foreign_names.flavor: Unirse al Alma del mundo llevó años de estudio y meditación. Cortar esa conexión sólo requirió un chasquido de los dedos de Rakdos.

foreign_names.name: Instinct perfide
foreign_names.text: Acquérez le contrôle de la créature ciblée jusqu'à la fin du tour. Dégagez cette créature. Jusqu'à la fin du tour, elle gagne +2/+0 et elle acquiert la célérité.
foreign_names.flavor: Fusionner avec l'Âme du monde avait pris des années d'études et de méditation. Il suffit d'un claquement de doigts de Rakdos pour rompre ce lien.

foreign_names.name: Istinto Traditore
foreign_names.text: Prendi il controllo di una creatura bersaglio fino alla fine del turno. STAPpa quella creatura. Fino alla fine del turno, prende +2/+0 e ha rapidità.
foreign_names.flavor: Ci vollero anni di studi e meditazione per unirsi all'Anima del Mondo. Bastò uno schiocco delle dita di Rakdos per recidere il legame.

foreign_names.name: 裏切りの本能
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、ターン終了時までそれのコントロールを得る。そのクリーチャーをアンタップする。ターン終了時まで、それは＋２/＋０の修整を受けるとともに速攻を得る。
foreign_names.flavor: 世界魂と一体になるまでには何年にも及ぶ研究と瞑想が必要であった。その繋がりを断ち切るには、ラクドスが指を鳴らすだけでよかった。

foreign_names.name: 배신의 본능
foreign_names.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지 당신이 그 생물의 조종권을 얻는다. 그 생물은 언탭되며 턴종료까지 +2/+0을 받고 신속 능력을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 세계의 영혼과 하나가 되는 데는 몇 년의 연구와 명상이 필요했지만, 락도스는 손가락 하나 까딱해서 그 연결을 끊어버렸다.

foreign_names.name: Instinto Traidor
foreign_names.text: Ganhe o controle da criatura alvo até o final do turno. Desvire aquela criatura. Até o final do turno, ela recebe +2/+0 e ganha ímpeto.
foreign_names.flavor: A união à Grande Anima exigiu anos de estudo e meditação. Para romper a conexão, bastou um estalar de dedos dos Rakdos.

foreign_names.name: Предательский Инстинкт
foreign_names.text: Получите контроль над целевым существом до конца хода. Разверните то существо. До конца хода оно получает +2/+0 и Ускорение.
foreign_names.flavor: Для присоединения к Всесознанию потребовались годы штудий и медитаций. Для разрыва этой связи хватило щелчка пальцев Ракдоса.

foreign_names.name: 背叛本能
foreign_names.text: 获得目标生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该生物。直到回合结束，它得+2/+0且获得敏捷异能。
foreign_names.flavor: 要加入世界之魂得花费数年的研读与冥想。要切除这段联系，只需拉铎司打一个响指。

foreign_names.name: 背叛本能
foreign_names.text: 獲得目標生物的操控權直到回合結束。重置該生物。直到回合結束，它得+2/+0且獲得敏捷異能。
foreign_names.flavor: 要加入世界之魂得花費數年的研讀與冥想。要切除這段聯繫，只需拉鐸司打一個響指。

Utvara Hellkite.text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.
Utvara Hellkite.flavor: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.
Utvara Hellkite.original_text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, put a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Utvara-Höllendrache
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn ein Drache angreift, den du kontrollierst, bringe einen 6/6 roten Drache-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit ins Spiel.

foreign_names.name: Engendro de Utvara

Vuela.
Siempre que un Dragón que controles ataque, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Dragón roja 6/6 con la habilidad de volar.
foreign_names.flavor: El temor a los dragones es tan antiguo y poderoso como el miedo a la misma muerte.

foreign_names.name: Escouflenfer d'Utvara
foreign_names.text:
Vol
À chaque fois qu'un dragon que vous contrôlez attaque, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 6/6 rouge Dragon avec le vol.
foreign_names.flavor: La peur des dragons est aussi ancienne et puissante que la peur de la mort.

foreign_names.name: Nibbio Infernale di Utvara
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta un Drago che controlli attacca, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Drago 6/6 rossa con volare.
foreign_names.flavor: La paura dei draghi è antica e potente, come la paura della morte stessa.

foreign_names.name: ウトヴァラのヘルカイト
foreign_names.text:
飛行
あなたがコントロールするドラゴンが攻撃するたび、飛行を持つ赤の６/６のドラゴン・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ドラゴン
foreign_names.flavor: ドラゴンへの畏怖は死への畏怖と同じぐらい強く、古いものである。

foreign_names.name: 우트바라 지옥룡
foreign_names.text:

당신이 조종하는 용이 공격할 때마다, 비행 능력을 가진 6/6 적색 용 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 용에 대한 공포는 죽음에 대한 공포만큼이나 오래되었고 강력하다.

foreign_names.name: Dragão Avérneo de Utvara
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Toda vez que um Dragão que você controla atacar, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura vermelha 6/6 do tipo Dragão com voar.
foreign_names.flavor: O medo de dragões é tão antigo e poderoso quanto o medo da própria morte.

foreign_names.name: Утварский Змей
foreign_names.text:

Каждый раз, когда Дракон под вашим контролем атакует, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 6/6 красный Дракон с Полетом.
foreign_names.flavor: Страх перед драконами столь же древен и силен, как и страх перед смертью.

foreign_names.name: 坞瓦拉残虐者

foreign_names.flavor: 畏惧龙和畏惧死亡同样地历史长久、影响深远。

foreign_names.name: 塢瓦拉殘虐者
foreign_names.text:

每當一個由你操控的龍攻擊時，將一個6/6紅色，具飛行異能的龍衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 畏懼龍和畏懼死亡同樣地歷史長久、影響深遠。

Vandalblast.name: Vandalblast
Vandalblast.text:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Vandalblast.flavor: Beauty is in the eye of the exploder.
Vandalblast.original_text:
Destroy target artifact you don't control.
Overload {4}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: If you don’t pay the overload cost of Vandalblast, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect artifacts with hexproof or with protection from red.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as an overload cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined by only its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast that spell was.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

foreign_names.name: Vandalenrandale
foreign_names.text:
Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl, das du nicht kontrollierst.
Überlast {4}{R} (Du kannst diesen Zauber zu seinen Überlast-Kosten wirken. Falls du dies tust, verändere seinen Text, indem du im Text alle Vorkommen von „deiner Wahl" durch „jeder" ersetzt.)

Sovraccarico {4}{R} (Puoi lanciare questa magia per il suo costo di sovraccarico. Se lo fai, cambiane il testo sostituendo "un artefatto bersaglio" con "ogni artefatto".)

超過 {4}{R} （あなたはこの呪文をその超過コストで唱えてもよい。そうした場合、あなたがコントロールしていない各アーティファクトをそれぞれ破壊する。）
foreign_names.flavor: 美は爆破者の目に宿る。

foreign_names.name: 파손폭발
foreign_names.text:
당신이 조종하지 않는 마법물체 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체를 파괴한다.
과부하 {4}{R} (당신은 과부하 비용을 지불하여 이 주문을 발동할 수 있다. 그럴 경우, 이 주문은 "당신이 조종하지 않는 각 마법물체를 파괴한다"로 내용이 변한다.)
foreign_names.flavor: 아름다움이란 폭파하기 나름이다.

foreign_names.text:

Sobrecarga {4}{R} (Você pode conjurar esta mágica pagando seu custo de sobrecarga. Se fizer isso, altere seu texto substituindo todas as ocorrências de "o artefato alvo" por "cada artefato".)

foreign_names.flavor: С подрывниками не спорят.

超载{4}{R}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

foreign_names.name: 蠻野衝擊

消滅目標不由你操控的神器。
超載{4}{R}（你可以支付此咒語的超載費用來施放它。如果你如此作，將其中的「目標」字樣全部更改為「每個」。）
foreign_names.flavor: 爆破者的眼中盡是美景。

Viashino Racketeer.name: Viashino Racketeer
Viashino Racketeer.text: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Viashino Racketeer.flavor: "You may call me a fool, selling this stuff on Orzhov turf. Well, you need to be a little reckless to survive."
Viashino Racketeer.original_text: When Viashino Racketeer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

foreign_names.name: Viashino-Schieber
foreign_names.text: Wenn der Viashino-Schieber ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Karte aus der Hand abwerfen. Falls du dies tust, ziehe eine Karte.
foreign_names.flavor: „Du magst es töricht finden, dass ich diese Sachen auf dem Territorium der Orzhov verkaufe. Aber manchmal muss man eben ein wenig lebensmüde sein, um zu überleben."

foreign_names.name: Chantajista viashino
foreign_names.text: Cuando el Chantajista viashino entre al campo de batalla, puedes descartar una carta. Si lo haces, roba una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Me creerás un necio por vender estas cosas en territorio orzhov. En fin, hay que ser un poco temerario para sobrevivir."

foreign_names.name: Racketteur viashino
foreign_names.text: Quand le Racketteur viashino arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez vous défausser d'une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, piochez une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: « Traitez-moi de cinglé, pour oser vendre ça en plein territoire Orzhov. Mais il faut savoir prendre des risques si l'on veut survivre. »

foreign_names.name: Delinquente Viashino
foreign_names.text: Quando il Delinquente Viashino entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi scartare una carta. Se lo fai, pesca una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Potresti pensare che sia uno stupido, perché vendo questa roba in territorio Orzhov. Ma qualche volta devi essere temerario per sopravvivere."

foreign_names.name: ヴィーアシーノのゆすり屋
foreign_names.text: ヴィーアシーノのゆすり屋が戦場に出たとき、あなたはカードを１枚捨ててもよい。そうした場合、カードを１枚引く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ヴィーアシーノ・ならず者
foreign_names.flavor: 「こいつをオルゾフのシマで売るなんて、馬鹿だと言われるだろうな。でもよ、生き抜くためにはちょっとした無茶も必要なのさ。」

foreign_names.name: 비아시노 협잡꾼
foreign_names.text: 비아시노 협잡꾼이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 카드 한 장을 버릴 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "이런 물건을 오르조브 지역에서 파는 나를 바보 같다고 할지 몰라도, 살아남으려면 약간의 모험이 필요한 법이지."

foreign_names.name: Extorsionário Viashino
foreign_names.text: Quando Extorsionário Viashino entra no campo de batalha, você pode descartar um card. Se fizer isso, compre um card.
foreign_names.flavor: "Você pode me chamar de louco por vender essas coisas na área dos Orzhov. Bem... é preciso ser um tanto temerário para sobreviver."

foreign_names.name: Виашино-Грабитель
foreign_names.text: Когда Виашино-Грабитель выходит на поле битвы, вы можете сбросить карту. Если вы это делаете, возьмите карту.
foreign_names.flavor: «Считаете, что я дурак, раз продаю эти товары на землях Орзовов? Но чтобы выжить, иногда приходится быть безрассудным».

foreign_names.name: 诈骗凡尔西诺
foreign_names.text: 当诈骗凡尔西诺进战场时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「在欧佐夫的地盘上卖这种东西也许真的不太明智。但做人总要有点冒险精神。」

foreign_names.name: 詐騙凡爾西諾
foreign_names.text: 當詐騙凡爾西諾進戰場時，你可以棄一張牌。若你如此作，則抽一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「在歐佐夫的地盤上賣這種東西也許真的不太明智。但做人總要有點冒險精神。」

Aerial Predation.name: Aerial Predation
Aerial Predation.text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.
Aerial Predation.flavor: In the towering trees of the Samok Stand and the predators that guard them, the might of the Ravnican wild has returned.
Aerial Predation.original_text: Destroy target creature with flying. You gain 2 life.

rulings.text: You must be able to target a creature with flying to cast Aerial Predation.
If the creature with flying is an illegal target when Aerial Predation tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain 2 life.

foreign_names.name: Luftige Jagd
foreign_names.text: Zerstöre eine fliegende Kreatur deiner Wahl. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreign_names.flavor: Die zurückgekehrte Macht der Wildnis von Ravnica zeigt sich in den hoch emporragenden Bäume des Samokwäldchens und den Raubtieren, die sie bewachen.

foreign_names.name: Depredación aérea
foreign_names.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo con la habilidad de volar. Ganas 2 vidas.
foreign_names.flavor: Con los altísimos árboles de la Espesura de Samok y los depredadores que los custodian ha regresado la fuerza de la naturaleza de Rávnica.

foreign_names.name: Cycle alimentaire aérien
foreign_names.text: Détruisez une créature avec le vol ciblée. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
foreign_names.flavor: Entre les arbres monumentaux de la Position de Samok et les prédateurs qui les protègent, la puissance de la nature de Ravnica est de retour.

foreign_names.name: Assalto Aereo
foreign_names.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con volare. Guadagni 2 punti vita.
foreign_names.flavor: Negli alberi torreggianti del Bosco Samok e nei predatori che li sorvegliano, si manifesta il potere redivivo della natura di Ravnica.

foreign_names.name: 空中捕食
foreign_names.text: 飛行を持つクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。あなたは２点のライフを得る。
foreign_names.flavor: サーモク木立の背の高い木々とそれを守る捕食者の中で、ラヴニカの自然は力を取り戻した。

foreign_names.name: 공중 포식
foreign_names.text: 비행 능력을 가진 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 사목 스탠드 숲의 높이 솟은 나무들과 그것을 지키는 포식자들에게 라브니카의 야생의 힘이 돌아왔다.

foreign_names.name: Predação Aérea
foreign_names.text: Destrua a criatura alvo com voar. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
foreign_names.flavor: Nas imponentes árvores do Arvoredo de Samok, e nos predadores que as protegem, a força selvagem de Ravnica retornou.

foreign_names.name: Охота в Воздухе
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо с Полетом. Вы получаете 2 жизни.
foreign_names.flavor: Мощь дикой природы Равники живет в вековых деревьях Самокского леса и хищниках, его охраняющих.

foreign_names.name: 空中猎捕
foreign_names.text: 消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。你获得2点生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 在耸立的撒莫林树木以及守护这些树木的掠食者之间，拉尼卡的瀚力已复归。

foreign_names.name: 空中獵捕
foreign_names.text: 消滅目標具飛行異能的生物。你獲得2點生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 在聳立的撒莫林樹木以及守護這些樹木的掠食者之間，拉尼卡的瀚力已復歸。

Archweaver.name: Archweaver
Archweaver.flavor: The silk of the archweavers adds structural integrity to otherwise unstable Izzet building sites.

foreign_names.name: Erzweber
foreign_names.text: Reichweite, verursacht Trampelschaden
foreign_names.flavor: Die Seide der Erzweber sorgt für die strukturelle Integrität der sonst instabilen Bauten der Izzet.

foreign_names.name: Arcotejedora
foreign_names.text: Alcance, arrolla.
foreign_names.flavor: La seda de las arcotejedoras añade integridad estructural a los edificios ízzet, inestables de por sí.

foreign_names.name: Tisseuse d'arche
foreign_names.text: Portée, piétinement
foreign_names.flavor: La soie des tisseuses d'arche assure une intégrité structurelle aux chantiers des Izzet.

foreign_names.name: Gran Tessitore
foreign_names.text: Raggiungere, travolgere
foreign_names.flavor: La seta dei gran tessitori aggiunge integrità strutturale alle costruzioni Izzet, altrimenti instabili.

foreign_names.name: 大織り手
foreign_names.text: 到達、トランプル
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 蜘蛛
foreign_names.flavor: 大織り手の吐き出す糸は、もともと不安定だったイゼット団の建物に構造的完全性を与えている。

foreign_names.name: 큰거미줄 거미
foreign_names.text: 대공, 돌진
foreign_names.flavor: 이 거미의 거미줄은 불안정한 이젯 건축물의 내구성을 올려준다.

foreign_names.name: Tecedeira de Arcos
foreign_names.text: Alcance, atropelar
foreign_names.flavor: A teia das tecedeiras de arcos confere integridade estrutural às construções dos Izzet que, sem elas, seriam instáveis.

foreign_names.name: Арочный Плетельщик
foreign_names.text: Захват, Пробивной удар
foreign_names.flavor: Шелк, вырабатываемый арочными плетельщиками, придает устойчивость хрупким постройкам Иззетов.

foreign_names.name: 拱门蜘蛛
foreign_names.text: 延势，践踏
foreign_names.flavor: 拱门蜘蛛吐的丝替原本不那么稳定的伊捷建筑工地增强了结构完整性。

foreign_names.name: 拱門蜘蛛
foreign_names.text: 延勢，踐踏
foreign_names.flavor: 拱門蜘蛛吐的絲替原本不那麼穩定的伊捷建築工地增強了結構完整性。

Axebane Guardian.name: Axebane Guardian
Axebane Guardian.text:
Defender
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
Axebane Guardian.flavor: Only a worthy few are permitted within the sentient forest known as Axebane.
Axebane Guardian.original_text:
Defender
{T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.

rulings.text: Axebane Guardian’s activated ability is a mana ability. It doesn’t use the stack and can’t be responded to. The number of creatures with defender you control is counted, and the color(s) of mana produced chosen, immediately after the ability is activated when the ability resolves.

foreign_names.name: Wächter des Beilbrecherwalds
foreign_names.text:
Verteidiger
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um X Mana in einer beliebigen Kombination von Farben, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Kreaturen mit Verteidiger ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: Nur wenige Würdige erhalten Einlass in den denkenden Forst, der als Beilbrecherwald bekannt ist.

foreign_names.name: Guardián de Rompehachas
foreign_names.text:
Defensor.
{T}: Agrega X manás de cualquier combinación de color a tu reserva de maná, donde X es el número de criaturas con la habilidad de defensor que controlas.
foreign_names.flavor: Sólo a unos pocos elegidos se les permite adentrarse en el bosque viviente conocido como Rompehachas.

foreign_names.name: Vigile de Fléaudhache
foreign_names.text:
Défenseur
{T} : Ajoutez X manas de la combinaison de mana coloré de votre choix à votre réserve, X étant le nombre de créatures avec le défenseur que vous contrôlez.
foreign_names.flavor: Seuls quelques rares élus ont accès à la forêt pensante qu'on appelle Fléaudhache.

foreign_names.name: Guardiano di Rovina-Asce
foreign_names.text:
Difensore
{T}: Aggiungi X mana in qualsiasi combinazione di colori alla tua riserva di mana, dove X è il numero di creature con difensore che controlli.
foreign_names.flavor: Solo chi è degno viene ammesso nella foresta senziente nota come Rovina-Asce.

foreign_names.name: 斧折りの守護者
foreign_names.text:
防衛
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色の組み合わせのマナＸ点を加える。Ｘはあなたがコントロールする防衛を持つクリーチャーの総数に等しい。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ドルイド
foreign_names.flavor: 斧折りとして知られる生ける森に足を踏み入れられるのは、一握りの価値ある者だけである。

foreign_names.name: 액스베인 수호자
foreign_names.text:
수비태세
{T}: 원하는 색의 조합으로 마나 X개를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다. X는 당신이 조종하는 생물 중 수비태세 능력을 가진 생물의 수다.
foreign_names.flavor: 극소수의 자격 있는 자만이 살아있는 숲 액스베인에 들어갈 수 있다.

foreign_names.name: Guardião de Danação dos Machados
foreign_names.text:
Defensor
{T}: Adicione X manas em qualquer combinação de cores a sua reserva de mana, sendo X igual ao número de criaturas com defensor que você controla.
foreign_names.flavor: A apenas uns poucos dignos é permitida a entrada na floresta senciente conhecida como Danação dos Machados.

foreign_names.name: Хранитель Глухолесья
foreign_names.text:
Защитник
{T}: добавьте Х маны в любой комбинации цветов в ваше хранилище маны, где Х — количество существ с Защитником под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor: Лишь избранным дозволено входить в запретную чащу, прозванную Глухолесьем.

foreign_names.name: 禁伐林守护者
foreign_names.text:
守军
{T}：加X点法术力到你的法术力池中，其颜色组合可任意选择，X为由你操控的具守军异能的生物数量。
foreign_names.flavor: 只有少数精英才获准进入禁伐林这片具有感知能力的树林。

foreign_names.name: 禁伐林守護者
foreign_names.text:
守軍
{T}：加X點魔法力到你的魔法力池中，其顏色組合可任意選擇，X為由你操控的具守軍異能的生物數量。
foreign_names.flavor: 只有少數精英才獲准進入禁伐林這片具有感知能力的樹林。

Axebane Stag.name: Axebane Stag
Axebane Stag.flavor:
"When the spires have burned and the cobblestones are dust, he will take his rightful place as king of the wilds."
—Kirce, Axebane guardian

foreign_names.name: Hirsch aus dem Beilbrecherwald
foreign_names.flavor: „Wenn die Türme verbrannt und das Kopfsteinpflaster zu Staub geworden ist, wird er seinen rechtmäßigen Platz als König der Wildnis einnehmen." —Kirce, Wächterin des Beilbrecherwaldes

foreign_names.name: Ciervo de Rompehachas
foreign_names.flavor: "Cuando los chapiteles hayan ardido y los adoquines sean polvo, él tomará el puesto que le corresponde como rey de la naturaleza." —Kirce, guardiana de Rompehachas

foreign_names.name: Cerf de Fléaudhache
foreign_names.flavor: « Quand les tours auront brulé et que les pavés seront réduits en poussière, il retrouvera son statut mérité de roi des terres sauvages. » —Kirce, vigile de Fléaudhache

foreign_names.name: Cervo di Rovina-Asce
foreign_names.flavor: "Quando le guglie saranno bruciate e il selciato sarà polvere, prenderà il posto che gli spetta come sovrano della natura." —Kirce, guardiana di Rovina-Asce

foreign_names.name: 斧折りの雄鹿
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 大鹿
foreign_names.flavor: 「尖塔が焼け落ち玉石が塵になるとき、彼は野生の王としてあるべき地位につくであろう。」 ――斧折りの守護者、キース

foreign_names.name: 액스베인 숫사슴
foreign_names.flavor: "첨탑이 불타고 벽돌이 가루가 될 때, 그는 야생의 왕좌를 되찾을 것이다." —액스베인 수호자 키르체

foreign_names.name: Cervo de Danação dos Machados
foreign_names.flavor: "Quando as torres tiverem queimado e as pedras das ruas virarem pó, ele assumirá seu lugar de direito como rei das terras selvagens." — Kirce, guardião de Danação dos Machados

foreign_names.name: Благородный Олень Глухолесья
foreign_names.flavor: «Когда падут шпили и мостовые превратятся в пыль, он займет свое место — место владыки диких просторов». — Кирси, хранительница Глухолесья

foreign_names.name: 禁伐林鹿
foreign_names.flavor: 「当海枯石烂时，他将取得他应有的地位，成为大自然之王。」 ～禁伐林守护者科丝

foreign_names.name: 禁伐林鹿
foreign_names.flavor: 「當海枯石爛時，他將取得他應有的地位，成為大自然之王。」 ～禁伐林守護者科絲

Brushstrider.name: Brushstrider
Brushstrider.flavor: Magistrate Ludy agreed to designate land for the brushstriders only after several broken windows and dozens of missing blini-cakes.

foreign_names.name: Gestrüppläufer
foreign_names.text: Wachsamkeit
foreign_names.flavor: Erst als etliche Fenster zu Bruch gegangen und Dutzende von Pfannkuchen verschwunden waren, war Magistrat Ludy schließlich bereit, den Gestrüppläufern Land zuzuweisen.

foreign_names.name: Zancoarbusto
foreign_names.text: Vigilancia.
foreign_names.flavor: El magistrado Ludy accedió a destinar tierras a los zancoarbustos tras la rotura de varias ventanas y la desaparición de docenas de pastas de té.

foreign_names.name: Enjambeur de broussailles
foreign_names.text: Vigilance
foreign_names.flavor: Le magistrat Ludy concéda des terres aux enjambeurs de broussailles après plusieurs bris de fenêtre et la disparition de dizaines de gâteaux.

foreign_names.name: Errante Boscoso
foreign_names.text: Cautela
foreign_names.flavor: Il Magistrato Ludy ha acconsentito ad assegnare terre agli erranti boscosi solo dopo diverse finestre rotte e varie dozzine di torte scomparse.

foreign_names.name: 刷毛履き
foreign_names.text: 警戒
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreign_names.flavor: 何枚もの窓が割られ、何十個というブリーニ菓子が消えるようになってはじめて、行政官ルーディは刷毛履きのための土地を制定することに同意した。

foreign_names.name: 수풀 위로 걷는 야수
foreign_names.text: 경계
foreign_names.flavor: 치안 판사 루디는 창문 여러 개가 깨지고 수많은 케이크가 사라진 후에야 그 야수들의 서식지를 만들어주는 것에 동의했다.

foreign_names.name: Salta-mato
foreign_names.text: Vigilância
foreign_names.flavor: O magistrado Ludy só concordou em demarcar terras para os salta-matos depois de várias janelas quebradas e dúzias de bolinhos de chá desaparecidos.

foreign_names.name: Кустомерка
foreign_names.text: Бдительность
foreign_names.flavor: Магистрат Луди согласился выделить землю для кустомерок только после того, как было разбито несколько окон и пропало множество булочек.

foreign_names.name: 拂行兽
foreign_names.text: 警戒
foreign_names.flavor: 在破了几扇窗、少了许多薄饼糕后，执政官鲁迪终于同意替拂行兽指派一片专属土地。

foreign_names.name: 拂行獸
foreign_names.text: 警戒
foreign_names.flavor: 在破了幾扇窗、少了許多薄餅糕後，執政官魯迪終於同意替拂行獸指派一片專屬土地。

Centaur's Herald.name: Centaur's Herald
Centaur's Herald.text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Centaur's Herald: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
Centaur's Herald.flavor: The farther they go from Vitu-Ghazi, the less willing the crowd is to part for them.
Centaur's Herald.original_text: {2}{G}, Sacrifice Centaur's Herald: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Once you activate the ability of Centaur’s Herald, it’s too late for a player to respond by trying to destroy it or otherwise stop you from sacrificing it.
You can only sacrifice Centaur’s Herald once, so it’s not possible to activate its ability more than once.

foreign_names.name: Heroldin des Zentauren
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, opfere die Heroldin des Zentauren: Bringe einen 3/3 grünen Zentaur-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
foreign_names.flavor: Je weiter sie sich von Vitu-Ghazi entfernen, desto unwilliger macht man ihnen Platz.

foreign_names.name: Heraldo del centauro
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, sacrificar la Heraldo del centauro: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Centauro verde 3/3.
foreign_names.flavor: Cuanto más se alejaban de Vitu-Ghazi, menos dispuesta estaba la gente a abrirles paso.

foreign_names.name: Héraut du centaure
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, sacrifiez le Héraut du centaure : Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 3/3 verte Centaure.
foreign_names.flavor: Plus ils s'éloignent de Vitu-Ghazi, moins la foule est désireuse de les laisser passer.

foreign_names.name: Messaggera del Centauro
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, Sacrifica la Messaggera del Centauro: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Centauro 3/3 verde.
foreign_names.flavor: Più si allontanano da Vitu-Ghazi, più la folla è riluttante a parteggiare per loro.

foreign_names.name: ケンタウルスの伝令
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, ケンタウルスの伝令を生け贄に捧げる：緑の３/３のケンタウルス・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・スカウト
foreign_names.flavor: ヴィトゥ＝ガジーから遠く離れるにつれて、群衆はそこから離れがたく感じるのだ。

foreign_names.name: 켄타우로스의 전령
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, 켄타우로스의 전령을 희생한다: 3/3 녹색 켄타우로스 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 비투-가지로부터 멀어질수록 사람들이 그들을 위해 길을 비켜주는 경우가 줄어든다.

foreign_names.name: Arauto do Centauro
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, Sacrifique Arauto do Centauro: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 3/3 do tipo Centauro.
foreign_names.flavor: Quanto mais eles se afastam de Vitu-Ghazi, menos a multidão se dispõe a lhes dar passagem.

foreign_names.name: Вестница Кентавра
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}, пожертвуйте Вестницу Кентавра: положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 3/3 зеленый Кентавр.
foreign_names.flavor: Чем дальше они отходят от Виту-Гази, тем менее охотно расступается перед ними толпа.

foreign_names.name: 半人马的传令使
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}，牺牲半人马的传令使：将一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 他们离维图加基越远，就让群众越加忠贞。

foreign_names.name: 半人馬的傳令使
foreign_names.text: {2}{G}，犧牲半人馬的傳令使：將一個3/3綠色半人馬衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 他們離維圖加基越遠，就讓群眾越加忠貞。

Chorus of Might.name: Chorus of Might
Chorus of Might.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.
Chorus of Might.flavor:
"In each of us is the strength of all of us."
—Trostani
Chorus of Might.original_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+1 for each creature you control and gains trample.

rulings.text: The number of creatures you control is counted only when Chorus of Might resolves.

foreign_names.name: Chor der Macht
foreign_names.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges verursacht eine Kreatur deiner Wahl Trampelschaden und erhält +1/+1 für jede Kreatur, die du kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: „Jeder einzelne von uns verfügt über die Stärke von uns allen." —Trostani

foreign_names.name: Coro del poder
foreign_names.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo obtiene +1/+1 por cada criatura que controlas y gana la habilidad de arrollar.
foreign_names.flavor: "En el interior de cada uno está la fuerza de todos nosotros." —Trostani

foreign_names.name: Chœur de la puissance
foreign_names.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la créature ciblée gagne +1/+1 pour chaque créature que vous contrôlez et elle acquiert le piétinement.
foreign_names.flavor: « Notre force à tous est en chacun de nous. » —Trostani

foreign_names.name: Coro della Potenza
foreign_names.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio prende +1/+1 per ogni creatura che controlli e ha travolgere.
foreign_names.flavor: "In ognuno di noi c'è la forza di tutti noi." —Trostani

foreign_names.name: 力の合唱
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まであなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体につき＋１/＋１の修整を受けるとともにトランプルを得る。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我ら一人ひとりの中に、我ら全員の力があるのです。」 ――トロスターニ

foreign_names.name: 힘의 합창
foreign_names.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개당 +1/+1을 받고 돌진 능력을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "우리 각자에게는 우리 모두의 힘이 있다." —트로스타니

foreign_names.name: Coro do Poder
foreign_names.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo recebe +1/+1 para cada criatura que você controla e ganha atropelar.
foreign_names.flavor: "A força de todos nós está em cada um de nós." — Trostani

foreign_names.name: Хор Могущества
foreign_names.text: До конца хода целевое существо получает +1/+1 за каждое существо под вашим контролем и Пробивной удар.
foreign_names.flavor: «В каждом из нас живет сила всех нас». — Тростани

foreign_names.name: 瀚力韵集

foreign_names.flavor: 「每个人的心中都有着我们全体的力量。」 ～卓塔妮

foreign_names.flavor: 「每個人的心中都有著我們全體的力量。」 ～卓塔妮

Deadbridge Goliath.name: Deadbridge Goliath
Deadbridge Goliath.text: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

Druid's Deliverance.name: Druid's Deliverance
Druid's Deliverance.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Druid's Deliverance.flavor: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."
Druid's Deliverance.original_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.
You can cast Druid’s Deliverance even if you don’t control any creature tokens.
Combat damage dealt to creatures or planeswalkers you control won’t be prevented.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, combat damage dealt to your teammate won’t be prevented.

Horncaller's Chant.name: Horncaller's Chant
Horncaller's Chant.text: Create a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Horncaller's Chant.flavor:
"The Selesnya are gathering armies. Do you still believe they aren't preparing for war?"
—Teysa, to Isperia
Horncaller's Chant.original_text: Put a 4/4 green Rhino creature token with trample onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

Mana Bloom.name: Mana Bloom
Mana Bloom.text:
Mana Bloom enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Remove a charge counter from Mana Bloom: Add one mana of any color. Activate only once each turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Mana Bloom has no charge counters on it, return it to its owner's hand.
Mana Bloom.original_text:
Mana Bloom enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it.
Remove a charge counter from Mana Bloom: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Mana Bloom has no charge counters on it, return it to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Mana Bloom’s last ability will trigger only if it has no charge counters on it at the beginning of your upkeep. If it has one charge counter on it as your turn begins, you won’t have priority to remove the counter until after this check.

foreign_names.name: Manablüte
foreign_names.text:
Die Manablüte kommt mit X Ladungsmarken ins Spiel.
Entferne eine Ladungsmarke von der Manablüte: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur einmal pro Zug.
Falls zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments keine Ladungsmarken auf der Manablüte liegen, bringe sie auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreign_names.name: Florecimiento de maná
foreign_names.text:
El Florecimiento de maná entra al campo de batalla con X contadores de carga sobre él.
Remover un contador de carga del Florecimiento de maná: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná. Activa esta habilidad sólo una vez cada turno.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, si el Florecimiento de maná no tiene contadores de carga sobre él, regrésalo a la mano de su propietario.

foreign_names.name: Floraison de mana
foreign_names.text:
La Floraison de mana arrive sur le champ de bataille avec X marqueurs « charge » sur elle.
Retirez un marqueur « charge » de la Floraison de mana : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. N'activez cette capacité qu'une seule fois par tour.
Au début de votre entretien, si la Floraison de mana n'a aucun marqueur « charge » sur elle, renvoyez-la dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreign_names.name: Fioritura di Mana
foreign_names.text:
La Fioritura di Mana entra nel campo di battaglia con X segnalini carica.
Rimuovi un segnalino carica dalla Fioritura di Mana: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana. Attiva questa abilità solo una volta per turno.
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, se la Fioritura di Mana non ha segnalini carica, falla tornare in mano al suo proprietario.

foreign_names.name: マナの花
foreign_names.text:
マナの花は、蓄積カウンターがＸ個置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
マナの花の上から蓄積カウンターを１個取り除く：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。この能力は、毎ターン１回のみ起動できる。
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、マナの花の上に蓄積カウンターが置かれていなかった場合、これをオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreign_names.name: 마나 만발
foreign_names.text:
마나 만발은 충전 카운터 X개를 가진 채로 전장에 들어온다.
마나 만발에서 충전 카운터 한 개를 제거한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다. 이 능력은 한 턴에 한 번씩만 활성화할 수 있다.
당신의 유지단 시작에, 마나 만발에 충전 카운터가 없다면 마나 만발을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreign_names.name: Расцвет Маны

В начале вашего шага поддержки, если на Расцвете Маны нет жетонов заряда, верните его в руку его владельца.
