foreign_names.flavor: ガラスと石でできた垂直の建物が林立するラヴニカの街並みからは、地平線がわずかに顔を見せるのみである。

foreign_names.name: 지평선을 찾아서
foreign_names.text: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드를 최대 세 장까지 찾아 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 유리와 돌로 지은 뾰족한 첨탑들로 가득한 라브니카에서는 지평선을 보는 게 거의 불가능하다.

foreign_names.name: Procurar o Horizonte
foreign_names.text: Procure em seu grimório até três cards de terreno básico, revele-os e coloque-os em sua mão. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreign_names.flavor: Cortado por espigões verticais de pedra e vidro, o panorama de Ravnica oferece apenas um mero esboço do horizonte.

foreign_names.name: Поиск Горизонта
foreign_names.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке не более трех карт базовых земель, покажите их и положите их в вашу руку. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.
foreign_names.flavor: Виды Равники, изрезанные торчащими шпилями из стекла и камня, закрывают от взгляда саму кромку горизонта.

foreign_names.name: 探寻天际
foreign_names.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多三张基本地牌，展示这些牌，并将它们置入你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 拉尼卡的景色充斥耸立的玻璃与石头尖塔，只能得见少许的地平线。

foreign_names.name: 探尋天際
foreign_names.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋至多三張基本地牌，展示這些牌，並將它們置入你手上。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 拉尼卡的景色充斥聳立的玻璃與石頭尖塔，只能得見少許的地平線。

Slime Molding.name: Slime Molding
Slime Molding.text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token.
Slime Molding.flavor:
"Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
Slime Molding.original_text: Put an X/X green Ooze creature token onto the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Schleimformung
foreign_names.text: Bringe einen X/X grünen Schlammwesen-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
foreign_names.flavor: „Gib mir nur genug Abfälle und Mana, und ich beschwöre einen Schleim herbei, der ganz Ravnica verschlingen kann." —Cevraya, Golgari-Schamane

foreign_names.name: Moldear el cieno
foreign_names.text: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Cieno verde X/X.
foreign_names.flavor: "Dame suficientes desechos y maná e invocaré un cieno que sepultará toda Rávnica." —Cevraya, chamán golgari

foreign_names.name: Façonnage de boue
foreign_names.text: Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature X/X verte Limon.
foreign_names.flavor: « Donnez-moi suffisamment de déchets et de mana et j'invoquerai un limon capable d'engloutir tout Ravnica. » —Cevraya, shamane de Golgari

foreign_names.name: Plasmare la Melma
foreign_names.text: Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Melma X/X verde.
foreign_names.flavor: "Dammi abbastanza rifiuti e mana e ti evocherò una melma in grado di ingoiare Ravnica intera." —Cevraya, sciamana Golgari

foreign_names.name: スライム成形
foreign_names.text: 緑のＸ/Ｘのウーズ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.flavor: 「廃棄物とマナさえ十分にあれば、ラヴニカ全土を覆い尽くすほどのウーズを召喚してやるわよ。」 ――ゴルガリのシャーマン、セヴリヤ

foreign_names.name: 점액 조형
foreign_names.text: X/X 녹색 점액괴물 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "내게 쓰레기와 마나만 충분히 준다면 나는 라브니카 전체를 짐어삼킬 수 있는 점액괴물을 소환할 것이다." —골가리 주술사 세브라야

foreign_names.name: Moldagem de Limo
foreign_names.text: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde X/X do tipo Lodo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Com lixo e mana suficiente, eu posso invocar um lodo capaz de engolir toda Ravnica." — Cevraya, xamã Golgari

foreign_names.name: Появление Слизи
foreign_names.text: Положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа Х/Х зеленая Тина.
foreign_names.flavor: «Дайте мне достаточно мусора и маны, и я смогу вызвать тину, которая поглотит всю Равнику целиком». — Севрайя, шаманка Голгари

foreign_names.name: 黏泞塑型
foreign_names.text: 将一个X/X绿色流浆衍生生物放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 「给我足够的废物和法术力，我就能召唤可将拉尼卡整个吞没的流浆。」 ～葛加理祭师习拉雅

foreign_names.name: 黏濘塑型
foreign_names.text: 將一個X/X綠色流漿衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 「給我足夠的廢物和魔法力，我就能召喚可將拉尼卡整個吞沒的流漿。」 ～葛加理祭師習拉雅

Stonefare Crocodile.name: Stonefare Crocodile
Stonefare Crocodile.text: {2}{B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Stonefare Crocodile.flavor: The Izzet's plans to exploit the undercity ran into a few stubborn obstacles.
Stonefare Crocodile.original_text: {2}{B}: Stonefare Crocodile gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

rulings.text: multiple instances of lifelink on the same creature are redundant. Activating Stonefare Crocodile’s ability more than once during a single turn won’t cause you to gain more life.

foreign_names.name: Steinvahr-Krokodil
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Das Steinvahr-Krokodil erhält Lebensverknüpfung bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Schaden, der von dieser Kreatur zugefügt wird, lässt dich ebenso viele Lebenspunkte dazu erhalten.)
foreign_names.flavor: Die Pläne der Izzet, die Unterstadt auszubeuten, stießen auf ein paar hartnäckige Hindernisse.

foreign_names.name: Cocodrilo de Paso Pétreo
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: El Cocodrilo de Paso Pétreo gana la habilidad de vínculo vital hasta el final del turno. (El daño hecho por esta criatura también hace que ganes esa misma cantidad de vidas.)
foreign_names.flavor: Los planes de los ízzet para aprovecharse de la subciudad toparon con ciertos obstáculos muy tercos.

foreign_names.name: Crocodile du canal de pierre
foreign_names.text: {2}{B} : Le Crocodile du canal de pierre acquiert le lien de vie jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Les blessures infligées par cette créature vous font aussi gagner autant de points de vie.)
foreign_names.flavor: Les plans d'exploitation de la Citerraine par les Izzet se heurtèrent à quelques obstacles.

foreign_names.name: Coccodrillo di Borgosasso
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Il Coccodrillo di Borgosasso ha legame vitale fino alla fine del turno. (Il danno inflitto da questa creatura ti fa anche guadagnare altrettanti punti vita.)
foreign_names.flavor: I piani degli Izzet per sfruttare la città sepolta incontrarono alcuni ostacoli coriacei.

foreign_names.name: 石載りのクロコダイル
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}：石載りのクロコダイルはターン終了時まで絆魂を得る。（このクリーチャーがダメージを与える場合、さらにあなたはその点数分のライフを得る。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — クロコダイル
foreign_names.flavor: イゼット団の地底街の活用策は、いくつかの厄介な障害物に遭遇した。

foreign_names.name: 바위거리 악어
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: 바위거리 악어는 턴종료까지 생명연결 능력을 얻는다. (이 생물이 피해를 입히면, 이 생물의 조종자는 그 피해만큼의 생명점을 얻는다.)
foreign_names.flavor: 지하 도시를 착취하려는 이젯 길드의 계획은 몇 가지 강력한 장애물에 부딪혔다.

foreign_names.name: Crocodilo de Petreovila
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Crocodilo de Petreovila ganha vínculo com a vida até o final do turno. (O dano causado por esta criatura também faz com que você ganhe uma quantidade equivalente de pontos de vida.)
foreign_names.flavor: Os planos dos Izzet para explorar o submundo encontraram alguns teimosos obstáculos.

foreign_names.name: Стоунферский Крокодил
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}: Стоунферский Крокодил получает Цепь жизни до конца хода. (Повреждения, наносимые этим существом, также заставляют вас получить такое же количество жизней.)
foreign_names.flavor: Планы Иззетов по использованию подземного города уперлись в несколько весомых препятствий.

foreign_names.name: 石展鳄鱼
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}：石展鳄鱼获得系命异能直到回合结束。（此生物所造成的伤害会让你获得等量的生命。）
foreign_names.flavor: 伊捷利用地底城的计划遇上了难缠的阻碍。

foreign_names.name: 石展鱷魚
foreign_names.text: {2}{B}：石展鱷魚獲得繫命異能直到回合結束。（此生物所造成的傷害會讓你獲得等量的生命。）
foreign_names.flavor: 伊捷利用地底城的計畫遇上了難纏的阻礙。

Towering Indrik.name: Towering Indrik
Towering Indrik.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Towering Indrik.flavor: It chases its airborne prey relentlessly, heedless to what it pulverizes beneath its hooves.
Towering Indrik.original_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

foreign_names.name: Aufragendes Indrik
foreign_names.text: Reichweite (Diese Kreatur kann fliegende Kreaturen blocken.)
foreign_names.flavor: Es jagt unbarmherzig seine fliegende Beute, ohne darauf zu achten, was es unter seinen Hufen zermalmt.

foreign_names.name: Indrik imponente
foreign_names.text: Alcance. (Esta criatura puede bloquear criaturas con la habilidad de volar.)
foreign_names.flavor: Persigue a su víctima aérea de forma implacable, ajeno a todo cuanto pueda pulverizar bajo sus pezuñas.

foreign_names.name: Indrik imposant
foreign_names.text: Portée (Cette créature peut bloquer les créatures avec le vol.)
foreign_names.flavor: Il traque inlassablement ses proies ailées, sans égard pour ce qu'il pulvérise sous ses sabots.

foreign_names.name: Indrik Torreggiante
foreign_names.text: Raggiungere (Questa creatura può bloccare le creature con volare.)
foreign_names.flavor: Insegue implacabile la sua preda volante, ignaro di ciò che polverizza con gli zoccoli.

foreign_names.name: そびえ立つインドリク
foreign_names.text: 到達（このクリーチャーでは飛行を持つクリーチャーをブロックできる。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreign_names.flavor: それは自らの蹄が何を粉砕するかなどお構いなしに、空飛ぶ獲物をしつこく追い回す。

foreign_names.name: 우뚝 솟은 인드릭
foreign_names.text: 대공 (이 생물은 비행 능력을 가진 생물을 방어할 수 있다.)
foreign_names.flavor: 그것은 자신의 발굽 아래 무엇이 부서지든 아랑곳하지 않고 공중에 있는 먹잇감을 끈질기게 추적한다.

foreign_names.name: Indrik Altaneiro
foreign_names.text: Alcance (Esta criatura pode bloquear criaturas com voar.)
foreign_names.flavor: Ele persegue suas presas voadoras incansavelmente, sem ligar para o que pulveriza com seus cascos.

foreign_names.name: Возвышающийся Индрик
foreign_names.text: Захват (Это существо может блокировать существа с Полетом.)
foreign_names.flavor: Он упорно преследует свою летающую добычу, не обращая внимания на то, что именно крошит своими копытами.

foreign_names.name: 雄立巨犀兽
foreign_names.text: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）
foreign_names.flavor: 他会一直追捕飞空猎物，完全不顾其蹄下所粉碎的亡魂。

foreign_names.name: 雄立巨犀獸
foreign_names.text: 延勢（此生物能阻擋具飛行異能的生物。）
foreign_names.flavor: 牠會一直追捕飛空獵物，完全不顧其蹄下所粉碎的亡魂。

Urban Burgeoning.name: Urban Burgeoning
Urban Burgeoning.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."
Urban Burgeoning.flavor: The ruins of Old Prahv became a wildspace, although all birdsong was silenced by lingering Azorius magic.
Urban Burgeoning.original_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "Untap this land during each other player's untap step."

rulings.text: The enchanted land untaps at the same time as the active player’s permanents. You can’t choose to not untap it at that time.
Effects that state that the enchanted land doesn’t untap during your untap step won’t apply during another player’s untap step.

foreign_names.name: Aufkeimende Stadt
foreign_names.text:
Landverzauberung
Das verzauberte Land hat „Enttappe dieses Land während des Enttappsegments jedes anderen Spielers."
foreign_names.flavor: Die Ruinen des Alten Pravh verwandelten sich in eine Wildnis, obwohl die noch vorhandene Azorius-Magie alles Vogelgezwitscher verstummen ließ.

foreign_names.name: Germinación urbana
foreign_names.text:
Encantar tierra.
La tierra encantada tiene "Endereza esta tierra durante el paso de enderezar de cada uno de los demás jugadores".
foreign_names.flavor: Las ruinas de Vieja Prahv se convirtieron en un lugar salvaje, pese a que el canto de los pájaros era silenciado por la persistente magia azoria.

foreign_names.name: Bourgeonnement urbain
foreign_names.text:
Enchanter : terrain
Le terrain enchanté a « Dégagez ce terrain pendant l'étape de dégagement de chaque autre joueur. »
foreign_names.flavor: Les ruines de l'Ancien Prahv retournèrent à l'état sauvage, bien que magie résiduelle d'Azorius fit taire tous les chants d'oiseau.

foreign_names.name: Crescita Urbana
foreign_names.text:
Incanta terra
La terra incantata ha "STAPpa questa terra durante lo STAP di ogni altro giocatore".
foreign_names.flavor: Le rovine del Vecchio Prahv divennero un luogo selvaggio; anche se i residui della magia Azorius imponevano il silenzio agli uccelli.

foreign_names.name: 都の芽吹き
foreign_names.text:
エンチャント（土地）
エンチャントされている土地は「他の各プレイヤーのアンタップ・ステップにこの土地をアンタップする。」を持つ。
foreign_names.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreign_names.flavor: 旧プラーフの遺跡は自然に還っていた。アゾリウスの魔法の名残があらゆる鳥の囀りをかき消してはいるが。

foreign_names.name: 급속한 녹지화
foreign_names.text:
대지에게 부여
부여된 대지는 "다른 플레이어의 언탭단마다 이 대지를 언탭한다."라는 능력을 가진다.
foreign_names.flavor: 잔존하는 아조리우스 길드의 마법으로 인해 새들이 지저귀는 소리는 들리지 않지만, 올드 프라브의 유적지는 야생의 공간이 되었다.

foreign_names.name: Crescimento Urbano
foreign_names.text:
Encantar terreno
O terreno encantado tem "Desvire este terreno durante a etapa de desvirar de cada outro jogador."
foreign_names.flavor: As ruínas da Velha Prahv transformaram-se numa área selvagem, mesmo que todo canto de pássaro tenha sido silenciado pela magia Azorius remanescente.

foreign_names.name: Городское Цветение
foreign_names.text:
Зачаровать землю
Зачарованная земля имеет способность «Разверните эту землю во время шага разворота каждого другого игрока».
foreign_names.flavor: Руины Старого Права были поглощены дикой природой — хотя все певчие птицы были заглушены магией Азориусов.

foreign_names.name: 城市萌芽
foreign_names.text:
结附于地
所结附的地具有「于每位其他牌手的重置步骤中重置此地。」
foreign_names.flavor: 旧布拉夫遗迹成为了一片野生空间，尽管所有的雀鸟都因俄佐立法术而无声无息。

foreign_names.name: 城市萌芽
foreign_names.text:
結附於地
所結附的地具有「於每位其他玩家的重置步驟中重置此地。」
foreign_names.flavor: 舊布拉夫遺跡成為了一片野生空間，儘管所有的雀鳥都因俄佐立魔法而無聲無息。

Wild Beastmaster.name: Wild Beastmaster
Wild Beastmaster.text: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.
Wild Beastmaster.flavor: "When they covered the world in city, all they did was give themselves nowhere to run."
Wild Beastmaster.original_text: Whenever Wild Beastmaster attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Wild Beastmaster's power.

rulings.text: The value of X is determined when the triggered ability resolves. If Wild Beastmaster is no longer on the battlefield at that time, use its last known power to determine the value of X.
If this creature’s power is negative as its ability resolves, X is considered to be 0. (This is a change from previous rulings.)

foreign_names.name: Wilde Bändigerin
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn die Wilde Bändigerin angreift, erhält jede andere Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, +X/+X bis zum Ende des Zuges, wobei X gleich der Stärke der Wilden Bändigerin ist.
foreign_names.flavor: „Indem sie die ganze Welt mit der Stadt überbauten, nahmen sie sich selbst jegliche Fluchtmöglichkeit."

foreign_names.name: Domadora salvaje
foreign_names.text: Siempre que la Domadora salvaje ataque, cada otra criatura que controlas obtiene +X/+X hasta el final del turno, donde X es la fuerza de la Domadora salvaje.
foreign_names.flavor: "Cuando cubrieron el mundo con la ciudad, lo único que hicieron fue negarse un lugar adonde huir."

foreign_names.name: Sauvage maîtresse des bêtes
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois que la Sauvage maîtresse des bêtes attaque, chaque autre créature que vous contrôlez gagne +X/+X jusqu'à la fin du tour, X étant la force de la Sauvage maîtresse des bêtes.
foreign_names.flavor: « En tapissant le monde entier de tissu urbain, ils ne s'étaient laissés nulle part où fuir. »

foreign_names.name: Domatrice Selvaggia
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta la Domatrice Selvaggia attacca, ogni altra creatura che controlli prende +X/+X fino alla fine del turno, dove X è la forza della Domatrice Selvaggia.
foreign_names.flavor: "Quando hanno ricoperto il mondo di città, si sono tolti ogni via di fuga."

foreign_names.name: 野生の獣使い
foreign_names.text: 野生の獣使いが攻撃するたび、あなたがコントロールしている他の各クリーチャーはターン終了時までそれぞれ＋Ｘ/＋Ｘの修整を受ける。Ｘは野生の獣使いのパワーに等しい。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 人間・シャーマン
foreign_names.flavor: 「彼らは都市で世界を覆ったが、結局自分たちの逃げ場所をなくしただけであった。」

foreign_names.name: 야성의 야수조련사
foreign_names.text: 야성의 야수조련사가 공격할 때마다, 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물들은 각자 턴종료까지 +X/+X를 받는다. X는 야성의 야수조련사의 공격력이다.
foreign_names.flavor: "놈들이 온 세상을 도시로 만들었으니 이제 그들이 숨을 곳도 없군."

foreign_names.name: Mestra de Feras Selvagem
foreign_names.text: Quando Mestra de Feras Selvagem ataca, cada outra criatura que você controla recebe +X/+X até o final do turno, sendo X igual ao poder de Mestra de Feras Selvagem.
foreign_names.flavor: "Quando eles cobriram o mundo com sua cidade, tudo que fizeram foi não deixar que tivessem para onde correr."

foreign_names.name: Дикая Повелительница Зверей
foreign_names.text: Каждый раз, когда Дикая Повелительница Зверей атакует, каждое другое существо под вашим контролем получает +X/+X до конца хода, где Х — сила Дикой Повелительницы Зверей.
foreign_names.flavor: «Когда они застроили весь мир городом, им стало попросту некуда бежать».

foreign_names.name: 狂野驯兽师
foreign_names.text: 每当狂野驯兽师攻击时，由你操控的每个其他生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为狂野驯兽师的力量。
foreign_names.flavor: 「他们用城市覆盖世界，却让自己少了逃跑的空间。」

foreign_names.name: 狂野馴獸師
foreign_names.text: 每當狂野馴獸師攻擊時，由你操控的每個其他生物得+X/+X直到回合結束，X為狂野馴獸師的力量。
foreign_names.flavor: 「他們用城市覆蓋世界，卻讓自己少了逃跑的空間。」

Worldspine Wurm.name: Worldspine Wurm
Worldspine Wurm.text:
Trample
When Worldspine Wurm dies, create three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample.
When Worldspine Wurm is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
Worldspine Wurm.original_text:
Trample
When Worldspine Wurm dies, put three 5/5 green Wurm creature tokens with trample onto the battlefield.
When Worldspine Wurm is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

rulings.text: Worldspine Wurm’s last ability is a triggered ability, not a replacement ability. Players can respond to this ability, for example, by trying to exile Worldspine Wurm from the graveyard before it’s shuffled into a library.

foreign_names.name: Weltenwirbelwurm
foreign_names.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn der Weltenwirbelwurm stirbt, bringe drei 5/5 grüne Wurm-Kreaturenspielsteine ins Spiel, die Trampelschaden verursachen.
Wenn der Weltenwirbelwurm von egal woher auf einen Friedhof gelegt würde, mische ihn in die Bibliothek seines Besitzers.

foreign_names.name: Sierpe lomo del mundo
foreign_names.text:
Arrolla.
Cuando la Sierpe lomo del mundo muera, pon en el campo de batalla tres fichas de criatura Sierpe verdes 5/5 con la habilidad de arrollar.
Cuando la Sierpe lomo del mundo vaya a un cementerio desde cualquier parte, barájala en la biblioteca de su propietario.

foreign_names.name: Guivre mondéchine
foreign_names.text:
Piétinement
Quand la Guivre mondéchine meurt, mettez sur le champ de bataille trois jetons de créature 5/5 verte Guivre avec le piétinement.
Quand la Guivre mondéchine est mise dans un cimetière d'où qu'elle vienne, mélangez-la dans la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.

foreign_names.name: Wurm Spina del Mondo
foreign_names.text:
Travolgere
Quando il Wurm Spina del Mondo muore, metti sul campo di battaglia tre pedine creatura Wurm 5/5 verdi con travolgere.
Quando il Wurm Spina del Mondo viene messo in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, rimescolalo nel grimorio del suo proprietario.

foreign_names.name: 世界棘のワーム
foreign_names.text:
トランプル
世界棘のワームが死亡したとき、トランプルを持つ緑の５/５のワーム・クリーチャー・トークンを３体戦場に出す。
世界棘のワームがいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、これをオーナーのライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ワーム

foreign_names.name: 세계척추 웜
foreign_names.text:
돌진
세계척추 웜이 죽을 때, 돌진 능력을 가진 5/5 녹색 웜 생물 토큰 세 개를 전장에 놓는다.
세계척추 웜이 어디로부터든 무덤에 들어갈 때, 그 카드를 소유자의 서고에 섞어 넣는다.

foreign_names.name: Vorme Espinha do Mundo
foreign_names.text:
Atropelar
Quando Vorme Espinha do Mundo morrer, coloque no campo de batalha três fichas de criatura verdes 5/5 do tipo Vorme com atropelar.
Quando Vorme Espinha do Mundo for colocado num cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, embaralhe-o no grimório de seu dono.

foreign_names.name: Вурм, Хребет Мира
foreign_names.text:
Пробивной удар
Когда Вурм, Хребет Мира умирает, положите на поле битвы три фишки существа 5/5 зеленый Вурм с Пробивным ударом.
Когда Вурм, Хребет Мира попадает откуда-либо на кладбище, втасуйте его в библиотеку его владельца.

foreign_names.name: 世脊亚龙
foreign_names.text:
践踏
当世脊亚龙死去时，将三个5/5绿色，具践踏异能的亚龙衍生生物放进战场。
当世脊亚龙从任何地方置入坟墓场时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

foreign_names.name: 世脊亞龍
foreign_names.text:
踐踏
當世脊亞龍死去時，將三個5/5綠色，具踐踏異能的亞龍衍生生物放進戰場。
當世脊亞龍從任何地方置入墳墓場時，將它洗入其擁有者的牌庫。

Abrupt Decay.name: Abrupt Decay
Abrupt Decay.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.
Abrupt Decay.flavor: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.
Abrupt Decay.original_text:
Abrupt Decay can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.

rulings.text: A spell or ability that counters spells can still target Abrupt Decay. When that spell or ability resolves, Abrupt Decay won’t be countered, but any additional effects of the countering spell or ability will still happen.
The mana value of a token that isn’t a copy of another object is 0. A token that is a copy of another object has the same mana cost as that object.
If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

foreign_names.name: Abrupter Verfall
foreign_names.text:
Der Abrupte Verfall kann nicht von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten neutralisiert werden.
Zerstöre eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und deren umgewandelten Manakosten 3 oder weniger betragen.
foreign_names.flavor: Die Izzet änderten rasch ihre Gepflogenheit, lebenslange Garantien zu gewähren.

foreign_names.name: Deterioro brusco
foreign_names.text:
Deterioro brusco no puede ser contrarrestado por hechizos o habilidades.
Destruye el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra con coste de maná convertido de 3 o menos.
foreign_names.flavor: Los ízzet no tardaron en suspender su política de garantías de por vida.

foreign_names.name: Décomposition abrupte
foreign_names.text:
La Décomposition abrupte ne peut pas être contrecarrée par des sorts ou des capacités.
Détruisez le permanent non-terrain ciblé ayant un coût converti de mana inférieur ou égal à 3.
foreign_names.flavor: Les Izzet réagirent en mettant un terme abrupt à leur système d'assurances à vie.

foreign_names.name: Deterioramento Improvviso
foreign_names.text:
Il Deterioramento Improvviso non può essere neutralizzato da magie o abilità.
Distruggi un permanente non terra bersaglio con costo di mana convertito pari o inferiore a 3.
foreign_names.flavor: Gli Izzet abbandonarono prontamente la loro politica di fornire garanzie a vita.

foreign_names.name: 突然の衰微
foreign_names.text:
突然の衰微は呪文や能力によって打ち消されない。
点数で見たマナ・コストが３以下の土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreign_names.flavor: イゼット団は直ちに生涯保証のポリシーを撤回した。

foreign_names.name: 갑작스런 부패
foreign_names.text:
갑작스런 부패는 주문이나 능력에 의해 무효화될 수 없다.
대지가 아닌 지속물 중 전환마나비용이 3 이하인 지속물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 파괴한다.
foreign_names.flavor: 이젯 길드는 즉시 평생 보장 제도를 철회했다.

foreign_names.name: Degeneração Abrupta
foreign_names.text:
Denegeração Abrupta não pode ser anulada por mágicas nem habilidades.
Destrua a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno com custo de mana convertido menor ou igual a 3.
foreign_names.flavor: Os Izzet suspenderam rapidamente a política de garantia vitalícia.

foreign_names.name: Внезапный Распад
foreign_names.text:
Внезапный Распад не может быть отменен заклинаниями или способностями.
Уничтожьте целевой перманент, не являющийся землей, с конвертированной мана-стоимостью 3 или меньше.
foreign_names.flavor: Иззеты очень быстро прекратили выдавать пожизненную гарантию.

foreign_names.name: 突发衰败
foreign_names.text:
突发衰败不能被咒语或异能反击。
消灭目标非地永久物，且其总法术力费用等于或小于3。
foreign_names.flavor: 伊捷联盟很快停止了他们的终生保证政策。

foreign_names.name: 突發衰敗
foreign_names.text:
突發衰敗不能被咒語或異能反擊。
消滅目標非地永久物，且其總魔法力費用等於或小於3。
foreign_names.flavor: 伊捷聯盟很快停止了他們的終生保證政策。

Archon of the Triumvirate.name: Archon of the Triumvirate
Archon of the Triumvirate.text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)
Archon of the Triumvirate.original_text:
Flying
Whenever Archon of the Triumvirate attacks, detain up to two target nonland permanents your opponents control. (Until your next turn, those permanents can't attack or block and their activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: The nonland permanents will be detained before blockers are chosen. Notably, a creature detained this way can’t block before it is detained.
The two nonland permanents can be controlled by the same opponent or by different opponents.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.
Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.

foreign_names.name: Archon des Triumvirats
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn der Archon des Triumvirats angreift, inhaftiere bis zu zwei bleibende Karten deiner Wahl, die kein Land sind und die deine Gegner kontrollieren. (Bis zu deinem nächsten Zug können diese bleibenden Karten nicht angreifen oder blocken und ihre aktivierten Fähigkeiten können nicht aktiviert werden.)

foreign_names.name: Arconte del triunvirato
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que el Arconte del triunvirato ataque, detén hasta dos permanentes objetivo que no sean tierra que controlen tus oponentes. (Hasta tu próximo turno, esos permanentes no pueden atacar ni bloquear y sus habilidades activadas no pueden activarse.)

foreign_names.name: Archonte du Triumvirat
foreign_names.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que l'Archonte du Triumvirat attaque, détenez jusqu'à deux permanents non-terrain ciblés que vos adversaires contrôlent. (Jusqu'à votre prochain tour, ces permanents ne peuvent ni attaquer ni bloquer et leurs capacités activées ne peuvent pas être activées.)

foreign_names.name: Arconte del Triumvirato
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta l'Arconte del Triumvirato attacca, trattieni fino a due permanenti non terra bersaglio controllati dai tuoi avversari. (Fino al tuo prossimo turno, quei permanenti non possono attaccare o bloccare e le loro abilità attivate non possono essere attivate.)

foreign_names.name: 三巨頭の執政官
foreign_names.text:
飛行
三巨頭の執政官が攻撃するたび、あなたの対戦相手がコントロールする土地でないパーマネントを最大２つまで対象とし、それらを留置する。（あなたの次のターンまで、それらのパーマネントでは攻撃もブロックもできず、それらの起動型能力は起動できない。）
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — 執政官

foreign_names.name: 삼두정치의 집정관
foreign_names.text:
비행
삼두정치의 집정관이 공격할 때마다, 상대가 조종하는 지속물 중 대지가 아닌 지속물을 최대 두 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물들을 억류한다. (당신의 다음 턴이 될 때까지 그 지속물들은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없으며, 그 지속물들의 활성화능력은 활성화될 수 없다.)

foreign_names.name: Arconte do Triunvirato
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Arconte do Triunvirato atacar, detenha até duas permanentes alvo que não sejam terrenos que seus oponentes controlam. (Até seu próximo turno, aquelas permanentes não podem atacar nem bloquear, e as habilidades ativadas delas não podem ser ativadas.)

foreign_names.name: Архонт Триумвирата
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда Архонт Триумвирата атакует, задержите не более двух целевых не являющихся землями перманентов под контролем ваших оппонентов. (До вашего следующего хода те перманенты не могут атаковать или блокировать, и их активируемые способности не могут быть активированы.)

foreign_names.name: 三盟统领
foreign_names.text:
飞行
每当三盟统领攻击时，拘留至多两个目标由对手操控的非地永久物。（直到你的下一个回合，这些永久物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。）

foreign_names.name: 三盟統領
foreign_names.text:
飛行
每當三盟統領攻擊時，拘留至多兩個目標由對手操控的非地永久物。（直到你的下一個回合，這些永久物不能進行攻擊或阻擋，其起動式異能也不能起動。）

Armada Wurm.name: Armada Wurm
Armada Wurm.text:
Trample
When Armada Wurm enters the battlefield, create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.
Armada Wurm.flavor: No one in the Conclave acts alone.
Armada Wurm.original_text:
Trample
When Armada Wurm enters the battlefield, put a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample onto the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Armadawurm
foreign_names.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn der Armadawurm ins Spiel kommt, bringe einen 5/5 grünen Wurm-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel, der Trampelschaden verursacht.
foreign_names.flavor: Niemand im Konklave handelt auf eigene Faust.

foreign_names.name: Sierpe de la armada
foreign_names.text:
Arrolla.
Cuando la Sierpe de la armada entre al campo de batalla, pon en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Sierpe verde 5/5 con la habilidad de arrollar.
foreign_names.flavor: Nadie del Cónclave actúa en solitario.

foreign_names.name: Guivre d'armada
foreign_names.text:
Piétinement
Quand la Guivre d'armada arrive sur le champ de bataille, mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 5/5 verte Guivre avec le piétinement.
foreign_names.flavor: Nul n'agit seul au sein du Conclave.

foreign_names.name: Wurm dell'Armata
foreign_names.text:
Travolgere
Quando il Wurm dell'Armata entra nel campo di battaglia, metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Wurm 5/5 verde con travolgere.
foreign_names.flavor: Nel Conclave, nessuno agisce da solo.

foreign_names.name: 大軍のワーム
foreign_names.text:
トランプル
大軍のワームが戦場に出たとき、トランプルを持つ緑の５/５のワーム・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ワーム
foreign_names.flavor: 議事会では誰も単独行動をとらない。

foreign_names.name: 군단 웜
foreign_names.text:
돌진
군단 웜이 전장에 들어올 때, 돌진 능력을 가진 5/5 녹색 웜 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 교단의 일원은 절대 단독으로 행동하지 않는다.

foreign_names.name: Vorme da Armada
foreign_names.text:
Atropelar
Quando Vorme da Armada entrar no campo de batalha, coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 5/5 do tipo Vorme com atropelar.
foreign_names.flavor: Ninguém no Conclave age sozinho.

foreign_names.name: Вурм-Армада
foreign_names.text:
Пробивной удар
Когда Вурм-Армада выходит на поле битвы, положите на поле битвы одну фишку существа 5/5 зеленый Вурм с Пробивным ударом.
foreign_names.flavor: В Конклаве никто не действует в одиночку.

foreign_names.name: 巨舰亚龙
foreign_names.text:
践踏
当巨舰亚龙进战场时，将一个5/5绿色，具践踏异能的亚龙衍生生物放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 在盟会中，没有人是单独行动。

foreign_names.name: 巨艦亞龍
foreign_names.text:
踐踏
當巨艦亞龍進戰場時，將一個5/5綠色，具踐踏異能的亞龍衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 在盟會中，沒有人是單獨行動。

Auger Spree.name: Auger Spree
Auger Spree.text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
Auger Spree.flavor:
"Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
Auger Spree.original_text: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

foreign_names.name: Bohrrausch
foreign_names.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält +4/-4 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreign_names.flavor: „Endlich eine Waffe, die die Boros nicht konfiszieren können!" —Juri, Inhaber von Juris Revue

foreign_names.name: Reguero de taladros
foreign_names.text: La criatura objetivo obtiene +4/-4 hasta el final del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "¡Por fin, un arma que los boros no pueden confiscar!" —Juri, propietario del elenco de Juri

foreign_names.name: Foret incontrôlé
foreign_names.text: La créature ciblée gagne +4/-4 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreign_names.flavor: « Enfin une arme que les Boros ne pourront pas confisquer ! » —Juri, propriétaire de la Revue de Juri

foreign_names.name: Follia di Trivelle
foreign_names.text: Una creatura bersaglio prende +4/-4 fino alla fine del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Finalmente! Un'arma che i Boros non possono confiscare!" —Juri, proprietario della Rivista di Juri

foreign_names.name: 穴開け三昧
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで＋４/－４の修整を受ける。
foreign_names.flavor: 「ついにボロスが没収できない武器ができた！」 ――ジョーリ組の経営者、ジョーリ

foreign_names.name: 무자비한 꿰뚫기
foreign_names.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +4/-4를 받는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "드디어 보로스 놈들이 압수할 수 없는 무기가 생겼군!" —주리, "주리의 풍자단" 소유주

foreign_names.name: Farra da Broca
foreign_names.text: A criatura alvo recebe +4/-4 até o final do turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Finalmente uma arma que os Boros não podem confiscar!" — Juri, proprietário da Trupe de Juri

foreign_names.name: Войти в Раж
foreign_names.text: Целевое существо получает +4/-4 до конца хода.
foreign_names.flavor: «Наконец-то есть оружие, которое не смогут конфисковать Боросы!» — Джури, владелец «Ревю Джури»

foreign_names.name: 钻法无歇
foreign_names.text: 目标生物得+4/-4直到回合结束。
foreign_names.flavor: 「终于有柄波洛斯无法没收的武器！」 ～裘里剧团业主裘里

foreign_names.name: 鑽法無歇
foreign_names.text: 目標生物得+4/-4直到回合結束。
foreign_names.flavor: 「終於有柄波洛斯無法沒收的武器！」 ～裘里劇團業主裘里

Azorius Charm.name: Azorius Charm
Azorius Charm.text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
• Draw a card.
• Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.
Azorius Charm.flavor:
"The rules of logic and order have already made the choice for you."
—Isperia
Azorius Charm.original_text: Choose one — Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn; or draw a card; or put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library.

rulings.text: Multiple instances of lifelink on the same creature are redundant.

foreign_names.name: Azorius-Amulett
foreign_names.text: Bestimme eines — Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Lebensverknüpfung bis zum Ende des Zuges; oder ziehe eine Karte; oder lege eine angreifende oder blockende Kreatur deiner Wahl oben auf die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.
foreign_names.flavor: „Die Regeln der Logik und Ordnung haben die Wahl bereits für dich getroffen." —Isperia

foreign_names.name: Amuleto azorio
foreign_names.text: Elige uno: Las criaturas que controlas ganan la habilidad de vínculo vital hasta el final del turno; o roba una carta; o pon la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo en la parte superior de la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreign_names.flavor: "Las reglas de la lógica y el orden ya han tomado la decisión por ti." —Isperia

foreign_names.name: Charme d'Azorius
foreign_names.text: Choisissez l'un — Les créatures que vous contrôlez acquièrent le lien de vie jusqu'à la fin du tour ; ou piochez une carte ; ou mettez une créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée au-dessus de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.

rulings.text: You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

Chemister's Trick.name: Chemister's Trick
Chemister's Trick.text:
Target creature you don't control gets -2/-0 until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Chemister's Trick.original_text:
Target creature you don't control gets -2/-0 until end of turn and attacks this turn if able.
Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: The controller of a creature that attacks if able still chooses which player or planeswalker it attacks.

If, during a player’s declare attacker’s step, a creature is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or hasn’t been under that player’s control continuously since the turn began (and doesn’t have haste), then it doesn’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature attack, the player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to attack in that case either.

If you cast Chemister’s Trick with overload, only creatures you don’t control that are on the battlefield when Chemister’s Trick resolves are affected. Creatures that come under another player’s control later in the turn are not.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.

Counterflux.name: Counterflux
Counterflux.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Counter target spell you don't control.
Overload {1}{U}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
Counterflux.original_text:
Counterflux can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Counter target spell you don't control.
Overload {1}{U}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

rulings.text: Because a spell with overload doesn’t target when its overload cost is paid, it may affect permanents with hexproof or with protection from the appropriate color.
Note that if the spell with overload is dealing damage, protection from that spell’s color will still prevent that damage.
Overload doesn’t change when you can cast the spell.
Casting a spell with overload doesn’t change that spell’s mana cost. You just pay the overload cost instead.
If you don’t pay the overload cost of a spell, that spell will have a single target. If you pay the overload cost, the spell won’t have any targets.
Effects that cause you to pay more or less for a spell will cause you to pay that much more or less while casting it for its overload cost, too.
If you are instructed to cast a spell with overload “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to pay its overload cost instead.

Coursers' Accord.name: Coursers' Accord
Coursers' Accord.text: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
Coursers' Accord.flavor: Bleak rumors reached Trostani's ears. She decreed that no one should travel alone.
Coursers' Accord.original_text: Put a 3/3 green Centaur creature token onto the battlefield, then populate. (Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

rulings.text: You can choose any creature token you control for populate. If a spell or ability puts a token onto the battlefield under your control and then instructs you to populate (as Coursers’ Accord does), you may choose to copy the token you just created, or you may choose to copy another creature token you control.
If you choose to copy a creature token that’s a copy of another creature, the new creature token will copy the characteristics of whatever the original token is copying.
The new creature token copies the characteristics of the original token as stated by the effect that put the original token onto the battlefield.

The new token doesn’t copy whether the original token is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any noncopy effects that have changed its power, toughness, color, and so on.
Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the new token will work.
If you control no creature tokens when you populate, nothing will happen.

When Detention Sphere enters the battlefield, you may exile target nonland permanent not named Detention Sphere and all other permanents with the same name as that permanent.
When Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owner's control.

rulings.text: Although the target of the enters-the-battlefield ability must not be a land, lands with the same name as that permanent will be exiled.

The enters-the-battlefield ability has only one target. The other permanents with that name aren’t targeted. For example, a permanent with protection from white will be exiled if it has the same name as the target nonland permanent.

If the target nonland permanent is an illegal target when the enters-the-battlefield ability tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No permanents will be exiled, including those with the same name as the target.

If Detention Sphere leaves the battlefield before its enters-the-battlefield ability has resolved, its leaves-the-battlefield ability will trigger and do nothing. Then the enters-the-battlefield ability will resolve and exile the targeted nonland permanent and other permanents with that name indefinitely.

Wenn die Arrestkugel das Spiel verlässt, bringe die ins Exil geschickten Karten unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.

Epic Experiment.name: Epic Experiment
Epic Experiment.text: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast instant and sorcery spells with mana value X or less from among them without paying their mana costs. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.
Epic Experiment.original_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each instant and sorcery card with converted mana cost X or less among them, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put all cards exiled this way that weren't cast into your graveyard.

rulings.text: You cast the cards one at a time, choosing modes, targets, and so on. The last card you cast will be the first one to resolve.
When casting an instant or sorcery card this way, ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type. Other timing restrictions, such as “Cast [this card] only during combat,” must be followed.
If you can’t cast a card, perhaps because there are no legal targets available, or if you choose not to cast it, it will be put into your graveyard.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast the card.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

foreign_names.name: Episches Experiment

Luego pon en tu cementerio todas las cartas exiliadas de esta manera que no fueron lanzadas.

foreign_names.name: 위대한 실험
foreign_names.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 X장을 추방한다. 당신은 그 중에서 전환마나비용이 X 이하인 각 순간마법 및 집중마법 카드를 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다. 그러고 나서 이렇게 추방된 카드 중 발동하지 않은 모든 카드를 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreign_names.text: Exile os primeiros X cards do topo de seu grimório. Depois, coloque em seu cemitério todos os cards exilados dessa maneira que não tenham sido conjurados.

foreign_names.name: Великий Эксперимент
foreign_names.text: Изгоните X верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Для каждой находящейся среди них карты мгновенного заклинания и волшебства с конвертированной мана-стоимостью Х или меньше вы можете разыграть ту карту без уплаты ее мана-стоимости. Essence Backlash.name: Essence Backlash
Essence Backlash.text: Counter target creature spell. Essence Backlash deals damage equal to that spell's power to its controller.
Essence Backlash.flavor:
"The other guilds will learn the hard way not to interfere with our investigations."
—Bori Andon, Izzet blastseeker
Essence Backlash.original_text: Counter target creature spell. Essence Backlash deals damage equal to that spell's power to its controller.

rulings.text: Essence Backlash can target a creature spell that can’t be countered. If Essence Backlash resolves, it won’t counter the spell but it will still deal damage.
If the creature’s power is * and it has an ability defining its power, use that ability to determine its power.
Abilities that change the power of a creature (such as the one of Collective Blessing) affect only creatures on the battlefield. They won’t change a creature spell’s power on the stack.

foreign_names.flavor: „Die anderen Gilden werden auf die harte Tour lernen, sich unseren Untersuchungen nicht in den Weg zu stellen." —Bori Andon, Izzet-Explosionssucher

foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo de criatura. El Contragolpe de esencia hace una cantidad de daño igual a la fuerza de ese hechizo a su controlador.
foreign_names.flavor: "Los otros gremios aprenderán por las malas a no interferir en nuestras investigaciones." —Bori Andon, buscarráfagas ízzet

foreign_names.name: Contrecoup d'essence
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé. Le Contrecoup d'essence inflige un nombre de blessures égal à la force de ce sort à son contrôleur.
foreign_names.flavor: « Les autres guildes vont apprendre à leurs dépens à ne pas se mêler de nos enquêtes. » —Bori Andon, chercheur de déflagration Izzet

foreign_names.name: Reazione dell'Essenza
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia creatura bersaglio. La Reazione dell'Essenza infligge danno pari alla forza di quella magia al suo controllore.
foreign_names.flavor: "Le altre gilde impareranno con le cattive a non interferire con le nostre indagini." —Bori Andon, cercatore esplosivo Izzet

foreign_names.name: 本質の反発
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。本質の反発はその呪文のパワーに等しい点数のダメージをそのコントローラーに与える。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我々の調査の邪魔をするべきではないということを、他のギルドは身をもって学ぶだろう。」 ――イゼットの爆風追い、ボーリ・アンダーン

foreign_names.name: 정수 반발
foreign_names.text: 생물 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 정수 반발은 그 주문의 공격력만큼의 피해를 그 조종자에게 입힌다.
foreign_names.flavor: "다른 길드들은 우리의 조사를 방해해선 안 된다는 것을 뼈아프게 느끼게 될 것이야." —이젯 폭발추적자 보리 안돈

foreign_names.name: Reação Adversa da Essência
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica de criatura alvo. Reação Adversa da Essência causa uma quantidade de dano igual ao poder daquela mágica ao controlador dela.
foreign_names.flavor: "As outras guildas aprenderão do modo mais duro a não interferir em nossas investigações." — Bori Andon, buscador de explosão Izzet

foreign_names.name: Ответный Удар Эссенции
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое заклинание существа. Ответный Удар Эссенции наносит повреждения контролирующему то заклинание игроку, равные силе того заклинания.
foreign_names.flavor: «Рано или поздно остальные гильдии поймут, что вмешиваться в наши опыты — себе дороже». — Бори Андан, иззетский взрывоискатель

foreign_names.name: 精魂反挫
foreign_names.text: 反击目标生物咒语。精魂反挫对该咒语的操控者造成伤害，其数量等同于该咒语的力量。
foreign_names.flavor: 「其他公会将学到惨痛教训；绝不该干涉我们的调查。」 ～伊捷觅爆师波力安东

foreign_names.name: 精魂反挫
foreign_names.text: 反擊目標生物咒語。精魂反挫對該咒語的操控者造成傷害，其數量等同於該咒語的力量。
foreign_names.flavor: 「其他公會將學到慘痛教訓；絕不該干涉我們的調查。」 ～伊捷覓爆師波力安東

Fall of the Gavel.name: Fall of the Gavel
Fall of the Gavel.text: Counter target spell. You gain 5 life.
Fall of the Gavel.flavor: "My ruling is final. Order is upheld. Justice is done."
Fall of the Gavel.original_text: Counter target spell. You gain 5 life.

rulings.text: You must be able to target a spell to cast Fall of the Gavel.

If the target spell is an illegal target when Fall of the Gavel tries to resolve (perhaps because it’s been countered by another spell), Fall of the Gavel won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain 5 life.

foreign_names.name: Das Fallen des Hammers
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Du erhältst 5 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreign_names.flavor: „Mein Urteil ist gesprochen. Die Ordnung wird gewahrt. Der Gerechtigkeit ist Genüge getan."

foreign_names.name: Bajada del martillo
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Ganas 5 vidas.
foreign_names.flavor: "Mi resolución es definitiva. Se ha mantenido el orden. Se ha hecho justicia."

foreign_names.name: Chute du marteau
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Vous gagnez 5 points de vie.
foreign_names.flavor: « Ma décision est sans appel. L'ordre est maintenu. Justice est faite. »

foreign_names.name: Colpo del Martelletto
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Guadagni 5 punti vita.
foreign_names.flavor: "Il verdetto è raggiunto. L'ordine è stato mantenuto. Giustizia è fatta."

foreign_names.name: 閉廷宣言
foreign_names.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。あなたは５点のライフを得る。
foreign_names.flavor: 「判決を確定する。秩序は守られた。正義はなされたのだ。」

foreign_names.name: 법봉 소리
foreign_names.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 당신은 생명 5점을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "내 결정은 최종적이다. 질서가 유지되었고, 정의는 지켜졌다."

foreign_names.name: Batida do Martelo
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Você ganha 5 pontos de vida.
foreign_names.flavor: "Minha decisão é definitiva. A ordem foi mantida. A justiça foi feita."

foreign_names.name: Удар Молотка
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Вы получаете 5 жизней.
foreign_names.flavor: «Мое решение окончательно. Порядок восстановлен. Правосудие свершилось».

foreign_names.name: 落锤
foreign_names.text: 反击目标咒语。你获得5点生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 「判决已定。秩序已得维持。正义已得伸张。」

foreign_names.name: 落鎚
foreign_names.text: 反擊目標咒語。你獲得5點生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 「判決已定。秩序已得維持。正義已得伸張。」

Firemind's Foresight.name: Firemind's Foresight
Firemind's Foresight.text: Search your library for an instant card with mana value 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for instant cards with mana values 2 and 1. Then shuffle.
Firemind's Foresight.original_text: Search your library for an instant card with converted mana cost 3, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then repeat this process for instant cards with converted mana costs 2 and 1. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You don’t have to find any instant cards in your library, even if they are there.
If a card in your library has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0. For example, a card with mana cost {X}{R} has a converted mana cost of 1, and so on.

foreign_names.name: Weitsicht des Feuerhirns
foreign_names.text: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Spontanzauberkarte mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 3, zeige sie offen vor und nimm sie auf deine Hand. Dann wiederhole diesen Vorgang für Spontanzauberkarten mit umgewandelten Manakosten von 2 und 1. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.name: Previsión de la Mente Ardiente
foreign_names.text: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de instantáneo con un coste de maná convertido de 3, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego repite este proceso para cartas de instantáneo con coste de maná convertido de 2 y de 1. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.name: Prévision du Cérébropyre
foreign_names.text: Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'éphémère ayant un coût converti de mana de 3, révélez-la et mettez-la dans votre main. Puis répétez ce processus pour les cartes d'éphémère ayant des coûts convertis de mana de 2 et 1. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.name: Lungimiranza del Mentefiamma
foreign_names.text: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta istantaneo con costo di mana convertito pari a 3, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano. Poi ripeti questo procedimento per carte istantaneo con costo di mana convertito pari a 2 e 1. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.name: 火想者の予見
foreign_names.text: あなたのライブラリーから、点数で見たマナ・コストが３のインスタント・カード１枚を探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加える。その後、点数で見たマナ・コストが２のインスタント・カードと１のインスタント・カードについても同様にする。その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.name: 불꽃천재의 예지력
foreign_names.text: 당신의 서고에서 전환마나비용이 3인 순간마법 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그러고 나서 전환마나비용이 2 및 1인 순간마법 카드에 대해 이 과정을 반복한다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.name: Previsão do Mente de Fogo
foreign_names.text: Procure em seu grimório um card de mágica instantânea com custo de mana convertido igual a 3, revele-o e coloque-o em sua mão. Depois, repita o processo para cards de mágica instantânea com custos de mana convertido iguais a 2 e 1. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreign_names.name: Прозорливость Огненного Разума
foreign_names.text: Найдите в вашей библиотеке карту мгновенного заклинания с конвертированной мана-стоимостью 3, покажите ее и положите в вашу руку. Затем повторите этот процесс для карт мгновенных заклинаний с конвертированными мана-стоимостями 2 и 1. Затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreign_names.name: 炎灵远虑
foreign_names.text: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张总法术力费用为3的瞬间牌，展示该牌，并将它置入你手上。然后对总法术力费用为2和1的瞬间牌重复此流程。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreign_names.name: 炎靈遠慮
foreign_names.text: 從你的牌庫中搜尋一張總魔法力費用為3的瞬間牌，展示該牌，並將它置入你手上。然後對總魔法力費用為2和1的瞬間牌重複此流程。然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

Goblin Electromancer.name: Goblin Electromancer
Goblin Electromancer.text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Goblin Electromancer.flavor: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."
Goblin Electromancer.original_text: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

rulings.text: Two Goblin Electromancers will make instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {2} less to cast, and so on.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
Goblin Electromancer’s effect reduces only generic mana in the spell’s total cost.

foreign_names.name: Goblin-Elektromagier
foreign_names.text: Spontanzauber und Hexereien, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.
foreign_names.flavor: Auf die Frage, wie viel Macht erforderlich ist, antworten Izzet-Magier immer nur „mehr".

foreign_names.name: Electromante trasgo
foreign_names.text: Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar hechizos de instantáneo o de conjuro.
foreign_names.flavor: Cuando se les pregunta cuánto poder hace falta, los magos ízzet siempre responden "más".

foreign_names.name: Électromancien gobelin
foreign_names.text: Les sorts d'éphémère et de rituel que vous lancez coûtent {1} de moins à lancer.
foreign_names.flavor: Quand on leur demande combien il faut d'énergie, les mages d'Izzet répondent toujours « davantage ».

foreign_names.name: Elettromante Goblin
foreign_names.text: Le magie istantaneo e stregoneria che lanci costano {1} in meno per essere lanciate.
foreign_names.flavor: Alla domanda "Quanto potere serve?", i maghi Izzet rispondono sempre: "Di più!"

foreign_names.name: ゴブリンの電術師
foreign_names.text: あなたが唱えるインスタント呪文とソーサリー呪文は、それを唱えるためのコストが{1}少なくなる。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: どれだけのパワーが必要かと訊かれれば、必ず「もっとだ」と答えるのがイゼットの魔道士である。

foreign_names.name: 고블린 전기술사
foreign_names.text: 당신이 발동하는 순간마법 주문과 집중마법 주문은 발동하는데 {1}가 덜 든다.
foreign_names.flavor: 이젯 마법사들은 힘이 얼마나 필요하냐고 물으면 항상 "더"라고 대답한다.

foreign_names.name: Eletromante Goblin
foreign_names.text: As mágicas instantâneas e os feitiços que você conjura custam {1} a menos para serem conjurados.
foreign_names.flavor: Quando lhes perguntam quanto poder é necessário, os magos Izzet sempre respondem "mais".

foreign_names.name: Гоблин-Электромант
foreign_names.text: Разыгрываемые вами мгновенные заклинания и заклинания волшебства стоят на {1} меньше.
foreign_names.flavor: На вопрос «Сколько вам нужно силы?» маги Иззетов всегда отвечают: «Больше!».

foreign_names.name: 鬼怪电流术士
foreign_names.text: 你施放的瞬间与法术咒语减少{1}来施放。
foreign_names.flavor: 当被问到需要多强的力量时，伊捷的法师只会回答「更多」。

foreign_names.name: 鬼怪電流術士
foreign_names.text: 你施放的瞬間與巫術咒語減少{1}來施放。
foreign_names.flavor: 當被問到需要多強的力量時，伊捷的法師只會回答「更多」。

Golgari Charm.name: Golgari Charm
Golgari Charm.text:
Choose one —
• All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Regenerate each creature you control.
Golgari Charm.flavor:
"Let the rest of Ravnica sneer. One way or another, they all end up in the undercity."
—Jarad
Golgari Charm.original_text: Choose one — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn; or destroy target enchantment; or regenerate each creature you control.

foreign_names.name: Golgari-Amulett
foreign_names.text: Bestimme eines — Alle Kreaturen erhalten -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges; oder zerstöre eine Verzauberung deiner Wahl; oder regeneriere alle Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: „Soll der Rest von Ravnica ruhig spotten. So oder so landen am Ende doch alle in der Unterstadt." —Jarad

foreign_names.name: Amuleto golgari
foreign_names.text: Elige uno: Todas las criaturas obtienen -1/-1 hasta el final del turno; o destruye el encantamiento objetivo; o regenera cada criatura que controlas.
foreign_names.flavor: "Deja que se burle el resto de Rávnica. De un modo u otro, todos acabarán en la subciudad." —Jarad

foreign_names.name: Charme de Golgari
foreign_names.text: Choisissez l'un — Toutes les créatures gagnent -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour ; ou détruisez l'enchantement ciblé ; ou régénérez chaque créature que vous contrôlez.
foreign_names.flavor: « Que les autres Ravnicans ricanent tout leur soûl. D'une manière ou d'une autre, tous finiront à la Citerraine. » —Jarad

foreign_names.name: Talismano Golgari
foreign_names.text: Scegli uno — Tutte le creature prendono -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno; oppure distruggi un incantesimo bersaglio; oppure rigenera ogni creatura che controlli.
foreign_names.flavor: "Lascia che il resto di Ravnica se la rida. In un modo o nell'altro, finiranno tutti nella città sepolta." —Jarad

foreign_names.name: ゴルガリの魔除け
foreign_names.text: 以下の３つから１つを選ぶ。「ターン終了時まで、すべてのクリーチャーは－１/－１の修整を受ける。」「エンチャント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。」「あなたがコントロールする各クリーチャーをそれぞれ再生する。」
foreign_names.flavor: 「ラヴニカ中で嘲笑させておけばいい。どのみち全員が地底街にやってくるのだ。」 ――ジャラド

foreign_names.name: 골가리 부적
foreign_names.text: 하나를 선택한다 — 모든 생물은 턴종료까지 -1/-1을 받는다; 또는 부여마법 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 부여마법을 파괴한다; 또는 당신이 조종하는 각 생물을 재생한다.
foreign_names.flavor: "라브니카의 다른 자들이 비웃어도 좋다. 결국에는 그들 모두 지하 도시에 들어오게 될 것이다." —자라드

foreign_names.name: Amuleto Golgari
foreign_names.text: Escolha um — Todas as criaturas recebem -1/-1 até o final do turno; ou destrua o encantamento alvo; ou regenere cada criatura que você controla.
foreign_names.flavor: "Deixe o resto de Ravnica torcer o nariz. De uma forma ou de outra, todos acabam no submundo." — Jarad

foreign_names.name: Талисман Голгари
foreign_names.text: Выберите одно — все существа получают -1/-1 до конца хода; или уничтожьте целевые чары; или регенерируйте каждое существо под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor: «Пусть Равника усмехается, пусть. Так или иначе, все они закончат жизнь в подземном городе». — Джарад

foreign_names.name: 葛加理护符
foreign_names.text: 选择一项～所有生物得-1/-1直到回合结束；或消灭目标结界；或重生每个由你操控的生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 「拉尼卡的其他人尽管嘲笑我吧。无论如何，地底城都将是他们的最终归宿。」 ～贾雷

foreign_names.name: 葛加理護符
foreign_names.text: 選擇一項～所有生物得-1/-1直到回合結束；或消滅目標結界；或重生每個由你操控的生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 「拉尼卡的其他人儘管嘲笑我吧。無論如何，地底城都將是他們的最終歸宿。」 ～賈雷

Grisly Salvage.name: Grisly Salvage
Grisly Salvage.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
Grisly Salvage.flavor: To the Golgari, anything buried is treasure.
Grisly Salvage.original_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

foreign_names.name: Grauenhafte Bergung
foreign_names.text: Decke die obersten fünf Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Du kannst davon eine Karte auf deine Hand bringen, die eine Kreatur oder ein Land ist. Lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.
foreign_names.flavor: Für die Golgari ist alles, was vergraben ist, ein Schatz.

foreign_names.name: Recuperación truculenta
foreign_names.text: Muestra las primeras cinco cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner en tu mano una carta de criatura o de tierra que se encuentre entre ellas. Pon el resto en tu cementerio.
foreign_names.flavor: Para los golgari, todo lo que está enterrado es un tesoro.

foreign_names.name: Horrible récupération
foreign_names.text: Révélez les cinq cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre une carte de créature ou de terrain parmi elles dans votre main. Mettez le reste dans votre cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: Aux yeux des Golgari, tout ce qui est enterré est un trésor.

foreign_names.name: Recupero Raccapricciante
foreign_names.text: Rivela le prime cinque carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi aggiungere alla tua mano una carta creatura o terra scelta tra esse. Metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.
foreign_names.flavor: Per i Golgari, tutto ciò che è sepolto è un tesoro.

foreign_names.name: 忌まわしい回収
foreign_names.text: あなたのライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを公開する。あなたは、それらの中にあるクリーチャー・カードか土地カードを１枚あなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
foreign_names.flavor: ゴルガリにとって、埋められているものはすべて宝である。

foreign_names.name: 끔찍한 인양
foreign_names.text: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 공개한다. 그 중 생물 또는 대지 카드 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드는 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 골가리 길드에게 땅에 묻힌 것은 곧 보물이다.

foreign_names.name: Salvamento Macabro
foreign_names.text: Revele os cinco cards do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar um card de criatura ou terreno dentre eles em sua mão. Depois, coloque o restante em seu cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: Para os Golgari, qualquer coisa enterrada é um tesouro.

foreign_names.name: Страшное Извлечение
foreign_names.text: Покажите пять верхних карт вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить находящуюся среди них карту существа или земли в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты на ваше кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: Для Голгари все, что зарыто в земле, — сокровище.

foreign_names.name: 骇人回收

Havoc Festival.name: Havoc Festival
Havoc Festival.text:
Players can't gain life.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses half their life, rounded up.
Havoc Festival.flavor:
"We can't control enemies who have no regard for their own survival."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct
Havoc Festival.original_text:
Players can't gain life.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses half his or her life, rounded up.

rulings.text: Spells and abilities that would cause a player to gain life still resolve, but the life-gain part has no effect.
Effects that would replace gaining life with another effect won’t apply because it’s impossible for players to gain life.

If an effect says to set a player’s life total to a certain number and that number is higher than the player’s current life total, that part of the effect won’t do anything. (If the number is lower than the player’s current life total, the effect will work as normal.)

The amount of life lost is calculated when the triggered ability resolves. For example, if a player has 20 life and there are two Havoc Festivals on the battlefield, the first ability will cause that player to lose 10 life and then the second ability will cause that player to lose 5 life.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, the last ability triggers for each player. Any life loss is applied to the team’s life total. For example, if the team has 30 life, the first ability will cause the player (and thus the team) to lose 15 life and then the second ability will cause the other player (and thus the team) to lose 8 life. The team will end up having 7 life.

Hellhole Flailer.name: Hellhole Flailer
Hellhole Flailer.text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{2}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Hellhole Flailer: Hellhole Flailer deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.
Hellhole Flailer.original_text:
Unleash (You may have this creature enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{2}{B}{R}, Sacrifice Hellhole Flailer: Hellhole Flailer deals damage equal to its power to target player.

rulings.text: The damage dealt by the last ability is equal to Hellhole Flailer’s power when it was last on the battlefield. For example, if it had a +1/+1 counter on it, it will deal 4 damage.

You make the choice to have the creature with unleash enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter or not as it’s entering the battlefield. At that point, it’s too late for a player to respond to the creature spell by trying to counter it, for example.
The unleash ability applies no matter where the creature is entering the battlefield from.
A creature with unleash can’t block if it has any +1/+1 counter on it, not just one put on it by the unleash ability.
Putting a +1/+1 counter on a creature with unleash that’s already blocking won’t remove it from combat. It will continue to block.

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Haste
{T}: Izzet Staticaster deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.

rulings.text: Izzet Staticaster’s activated ability has only one target. Other creatures with that name are not targeted. For example, a creature with hexproof will be dealt damage if it has the same name as the target creature.

The name of a creature token is the same as its creature types unless the token is a copy of another creature or the effect that created the token specifically gives it a different name. For example, a 3/3 Centaur creature token is named “Centaur.”

Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord.name: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord
Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord.text:
Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.
Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord.original_text:
Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.
{1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return Jarad from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: Jarad’s first ability applies only when Jarad is on the battlefield.
The life loss is based on the power of the sacrificed creature as it last existed on the battlefield.

To activate Jarad’s last ability, you must sacrifice two lands. It doesn’t matter what other land types the two lands have, as long as one is a Swamp and one is a Forest. Even if one of the lands you sacrifice is both a Swamp and a Forest, you have to sacrifice another land that is a Swamp or a Forest.
You can sacrifice any land with the land type Swamp or Forest, not just ones named Swamp or Forest. For example, you could sacrifice two Overgrown Tombs.

Lyev Skyknight.name: Lyev Skyknight
Lyev Skyknight.text:
Flying
When Lyev Skyknight enters the battlefield, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)
Lyev Skyknight.original_text:
Flying
When Lyev Skyknight enters the battlefield, detain target nonland permanent an opponent controls. (Until your next turn, that permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.)

rulings.text: Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” No one can activate any activated abilities, including mana abilities, of a detained permanent.
The static abilities of a detained permanent still apply. The triggered abilities of a detained permanent can still trigger.
If a creature is already attacking or blocking when it’s detained, it won’t be removed from combat. It will continue to attack or block.
If a permanent’s activated ability is on the stack when that permanent is detained, the ability will be unaffected.
If a noncreature permanent is detained and later turns into a creature, it won’t be able to attack or block.

When a player leaves a multiplayer game, any continuous effects with durations that last until that player’s next turn or until a specific point in that turn will last until that turn would have begun. They neither expire immediately nor last indefinitely.
